email_chain.subject: Request for 2,200MT Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Porter,

Could you help us with 2,200MT of wheat from Tangier to Guangzhou? We are keen to know if there are any congestions, and when you would like to clear your storage.

Best Regards,
Larry

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Mr. Porter,

Sorry for not contacting you earlier, but we were traveling. We hope the weather didn't impact you and your family too much. We appreciate you accepting our order, and we hope our dealings go smoothly.

Could you help us prepare your company's shipping documents? We would be happy to follow your company's terms.

Best Regards,
[Name removed] [CEO]

email_chain.subject: Update on Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Porter,

Thanks for the cargo status update. We really appreciate your speedy assistance. I just wanted to give you an update on our side: We are expecting to receive the shipment by Saturday, March 19.

We also want to give you a special request for the unloading. We would like to unblock your warehouse and then use a forklift to pick up the cargo. After that, you can close the warehouse for the spring. I believe the steamroller is operating right now. We will gladly pay for any extra costs.

With great appreciation,
Mr. Zhang
[VP Sales]

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Porter,

We are pleased to receive the update from [Department removed] about the Bill of Lading number. We will forward the request to our procurement department, and they will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best Regards,
Procurement Team

email_chain.subject: Request for 3000 Tanks Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I just finished my B2B conference call, and we are happy to be able to discuss the possible shipment of [URL removed] tanks. The sale would be for 3000 tanks, and we need them to be shipped by August 1st at the latest. The shipment has to be ocean freight and shipped from the port of destination to the port of origination.

We would be happy to follow your company's terms and conditions for the order. I would be happy to ship a TOT, but if you need more information before then, we can send the relevant document to you.

Thank you very much for your time, and we hope to work with your company in the near future!

Sincerely,
Kobe

email_chain.subject: Update on Tangier Equipment Availability
email_chain.body:
Hey Ken,

I hope everything is well with you. We heard back from the contact at Tangier on the situation. We were told that there are no other problems and that the equipment is available. The lead time would be about 7 days. We were told to confirm the availability of the cargo with [Party removed] and then make payment.

Let me know if you want to receive the e-mail contact with [Party removed].

Thank you,
Ram

email_chain.subject: Owner Availability
email_chain.body:
Good evening,

We received your message. The owner is currently not at the office. We will get back to you once he has responded.

Thank you,
Assistant

email_chain.subject: First Attempt at Writing Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

This is my first time doing this. If I can get this right, next time will be easier. And that's when you need to get people around you to write this kind of emails!

Please help me out.

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Your First Email
email_chain.body:
Hello Alice,

I just received your first email. I understand that we are only in week 2, but the writing in your email isn't as good as it can be. It's a shame because we already wasted a lot of time forming a group, investing in a classroom, and doing a lot of planning. Writing is what makes you sound more professional. You can see why? The current email doesn't speak in a professional manner. I could understand that you were in a hurry, but it's understandable to give some 'tips' to improve writing in order to save time in the future.

Keep it up and the next one will be better.

Best,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Feeling Overwhelmed
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

I'm a bit overwhelmed here. I tried writing as many emails as possible. This is mainly because you are helping me out. Thanks for this.

Could you check email 3 and 4?

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Improvement in Email Writing
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

Email 3 is much better. Here is another email, email 4. It's quite long but I did my best to correct all mistakes.

I'm aware that we have already lost some time in the past weeks. I'm really sorry about that. I didn't think that my writing would turn out so bad. I don't know if you want me to do the writing work or not, but I think I'm learning more from it. I like to think of writing like a reflex that can be acquired. There is no use to just sit and wait for you to do it right. I really enjoy your emails and really appreciate your feedback. Is it alright if I write the next email and just copy paste everything from my mentor email to save time? That's what I'm planning to do.

By the way, if there is something you want me to improve further, please let me know.

Best,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Good day Robert,

I need to ship 10,300MT of liquid calcium chloride from Rotterdam to San Diego, USA. Could you provide the most reliable quote as soon as possible?

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Thank you for the information. We are interested in it. Please send us the shipping quotation for this material, including transportation and insurance. Also, please send us your shipping terms.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Chemicals

Dear Robert,

Hello,

I want to tell you about my business. We are interested in chemicals, so please let me know what chemicals you have. I am ready to give you our offer.

With Regards,
Jonathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Rina,

Kindly see below for the updated information.

Thanks,
Zeca

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Zeca,

Thank you for the email. When you create a new email, you should be able to see the Send button (in Outlook 2016/2013/2010/2007) or the Save button (in Outlook 2003), and have the other options greyed out. If this is not the case, we need to find out why.

It looks like email 4 does not have a send button, only save. This means that you cannot send that email. The email should probably be copied over to a separate email in Outlook and sent from there.

Regards,
Rina

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Rina,

Kindly see below for the updated information.

Thanks,
Zeca

Thank you very much. I am looking for cargo to my vessel and it seems that we might miss the first half of October by a matter of days. Please let me know if there are any possible alternatives.

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel to Transport FWA to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Castillo,

Our 1,600MT of FWA are currently en route to Manzanillo. I need a vessel to take it to Cadiz. Could you please advise me on the earliest possible laycan and the latest arrival port time into Cadiz?

Thanks,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel to Transport FWA to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

I had a quick look at the AIS schedule, but unfortunately, they don't call at Cadiz. I also checked the London schedule, but Cadiz isn't listed there either. However, I found a possibility via Vigo in Spain. Could you please let me know if you'd be open to a Vigo port call? (This is for your risk management.)

The AIS vessel calls into Cadiz on 21st August, which is outside your risk window, but it sails to Vigo on the 20th. We could ship to Vigo and arrange a lorry for you to pick it up (1,600MT of FWA, I am assuming?). I can handle the paperwork and provide you with the terms as well.

Thank you,
Eileen

email_chain.subject: Request for Transport of Hydrochloric Acid
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to inquire if you have any availability for transporting 14,000 gallons of hydrochloric acid from Rotterdam to Hamburg. The preferred mode of transport is by barge. If possible, we would like the transport to start as early as May 17 and conclude no later than May 30.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Biomass Shipping Costs
email_chain.body:
John,

Could you please provide me with a cost estimate for shipping 100 tons of biomass from Chicago to Rotterdam by rail?

Thank you,
Miles

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Protein Stabilizer Transport
email_chain.body:
Amanda,

Here’s the gist of the project:

We need to transport Protein Stabilizer to Rotterdam for delivery to Amsterdam (Harbor A) as soon as possible. The product is urgently needed and must be loaded onto a barge departing Rotterdam on May 12. Air freight is the only viable option to ensure timely delivery, with an estimated cost of $120,000 for an FCL pallet (Freight Collect on Loading).

A transport company is interested in purchasing the product, but we need a quick and reliable method to get it to the barge for payment upon delivery.

Please let me know if you can assist with this.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Transport for May 8
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Barker,

Thank you for your timely response regarding the transportation of our product. We are very interested in having the product delivered to Port A by barge. We would like to request that the transport be completed by May 8 at 9:00 AM so that payment can be made on that date.

If the product is delivered as requested, we will pay $13,000 in cash and $3,000 in product.

Thank you for your time, and we look forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Ms. Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Transport for May 8
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Clark,

We apologize for the delayed response. Unfortunately, we are unable to complete the transport on May 8. The cost for the transportation would be $5,000.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Mr. Barker

Seema Pansuriya
DAILY INTERNATIONAL
Operation Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Damage Claims for Bill of Lading
email_chain.body: We are sorry to learn about the latest delay of this bill of lading, which we strongly suspected from the beginning. In fact, you will recall that the cargo was in the warehouse of our office at the commencement of the storm. We even had the warehouse and other locations surveyed for water damage, and it was found that all goods were safe and no damage was recorded at the time. Moreover, the same people were still there after the storm, having kept the place clean and free from the mud and debris generated after the storm. We are not sure of the reason behind your claims of damage as it was not visible. We still feel that it is possible that the stuff might have been damaged by pests since the warehouse was located a few meters away from the sea, and the waves coming during the storm would have crashed on the sea wall, possibly allowing insects to enter the warehouse.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Tonnage Booking and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body:
Hello Min,

I have a couple of inquiries that I need answered. First, could you explain to me what the procedure is to book tonnage with ACI? Second, I’m looking for vessel capacity from Singapore to Qeshm. I’ve been told that it’s really tight there right now, and you’re the best company to get us that cargo. Please let me know what your plans are for that route, and see if you can help me.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Tonnage Booking and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body:
Dear Rebecca,

Thank you for your email, and I’m very happy that you are looking into opening up a new route. I can help you with that. I will be more than glad to support you for your container requirements in the future. There is no route problem with Acico. I will call you to discuss the cargo you need and what I can do for you. Do let me know what your closest port is and whether you need TEU or FEU.

Sincerely yours,
Min

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:

We are looking to ship 5,000MT of wheat from Brisbane to London. I am wondering if you have any available vessels that will call London in the next week or two.

Thanks,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Hey Bill,

My company is seeking 5,000MT of grain from a port in Australia. I just checked around a little bit and found out that you were the one who handled my first transaction, so I assume you know a bit about how this market operates. Could you give me a few vessels with some ETA information in the next week? My shipper just left Sydney yesterday with the same instructions, and I need some backup.

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipping Inquiry for Wheat to Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hello Bill,

I would like to know if you are looking for one of your clients who needs to ship 3,000 metric tonnes of Australian wheat to Brazil. It is very urgent, and we would appreciate it if you could get back to us ASAP.

Regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Bill,

John from our Shipping Department here. We are a well-known company that has been working in the shipping and trading industry for nearly 15 years. The previous emails (Email 1 and Email 2) are from potential buyers. We are available for trading wheat, rice, corn, soybean, and sugar. They require your help, and you can show them our previous transactions. If you are interested, please contact us as soon as possible. If you want, you can also get their contact information and have a conversation with them. We have strict confidentiality and reserve rights. We will keep this a secret and give you full compensation for your efforts. If you have not received a reply from them within 24 hours, we will inform you who they are.

Regards,
John

We can provide safe and reliable transport of your cargo from Auckland to Melbourne, and a friendly and professional customer service team will be available to assist you. If you would like to proceed with your shipment, please let us know by email, or you may fill out our online shipping quote form. We look forward to working with you on this project.

Mr. Stephen Byrne
The Apple Group, Inc.

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mulhern,

Your shipment from Auckland to Melbourne can be shipped via air and truck combined to arrive at its destination in 12 hours. The combined service consists of a chartered 747 jumbo jet from Auckland to Melbourne, with two regular truckloads on arrival, which arrive by 2:00 pm on Friday, as shown below.

Timing:
Local Time in Auckland (UTC+12:00): Wednesday 1:00 pm
Local Time in Melbourne (UTC+11:00): Thursday 1:00 am

Please confirm if this arrangement works for you.

Best regards,
Stephen Byrne
The Apple Group, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote - Qingdao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Oliver,

We are currently evaluating an offer to transport 3,600MT of steel coils from Qingdao to Rotterdam. Could you provide a rough quote for the carriage? Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

If your firm is a carrier, please reply with the following:

'I’m the Operations Manager at James River Shipping. We’ve just been made aware of a shipment of steel coils that need to be transported from Xingang to Lagos by 27th March 2023. Would you be able to assist us by advising a shipping rate and getting started on the cargo right away?'

If you’re a freight forwarder, please reply with the following:

'I’m a Freight Manager at ADAS Shipping. We’re shipping 2,800MT of steel coils from Qingdao to Rotterdam. If you could get us a quote, we’d appreciate it.'

Best regards,
Operations Manager
James River Shipping

email_chain.subject: DDP Shipping Estimate – Qingdao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your interest in our quotation for transporting 3,600MT of steel coils from Qingdao to Rotterdam. As mentioned in our initial enquiry, we are available for shipment by 27th March 2023. To ensure smooth processing of the booking, please let us know if you require the goods by DDP Rotterdam or CPT Qingdao. If you need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Oliver
Operations Manager
Carrier Company

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm writing with a request for a cargo estimate for 4,600MT of corn from Chicago to Oslo. The cargo departs on the 6th of September and has a 20-day ETA. I'm interested in receiving prices for a consolidated l/c.

My email address is emma@example.com and my phone number is 212-111-2222.

Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

We appreciate your interest in ABC Freight. Our office is unable to deliver consolidated l/c's. Our prices do not require l/c's. Please find below a cargo price estimate based on your request:

- Cargo Estimate: $18,234

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for the estimate. Could you clarify if this price includes all handling and transportation fees from Chicago to Oslo?

Regards,
Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

Yes, the quoted price of $18,234 includes all handling and transportation fees from Chicago to Oslo. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for the clarification. I will review the details and get back to you shortly.

Regards,
Emma

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Cui,

I'd like to ship 10,000MT of wool from Melbourne to Khoula. I was wondering if your vessel could make port-to-port delivery by the end of May?

Thanks,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Leon,

Thank you for your email.

Our latest arrival in Khoula from Australia was on 1st April. The empty vessel we use is currently in New Zealand. The next vessel from Melbourne to Khoula is the XH88, and it will depart on 29th May, with an expected arrival in Khoula on 20th June.

Please contact our agent Mr. Johnson to make an order.

Thank you again,

With best regards,
Jake

P.S: Please change the shipping route of this order to Canningvale - Khoula, as Khoula is the port of the actual customer, and Canningvale is our own factory.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cui,

Thank you for your prompt reply.

Regarding the order, could you please inform me of the details of XH88? Such as ETA in Khoula, port of loading, and departure date, etc. Also, is it possible to charter a smaller vessel for the remaining quantity of 3,000MT (from Canningvale to Khoula)?

Thank you,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Hi Leon,

Thank you for your email.

The ETA of XH88 in Khoula is 20th June. The port of loading is Melbourne, and the departure date is 29th May. We'll discuss the rest of your request.

Regards,
Jake

PS: Please do not forget to change the shipping route to Canningvale - Khoula, and try to contact our agent Mr. Johnson to make an order.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cui,

Please confirm the details of XH88 with your office, then please give us some information regarding the charter of a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula by the end of this month.

Thanks,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Leon,

Thank you for your email.

The following is the information on the XH88:
- Ship Name: XH88
- Port of Loading: Melbourne
- ETA in Khoula: 20th June
- Captain: Captain Shaun Bailey

As the loading port and departure date of this vessel are fixed, there's no possibility to charter a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula for the last 3,000MT.

Thank you again,

Regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wool Shipment from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cui,

Thank you for the information. I will proceed with the order for XH88 and contact Mr. Johnson to finalize the details.

Best regards,
Leon

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Potter,

Your order for 1,500 MT of fish feed has arrived, and we are currently in the process of loading at Shah Deniz. To proceed, you need to release an opening POI to load the ocean vessel bound for Tanjung Priok. The estimated loading time is June 5. Please send the details of the POI and the loading schedule to us by 2 PM today.

Thank you,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Urgent: POI and Loading Schedule for Fish Feed
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

I was expecting to hear from you by now regarding the POI for loading our fish feed. We are operating on a tight schedule. Could you please send me the POI and the estimated loading time by 10 PM today? If we do not receive this information, we will have to proceed with our backup option of loading at South Changjiang.

Thank you,
Yan

email_chain.subject: Update on Fish Feed Shipment - LCL Option
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

Thank you for your patience while we worked to find a suitable vessel for your shipment. Due to the current high ocean freight rates, it has become more cost-effective to ship the 1,500 MT of fish feed via LCL (Less than Container Load). Could you confirm if our team can pick up the order from your warehouse tomorrow? Please release an opening POI to our driver by 2 PM tomorrow and provide an estimated loading time. If this is not feasible, we will need to proceed with our backup option of loading at South Changjiang.

Thank you,
Yan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Gray,

We’re looking to move 7,500MT of bitumen from Sohar to Dar es Salaam. Could you share your earliest loading window and let us know if you offer any dispatch incentives?

Regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,

Thank you for your inquiry. The earliest available loading date is Sunday, July 17th. Please let me know if you have any preference regarding the departure port or if you are interested in any discounts.

Regards,
Ms. Gray

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Good evening Ms. Gray,

Thank you for the information. Could you tell me how much flexibility you have regarding the departure date, and how would you handle any unforeseen circumstances in Dar es Salaam?

Kind regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, Please confirm: is your vessel available to lift 5,000MT of jet fuel from Panama to Sao Paulo early July? Yours sincerely, Joanne

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Joanne, thanks so much for your help. I have finalized my charter and now need to make some arrangements. Can you please send me the name, office number, and email address of the one person to coordinate this job? Also, please confirm for me that these dates are available and can be held. Thank you again for your help. Yours sincerely, Chris

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Joanne, I am still waiting for you to respond to my previous email. My charter was confirmed, and I need to book lift and send a USD$1,000,000 Letter of Credit. Please confirm when you can reply and let me know your coordinates so I can call your offices. Yours sincerely, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Chris, I am Joanne, the vessel coordinator at Clever Cargo. Thank you for your email. Please send a charterer's notice for one of our vessels to lift 5,000MT of jet fuel from Panama to Sao Paulo. Thanks! Yours sincerely, Joanne

email_chain.subject: Re: Charterer's Notice Sent
email_chain.body: Hello Joanne, Thank you for responding so quickly. I have sent the charterer's notice for the 5,000MT of jet fuel. Is the lifting process already completed and will it be delivered by your company to the bunkering terminal in Sao Paulo? Yours sincerely, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Charterer's Notice Sent
email_chain.body: Mr. Chris, thank you for your email. The vessel's name is U5 Okaloosa and she is currently in Trinidad. However, she is being rerouted to Panama as soon as possible. As for the load of jet fuel, I will confirm the lifting process and delivery details shortly. Yours sincerely, Joanne

email_chain.subject: Order for 5,000MT of Grapes
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The deal was for 5,000MT of grapes from Trieste to Panama. We would like to place the order ASAP. Could you let me know if you can accommodate it?

Sincerely,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Order for 5,000MT of Grapes
email_chain.body:
John,

I apologize for the delay in replying. I received your message several days ago but lost it. Is 3,000MT the best price that can be negotiated for the cargo? If so, please advise and indicate your mode of payment. Let me know when we can discuss the details.

I am looking forward to your prompt response.

Sincerely,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Order for 5,000MT of Grapes
email_chain.body:
John,

I am in New York now and will be able to deliver the payment through a bank transfer. If you can arrange for delivery of the grapes within 10 days of the receipt of the funds, we can lock the deal. Will you confirm if you want 3,000MT or 5,000MT?

Sincerely,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Request for Steamship Cargo Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Douglas,

Please have a carrier contact me for quoting R/T steamship cargo from Kuala Lumpur to Batumi. I need the booking done and signed by Friday to avoid demurrage.

Regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Steamship Cargo Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would be delighted to assist with your order. Could you please provide the following information?

1. Commodity:
   a. Quantity:
   b. Container:
2. Dimensions:
3. Loading port:
4. Delivery port:
5. Expected ETA:

We will provide a detailed quote as soon as we have your details. You can expect our response within the next 1-2 working days.

Regards,
Douglas

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Steamship Cargo Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Douglas,

Thank you for getting back to us. We can proceed with the shipment arrangements, but we need to verify if your commodities are acceptable for transport by sea. Our cargo experts will examine the details and provide further advice. Please note that certain commodities, such as firearms and animal-based products, may have restrictions for sea transport. We will check these items individually to ensure compliance. If everything is in order, we will send you a proforma invoice for the booking.

Kind regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Steamship Cargo Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt,

We have reviewed your commodities and confirmed they are acceptable for sea transport. Our representative is finalizing the booking details and will send you a proforma invoice shortly. Please note that this invoice is not a final confirmation and does not commit us to any agreement until we receive your signed confirmation.

Looking forward to your swift response.

Kind regards,
Douglas
Your Account Manager

email_chain.subject: Fertilizer Shipment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

Thank you so much for your time today. I am excited to inform you that we are able to purchase 2,000 MT of fertilizer from Adana to Damascus. I am looking for you to ship these goods by the 20th of May. Please reply to confirm this, as I would like to start preparing the customs paperwork tomorrow.

My boss says you have a great reputation for delivering on time, and if you could let me know if you have available space on this route, I would really appreciate it.

You can email us at booking@example.com or call our booking office on 01-456-234.

Thanks again for your help.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Porting Options
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

I'm confused about your options for porting. You mentioned doing it at Homs or Tarsus. I had previously spoken to you about only being able to port at Homs, as Tarsus would add too much expense. You will need a sub-contractor in Tarsus to take the entire truck, and they are already holding the paperwork, waiting for your authorization.

I know this sounds odd, but this is how it works. They won't agree to it unless they see the confirmation.

Please get back to me as soon as possible.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Fertilizer Purchase
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

I was hoping to purchase 50 MT of fertilizer and send it through Adana to Damascus. Could you please confirm that we are able to buy fertilizer through your office in Adana, as I heard that all the FCA warehouses have closed?

Thanks.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Order Status Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

I am finalizing my daily order and wanted to confirm our order status for the next 10 days. I want to verify if we will have 5,000 MT of fertilizer delivered from the local warehouse to our designated warehouse in Adana. I am not sure if you can take the order.

Please let me know.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Order Status Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

Please let me know the status of my order that we placed through Adana. We need to check the status of 10,000 MT of our daily order. I would like to confirm if everything is on track.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Day,

We would like to verify that you received 5,000 MT of fertilizer through Adana from the local warehouse, and we want to confirm that it was delivered correctly. Please let me know the status of this order.

Best regards,
(Sender's Name)

email_chain.subject: Freight Assistance Request
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

How are you doing? Can you please assist with freight to Chennai from Taiwan?

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Assistance Request
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I am really shocked by your response and your lack of basic courtesy. Just because of me, you have gone through all this waste of time for a customer that apparently doesn't even have an account, and doesn't know how to handle customer service in a professional manner! What an experience for me, but for you, I have no idea as I wouldn't wish that on my worst enemy. Thanks to you, I have just spent the best part of a day using my time trying to deal with what turned out to be a simple request, which if you had been more responsive, you could have processed in the first place. Just remember you are dealing with live human beings, not AI that don't have the ability to experience the emotional impact that your responses have caused. There are literally thousands of companies worldwide who would be willing to fill your shoes, and of those that might be even less.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Rate Estimate for Anhydrous Ammonia Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moreau,

Please provide a rate estimate for 3,700MT of anhydrous ammonia from Galveston to Seville. The cargo should be delivered by the end of August. Could you also quote your standard demurrage charge?

Best regards,
Darren Walters

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Estimate for Anhydrous Ammonia Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Walters,

Thank you for your email. We can arrange air transport for the shipment to Seville. The earliest available service would be from September 1st. Our standard demurrage charge for 3,700MT is $1,950.00. Does this fit within your budget for this transport?

Best regards,
Joshua Moreau

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Estimate for Anhydrous Ammonia Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moreau,

Thank you for your rate estimation. My budget is $2,200.00, and your quote is slightly over budget. I will need to explore other options for a more cost-effective solution.

Regards,
Darren Walters

email_chain.subject: FOB Basis Inquiry for Die Cast Tooling
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Taylor,

Could you give me your opinion as to whether an FOB basis is a suitable option for 3,000MT of die cast tooling from Shenzhen to Yangon?

Best,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Basis Inquiry for Die Cast Tooling
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you for getting in touch. I know your team does not think that FOB, for this kind of product, would be a good option. This is largely due to the fact that shipping costs are so high from Shenzhen. However, I would be interested in hearing your thoughts and would like to discuss this in detail.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Request for Conference Call
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I would like to get in touch with you to discuss the details of this project. Do you have time to have a conference call with me today?

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Conference Call
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

I'm sorry, but my schedule is very full. I do however have a team of experts who can assist you in answering your questions. Do you have some general questions which we could answer? I think we could assist you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on FOB Pricing
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I'm interested in asking you some questions about your view on using FOB pricing for my specific project. Is there someone within your company who you feel would be able to help me?

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on FOB Pricing
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Andrew,

My colleague Andrew and I are very busy this week and unfortunately are not able to take time for phone calls. I would be happy to connect you with someone in our accounting team who can assist with your enquiry.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Payment Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

I have a specific question about the invoice I sent you. In particular, I would like to confirm whether there is a possibility of extending the payment term as well as the bank details you need in order to process the payment.

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice and Payment Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Andrew,

Thanks for your note and I would be happy to assist you. The payment terms on the invoice are standard for Shenzhen and Yangon. As a rule we do not extend terms as most clients send the payment upon delivery of the goods.

Please see the enclosed copy of our bank details.

Best,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Could you please provide us with a freight quote and availability for a vessel with a DWT of around 80,000? Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the MV Ocean Breeze available, which meets your requirements. The freight quote is $25 per metric ton on a CIF basis. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for the prompt response. The quote looks reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime and any potential demurrage charges? Also, please provide the vessel's LOA.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - 1,300MT Sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Crosby,

We’ve been discussing the rates for 1,300MT of sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali. We can provide more specific details regarding the specifications. Could you please send me a quote as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Crosby,

Just following up on my previous email. We are ready to proceed as soon as the rates are confirmed. Could you please provide the updated rates at your earliest convenience?

Thanks,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Need Quote for Freight Booking
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Crosby,

We urgently need to book the freight to stay on schedule. Could you please send me the quote for 1,300MT sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Final Reminder: Quote Needed
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Crosby,

This is a final reminder regarding the quote for 1,300MT sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali. We need to finalize the booking immediately. Please ensure the rates are updated and sent to me as soon as possible.

Thanks,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Cold Rolled Stainless Steel Delivery Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Cai,

We have just received 1000 tons of cold-rolled stainless steel. Our client is looking for immediate delivery and is offering a storage location in Wuhan accessible to all major international operators. We can have you in the area, with the base rate set as below.

Would you have space, or can you put us in touch with another operator in your area with availability?

Please advise ASAP.

Many thanks,
Lukas August

email_chain.subject: Re: Cold Rolled Stainless Steel Delivery Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Cai,

Thanks for the quick reply.

We are able to accommodate your client's requirement. We can provide a nearby location to them.

What are the cargo details? Is it 1000 MT of stainless steel? When is it expected to arrive at your terminal?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Zhou Xiao

email_chain.subject: Re: Cold Rolled Stainless Steel Delivery Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Cai,

Thanks for the reply.

The cargo has arrived in Shanghai and has just been cleared through customs. We will arrange to have a crane pick it up from the port and can hold it in our warehouse in Shanghai for a week until we can get it out to the client.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Lukas August

email_chain.subject: Request for Bill of Lading Proforma
email_chain.body:
Hello Frank,

We have a shipment of palletised pork meat to Sri Lanka scheduled for the week of July 11-15. Could you please provide us with your bill of lading proforma?

Thank you,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Palletised Pork Bill of Lading 6 11-15 2016
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bharadwaj,

We have our goods ready for pick up by the shipping line.

Regards,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Palletised Pork Bill of Lading 6 11-15 2016
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Bharadwaj,

We are looking forward to your order. Can you please let us know if you are interested in bulk buying?

Regards,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Re: Palletised Pork Bill of Lading 6 11-15 2016
email_chain.body:
Thank you for the information. I think we can order in bulk. Could you please let us know the price?

Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Palletised Pork Bill of Lading 6 11-15 2016
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Reddy,

Thanks for the order. Could you please let us know when you want to dispatch the goods?

Regards,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

We have a vessel available from Gijon to Antwerp on the 10th or the 11th. Please let us know your preference.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

Thank you for your reply. Please find attached a scanned document with all the details regarding this booking.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE - Schedule Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

There has been a slight change in the schedule for this booking. The estimated delivery time to Antwerp has been revised to the 18th of January, depending on weather conditions. We are closely monitoring the weather and will keep you updated.

Additionally, the cargo will be loaded onto the vessel '32' on the 20th of January. This vessel is designed for rough weather and carries a mix of coal and general cargo. The next voyage will be from Antwerp to Gijon. The cargo size has been slightly revised to 315 metric tons.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Barley Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Debra,

I am checking on a cargo of barley. Do you see a problem having it moved by rail from Rotterdam to Hamburg?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Maria,

We can arrange that shipment. There will be a surcharge of 1 Euro/Metric Ton to load the vessel and ship through the Suez Canal.

Regards,
Willemijn

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Maria,

By all means, proceed. This is no problem. However, only the shipment instructions and additional services for the freight shall be sent to my email address. All handling with customs procedures, etc., shall remain your responsibility.

Best Regards,
Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Will the vessel transportation be for 8000 tons or less? If yes, please inform about the container service.

Best regards,
Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Wolfgang,

Unfortunately, the shipment is not going to be less than 10,000 tons.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for the information. I will proceed with the preparations.

Best regards,
Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Wolfgang,

I see you have my full name here. In which format should I fill in the letters of recommendation and certificates of origin? And could you please have my form of employment in your country attached as well?

Thanks in advance.
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Let me know when you have these documents. Also, please include the 'endorsement' and 'CoC' on the reverse side.

Best regards,
Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FCL Reefer Containers from Ho Chi Minh City to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Peterson,

We plan to ship 4,500MT of FCL reefer containers from Ho Chi Minh City to Haiphong. Could you confirm available laycan slots for next week? Additionally, do you anticipate any additional bunker surcharge?

Regards,
Irina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FCL Reefer Containers from Ho Chi Minh City to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your inquiry, Irina.

I have reviewed your details and will do my best to assist with your shipment. Below is the main sailing schedule for next week (Sep 15-23):

- Captain: Martin Hoppe, Vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE MINDORO (0)
- Captain: Warren Kaiwan, Vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE MAULUD (6)
- Captain: Mark Von Herbeck, Vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE MUHARRAM (9)
- Captain: Matthew Williams, Vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE SHAWWAL (12)
- Captain: Ilmo Kortekangas, Vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE ZUHRA (18)

Please confirm your preferred sailing with our dispatch office in advance.

Regards,
Mr. Peterson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FCL Reefer Containers from Ho Chi Minh City to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Peterson,

I have checked our available containers, and the details are as follows:

- Container Number: 0003/4
- Container Weight: 57.60MT
- Equipment Type: 40HC
- Container Size: 45'GP
- Unit Quantity: 1

Please instruct our dispatcher for the actual booking order.

Regards,
Irina

email_chain.subject: Copy of FCL Rating
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your booking. Below are our calculations:

1) 40'HQ as GTCS
- Actual Rate: 3500 P/hour
- Number of Hours: 5
- Total: 17500 P

2) WOR
- Actual Rate: 3500 P/hour
- Number of Hours: 10
- Total: 35000 P

Total: 52500 P
Bill of Lading: CMA CGM TCM

Regards,
Mr. Peterson

labels.vessel: CMA CGM / TC LAKE MINDORO, CMA CGM / TC LAKE MAULUD, CMA CGM / TC LAKE MUHARRAM, CMA CGM / TC LAKE SHAWWAL, CMA CGM / TC LAKE ZUHRA

email_chain.subject: Request for Crude Oil Quote
email_chain.body: Jonas, this is Noah again. I have the opportunity to purchase 10,000 metric tons of crude oil in the next 10 days. Could you send me a quote to New York and a quote from the same port to Jiangyin in China? Please also include a sea freight rate quote for these two locations. Thank you, Noah

email_chain.subject: Revised Offer for Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Jonas, please find our last offer and a revised one. We have a strong demand for the mentioned product. We require a quantity of 10,000 to 15,000 metric tons for one shipment to China between October and November this year. We offer CFR and CIF prices based on FOB. If you can provide a differential for the quoted prices, that would be better. For example, for the FOB price of $60.70, please provide a CIF price. I will review this offer with management and get back to you soon. Thank you for your time and patience. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Interest in Crude Oil Contract
email_chain.body: Noah, I would be grateful if you could consider me for your contract, as I have shown great interest. I appreciate that your company offers the most competitive prices. Could you please advise if you can offer DDP and what the cost for this service would be? Thanks again for your time and patience. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Buy Contract for Crude Oil
email_chain.body: John, I hope this email finds you well. I would like to place a buy contract for the crude product you are selling. We are only interested in CFR and CIF prices. The following ports are available to us for sourcing: Mainland China (Jiangyin, Dalian, Zhenjiang), Thailand (Laem Chabang), Philippines (Manila), Japan (Chiba), Taiwan (Kaohsiung), South Korea (Geoje), and Indonesia. Please send me a hard copy of your Terms and Conditions document in the next email. Thanks and regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Request for Term Sheet
email_chain.body: Jonas, I would be grateful if you could provide me with a term sheet for your company and terms of contract. I will need to present a hard copy for review at the upcoming meeting. Thank you and regards, John

email_chain.subject: Terms and Conditions Document
email_chain.body: Noah, our terms and conditions document for the purchase of oil is attached in this email. Kindly review it and get back to me with any additional clarifications. Thanks and regards, John

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Terms and Conditions
email_chain.body: John, thank you for your email. I have reviewed it and, as mentioned, I have some questions regarding the terms and conditions. Could you please answer them in the next email? Thanks and regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Request for Rate Quote - Plastic Granules from Gdansk to Pecem
email_chain.body:
David,

We have 6,000MT of plastic granules available for shipment from Gdansk to Pecem. Could you provide your best rate to the above port as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Jeff

email_chain.subject: Assistance Needed for Shipment to Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I understand that shipping products to Brazil from the USA involves a lot of paperwork. Could you help me find a reliable carrier for Brazil?

Regards,
Carolina

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance Needed for Shipment to Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Carolina,

I have some good news regarding your shipment to Brazil. We currently have 6,000MT of plastic granules available for shipment from Gdansk to Pecem. We have already contracted with a carrier and arranged for customs clearance to ensure smooth delivery to the Pecem area. Please let me know if this shipment meets your requirements so we can proceed further.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Brokerage Services in Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Paulo,

On 8/10/17, I conducted some research into brokerage services in Brazil and contacted Ingo Geladenkamp of Andersen Cartago. He assured me of a competent and reliable team, and his company is ISO certified. Ingo has a strong track record in providing brokerage services, particularly for seaborne and break bulk trades. Although he hasn't provided any other services yet, he has excellent local contacts for cargo pickups at the ports of Rio, Sao Paulo, Parana, and Pecem.

I sent Ingo the B/L # on 8/14/17.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Rate Quote - Plastic Granules from Gdansk to Pecem
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Jeff,

Here is what I found regarding Brazilian ports:

• Port of Santos
• Port of Rio de Janeiro
• Port of Pecem
• Port of Paran

Let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 5,000 Barrels of Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Hi Flora,

We are planning to ship 5,000 barrels of jet fuel from Houston to Genoa. Can you handle this shipment?

Regards,
Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 5,000 Barrels of Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Hi Tabitha,

Thank you for your inquiry. Yes, we can handle the shipment of 5,000 barrels of jet fuel from Houston to Genoa. Please provide us with a quote for comparison.

Sincerely,
Flora Chung
CEO
SilverOak Logistics Company

email_chain.subject: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Christine,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to confirm that you can now access your house deposit funds via the Internet Banking section of our website or by downloading the Bankwest Mobile App. Please let me know if you encounter any issues.

Best regards,
Pat

email_chain.subject: Re: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Pat,

Thank you for the update. I am happy to proceed with transferring my house deposit. However, I am encountering an issue where the BNP Paribas website is requesting the bank's International Code or SWIFT code. I recall you mentioned that this wouldn't be necessary, but the website insists on it. I am able to use the app, but I still need the code to complete the transfer. Could you please confirm this and provide the code?

Best regards,
Christine

email_chain.subject: Re: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Pat,

If you could provide me with the code as soon as possible, I can proceed with transferring the funds and ensure they are in the right place.

Many thanks,
Christine

email_chain.subject: Re: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Christine,

Here is the code you can use: BNPBP22F. There seems to be a minor issue with the way BNP Paribas is handling the transfer. You should be able to go to the 'Transfer Funds' section of the app and make a payment using the code provided. The reason they are asking for the code is that when you click on 'Pay Others,' a pop-up box appears requesting the code.

I hope this helps. Please let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Pat

email_chain.subject: Re: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Pat,

Thanks very much for the code. I will proceed with the transfer now.

Sincerely,
Christine

email_chain.subject: Re: House Deposit Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hi Pat,

Sorry to bother you again, but I just wanted to confirm that the transfer was successful. Thanks again for your help.

Best regards,
Christine

Thank you for reaching out, and I apologize for the delay in my response. I will be traveling out of the country next week and may not be able to reply promptly for a few days.

In the meantime, let’s proceed with the 70,000MT voyage of Durkulp from San Francisco to Tianjin. I’ve attached the charter party for your review. If you agree with the terms, I can have the charter party signed today.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Maura

The charter party looks reasonable to me. I would like to proceed with this deal. If you could email me a signed copy as soon as possible, that would be great.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Mr. Liu

I’ve reviewed the charter party. It’s all good, but I’ll need a slight modification. I’ll send you an email with the updated terms shortly.

Thank you again.

Best regards,
Mr. Liu

Best regards,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Email Queries
email_chain.body: The first two emails are examples of computer-generated queries sent to a company using a spam bot, which can often be very difficult to trace. The third email is an example of a very short message that can be detected easily. These examples are very short and the emphasis is on readability, so they are likely not to have been generated by a spam bot. The last example is a message you might get from a company with a sales lead, but one that has not bothered to find out who you are.

Any chance we could sell you 60,000MT of lumber from Korea to Vancouver? Is there a time window you’re most interested in, and how quickly can you put something together for us?

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Molasses Shipment from Batumi to Zeebrugge
email_chain.body:

Could you please provide a quote for a 6,000MT shipment of molasses from Batumi to Zeebrugge? Additionally, could you specify if this quote is for CIF terms or FOB?

Looking forward to your quote!

Best regards,
Matthew

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Molasses Shipment from Batumi to Zeebrugge
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthew,

Thank you for your inquiry. The shipping from Batumi to Zeebrugge is handled by North German Lloyd. I have attached a quote for FOB terms, which is valid for 2 weeks. email_chain.subject: Request for 12,000MT Tanker Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Santiago,

I require a 12,000MT tanker to carry coal from Osaka to Kashima. Do you have vessels available for this service? We would like to be placed on your slow list in terms of priority. Additionally, we require faster sailing times than our normal requirements.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on 2000MT Tanker Availability
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Santiago,

I noticed that you have previously chartered 2000MT+ tankers from Jaxport. Could you advise if they are still available for hire for the Osaka to Kashima service? If possible, could we be placed on your priority list? If not, could you let me know when they will be available again? Additionally, could you send me a list of vessels currently being chartered and their sailing details? For example, are they all deep-sea vessels, or do you also have shallow-draft vessels available?

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 2000MT Shallow Draft Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Santiago,

I am looking for a 2000MT, shallow-draft, slow cargo vessel for a route from Kashima to Kobe. Could you send me a list of ships currently available and their prices? Also, could you advise if there are any vessels suitable for this trade?

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Crushed Ore
email_chain.body:
Hello Meg,

I need to ship 3,300MT of crushed ore from Dalbeattie to Plymouth. Do you have any open slots in June, and can you confirm your ship's draft restrictions?

Warm regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Crushed Ore
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

Sorry for the late reply. I can check if we have any slots available in June and provide you with our ship's draft restrictions. Could you confirm if this works for you?

Thanks,
Meg

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Crushed Ore
email_chain.body:
Hi Meg,

The order is very urgent as I need to ship it by the 10th of June. However, I will wait for your confirmation.

Thanks,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Crushed Ore
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

Here are our ship's draft restrictions for June. Unfortunately, we don't have any slots available for a single vessel in June. Please check our schedule and let me know if you can adjust your timeline. All our ships have tight slots in June, and I can't guarantee availability by the end of the month.

Best regards,
Meg

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Crushed Ore
email_chain.body:
Hi Meg,

Sorry for the delay. I have already spoken to my colleagues, and we can provide you with a 50,000MT order. Is that acceptable? We will ship it using our vessel (link). We are requesting a charter at FOB Sierra Leone. I will get back to you if we have any further inquiries.

Thanks,
Eva

email_chain.body:

Do you have a suitable vessel for 4,500MT of coal from Kobe to Jakarta next week? We've already reserved a vessel on Alisports, but I'd like to get some other quotes as well.

Thank you,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

Thank you for your email. We have confirmed an estimated price of around 6,000 USD per ton. This price may change depending on the shipping time. We will make an order in the following week. The captain and our legal team will provide further information.

Regards,
Captain Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:

Could you tell me more about the route I mentioned in the last email? We need an estimation of how much it's going to cost from Kobe to Jakarta.

Thank you,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

Sorry for the delay. Just let me know if you have some time before noon, and we will send a captain to talk more with you.

Best regards,
Marie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Repair Rates for Delayed Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Roy,

Our customer is on a week-long strike, and we have a shipment of new boilers to ship from Fujairah to Liverpool. Do you charge a repair rate for delays caused by any issues on the orderer’s end?

Thanks,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Repair Rates for Delayed Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Rory,

Thank you for your email. Please ensure that your purchase order is booked prior to sending us the shipment. If the order is booked, a credit will be issued to your account for any delays. If not, you will need to place the order before sending the shipment.

Best regards,
Roy

email_chain.subject: Out of Stock Notification for F6 Series Boilers
email_chain.body:

This is just a reminder to let you know that we are out of the F6 series boilers. Please let us know if you need another one shipped out in the next week.

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for F6 Series Boilers
email_chain.body:
Hello Roy,

Our customer is out of stock. Do you have any F6 series boilers that we can send out today? I can send you a PO right away.

Thank you,
Owen

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote and Additional Information
email_chain.body: I see from your website that you can handle EXW for my cargo. Can you please provide me a quote for 2,000MT of raw material from Istanbul to Hamburg? Also, if I may ask, could you please attach a photo of your truck? Cheers, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Dear Sam, Thank you for your message. Here is the quote for your cargo, but we also need your FOB Istanbul (or as specified in the Proforma Invoice) in order to proceed with the quotation. The cargo is as follows: 2000MT 100/120/150T Beans from Erzincan. We can handle all EXW or FOB and are happy to assist you. Your FOB Istanbul is US$1,270.00. We will send the Proforma Invoice and a quote with your FOB terms in the next 2 days. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Best, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Dear Sam, We have received your FOB terms and I am happy to send you a formal quote. Our price is US$1,270.00 per ton FOB. We can also provide you with the invoice in FOB Istanbul. We will need an advance payment of 50% before delivery for all of our services (export, clearing, loading, trucking, insurance and all international documentation). I understand that we need your FOB at the latest on March 24th, 2014. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Mike, Thank you for the quote. Here is the FOB to use in the invoice. Please let me know when the first installment is due. Best, Sam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: I've been following your latest ships in the Suez Canal. I'm interested in chartering a Sevan semi to load 1,000MT of maize pellets to Sri Lanka. Could we arrange a letter of credit, or are there any restrictions to your services? Thanks, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: Following up on your recent email, I have secured a berth for the following week. As soon as I receive confirmation of arrival and Master time, I will begin preparing the chartering documents and the COC's. I'll be in touch. Best regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body:
Following up on my previous email, I confirm that we are booked for the above date. Please confirm that you have provided the necessary documents and that everything is in order. We need these documents as soon as possible to secure a bank letter of credit to Sri Lanka. Please see my details below:

Address 1
Address 2
Phone 1
Phone 2
Email 1
Email 2
Best regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: Thanks for the reference cargo. We are still working on your proposed rates and freight agreement. We will be in touch when we have more information for you. Best regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: We have been in touch with the owner of our third-party provider. They have confirmed the correct quantity but are unsure if we will be able to load the cargo. It seems they are finding it difficult to secure both the cargo and the berth. We will keep you updated. Best regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: Dear Mike, I refer to your request for 15,000MT of PDI maize. Unfortunately, we are unable to assist you with this offer. We have followed up with our third-party provider, and they are able to meet the quantity but not the deadline of 11.09.2008. We were unable to meet the deadline due to logistical constraints. Best regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sevan Semi to Load Maize Pellets
email_chain.body: Dear Mike, I refer to your enquiry regarding 15,000MT of PDI maize and would like to thank you for your patience. We are now planning to load your grain on 2 vessels over a two-week period. Further details will follow. Best regards, P.O.

With best regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Shipment from Hamburg to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Early Morning Call
email_chain.body:
Harry,

This is the second time in the past three months I've called your apartment at 7:20AM, on a Sunday morning! You wouldn't happen to have a napkin with a phone number written on it, would you? I've called your cell 30 times and your voicemail is on 'do not accept calls' mode. I hope you're home next Sunday because I know you enjoy looking at your new home!

Cheers,
Neighbor

email_chain.subject: Great Meeting You!
email_chain.body:
Mrs. Wilkinson,

It's so nice to meet you in person, finally! I really enjoyed your story about vacationing in Puerto Rico. What a colorful time you must have had! I hope your trip was uneventful. Take care and call me soon. I really enjoyed talking with you!

Best,
Friend

email_chain.subject: Long Time No Speak
email_chain.body:
Harry,

Can you believe it's been two weeks since we last spoke? I really think I need to catch up with you soon.

Best,
Friend

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of Offer for 8-Charter Contract
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on 8-Chartered Crewed Barges Proposal

email_chain.body:

See you in London then! Good luck with the review. It's very tough, and you need to be on top of your game to succeed.

Ciao,
Luca Torres

email_chain.subject: Language Support and Email Marketing
email_chain.body:
Hi Zoë,

Regarding our project, we need to address a few key points:

2.3 Language support:
This may well be a problem if our mentor can’t speak the required language. Which countries have strong English abilities? What are the types of documents required? How does one judge what is needed? How would the contact address information change for each country? What is the advantage of searching for language schools?

We are going to assume that our mentor is fluent in English, and we will use Google Translator to help us communicate with them. We may ask for an English native speaker to review our work.

2.4 Email marketing and communication:
We must ensure that we do not break any regulations. The GDPR is one of the first of the many regulations that will affect any company.

Ciao,
Luca Torres

Em

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Yangon to Phnom Penh
email_chain.body:

We have 3,200MT of rice ready for shipment from Yangon to Phnom Penh. Could you please advise the freight charges and also your demurrage policy?

Many thanks,
Carla

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Yangon to Phnom Penh
email_chain.body:
Dear Carla,

I hope you are doing well. We do handle full loads from Yangon to Phnom Penh. To provide you with the best offer, could you kindly provide me with the following details:

1. Origin Port - Yangon
2. Destination Port - Phnom Penh
3. Arrival date - As soon as possible
4. FCL or LCL
5. Gross/Metric weight
6. Name of the goods
7. N.V.W. If the cargo is a mix of different commodities, please mention the breakdown of each commodity
8. Ocean container or flat rack if required
9. Need carriage of containers on/off /regional lift etc.
10. Shipment confirmation date
11. Name, Address, Telephone Number of the Shipper & Consignee
12. Flight details, Transit VISA. Carriage

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Mr. Rogers

email_chain.subject: Offer for Ammonia Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Please see below an offer for the shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico. Could you kindly confirm your port and quantity requirements to provide us with a further breakdown of your offer requirements?

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Discharge Port
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Could you please confirm your port of discharge in Veracruz, Mexico?

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Ammonia Test Results
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

Sorry for the delay, but we have just completed the sample test for your verification. Our lab tested an average sample of 10 kilograms, which is approximately equal to 10% of the sample size of the cargo. We tested by digesting 50 grams of each sample for 10 minutes, digesting 100 grams of each sample for 5 minutes, and testing 50 grams of each sample for 10 minutes. The best test results from these 3 tests were used to determine the results. The resulting pH reading for the test is _______.

Results for the test indicate that the ammonia content is within acceptable limits for ammonia acceptance.

Kindly acknowledge the receipt of the same for your verification and record.

Thank you,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Ammonia Test Results
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Your verification of the ammonia test results is hereby acknowledged for your record.

Regarding your ammonia shipment, we have now agreed to an FOB sale. Kindly acknowledge our FOB sale for your record. We have also sent you an offer of sale for a quantity of 5,000MT of ammonia via shipping carrier Alstec. If you accept our offer, please use Email <Email 5> to confirm our FOB sale, and Email <Email 6> to confirm the acceptance of our shipping carrier offer.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of FOB Sale
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

We accept the FOB sale of your shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico. Our FOB sale has been recorded as follows:

Supplier: Robert Pitts
Purchase order number: 000133709-01
Quantity: 5000MT
Item: Ammonia (NH3)
Port of Export: Port Newark, New Jersey
Port of Discharge: Veracruz, Mexico
Cargo Arrival date: Jan 1, 2008
FOB price: US$ 300,000

Please confirm receipt of this email for your record.

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of Shipping Carrier
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

We accept the Alstec shipment of your shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico.

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.body:

Don't forget to keep up with your self-care routine and take breaks when you need them. These strategies can really help you stay focused and energized throughout the day. Let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you.

email_chain.body:

Best Regards,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Daesan Loading on Apr. 28
email_chain.body:

Thank you for your estimate. I’m pleased to hear that we will be able to offload our light load of 4,000 MT. We have other charter parties that require another load. We can proceed to Daesan on Apr. 28 to load 10,000 MT. Thank you for your assistance.

Best Regards,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Test Equipment for Pico Interlink Installation
email_chain.body:

Could you please review the recent forwarded message regarding the required test equipment for installation at the Pico Interlink? Additionally, could you coordinate with the engineer to confirm if there are any changes in the requirements?

Thanks,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Test Equipment for Pico Interlink Installation
email_chain.body:
Dear Rob,

I have checked with our reference, M/s VIRES, INC. The SF-15 photo tester requires a software license, which costs approximately $18,000 to $20,000 (USD). This license must be purchased when you intend to use the photo tester. Please contact M/s VIRES, INC. directly to discuss the lease agreement for the photo tester.

We are awaiting your confirmation on the final Pico Interlink requirements and whether any additional accessories will be needed to fully utilize the SF-15 photo tester. While we are prepared to provide all the equipment we have on hand, you are also welcome to supply your own equipment. This would allow us to avoid involvement in billing and logistics.

As mentioned in our previous email, we will await your response before proceeding further.

Best regards,
Ms. Romain

New Zealand Oat Supplier Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Steel Coils Supply
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Smith,

I am a Senior Purchaser with Superkoala Steel, and we are in need of a supplier capable of supplying steel coils from China to Spain in bulk. Could you confirm if your company has the capability to service this requirement? Additionally, what would be your quote for the same?

Looking forward to your response.

Cheers,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Supply
email_chain.body:
Dear Aaron,

Thank you very much for your interest. I can assure you that our company will be able to meet your requirement as we have extensive experience in exporting to European countries. We are a long-established business registered under the Indian Company Act and specialize in exporting Steel Re-rolls.

Our company operates a modern state-of-the-art plant equipped with a 100-tonne capacity meltshop, a quality control laboratory, a high-efficiency submerged arc furnace with automatic control, a hot rolling plant, and cold rolling and coil/coke drive services. We are committed to supplying only superior quality steel to our customers.

In addition to steel coils, we can also supply Iron Ore and Scrap. Our facility can produce up to 3,000 tonnes of Hot Rolled Coils annually for the international market. All our products are 100% Made in India. Currently, we have the capacity to produce 1,000 tonnes of Hot Rolled Coils.

Please let me know if you require any further details or would like to discuss pricing.

Best regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Supply
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your detailed response. I look forward to hearing back from you with a formal quote very soon.

Best regards,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Incident Report - Intern Termination
email_chain.body:
Lina,

This email is regarding an incident that occurred at work today. The new female intern under your supervision was terminated. To summarize, she arrived late this morning, complained about not having anyone to work with, and generally expressed dissatisfaction with everything. I explained that I had already met with the rest of the team and assigned them to projects. She then insisted that she could solve all these problems because she was very smart. I offered her the option to go home and think about it, but she continued to insist on her capability. Eventually, she left to go home, which was for the best.

Best regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Incident Report - Intern Termination
email_chain.body:
Manager,

Thank you for informing me about the situation. There is something you need to know about me. Although it’s unusual for me to use my first name in professional communications, I believe it’s important to address this matter personally.

Best regards,
Lina

SKM/Methanol Division
JX Nippon Oil & Energy Corp.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 1,600MT of 36% Urea to Lagos
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ghosh,

I need to send out 1,600MT of 36% urea to Lagos. What’s your quickest route? I’d prefer to use one of your DP2 vessels, but am willing to try your DP1 as well. Are there any CMA CGM ships passing by Lagos this weekend?

Hope to hear from you soon,
Narun

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 1,600MT of 36% Urea to Lagos
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email and inquiry.

It is difficult to serve one destination, like Lagos, with one service, since there are a number of ports in Africa, some with different schedules and times. Depending on where your cargo is in India, you may or may not have a vessel coming into the subcontinent to Lagos. You can check the arrival times for Lagos on our website by using the Port Schedule Search Tool here: https://cma-cgmschedules.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/

CMA CGM offers a variety of services which vary by region, sometimes even by port. If you want to know what services are available in Lagos, you can check out our Schedule Explorer website and use the same search tool mentioned above to find the service schedules for Lagos: https://www.schec-cma-cgm.com/schec/node/en/lagos

For other ports on the African coast, please let me know if you need further assistance.

Best regards,
Mr. Ghosh

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Container Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Manager, Please could you let me know your availability for April 5th on a 40ft container (HH class) to Indonesia from Rotterdam? We have a 300MT of antifreeze to ship. The FOB price is $500,000, plus the container fee. Please let me know as soon as possible. Best Regards, Pete

email_chain.body:
Hello Madame Gasparian,

Are you available on Tuesday to charter a 3,000MT containership for 300 days? The vessel will depart on Saturday and arrive on Thursday, sailing between Piraeus and Hamburg.

Please confirm as soon as possible.

Yours truly,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Updated Program for 300 Days Container Ship
email_chain.body:
Dear Madame Gasparian,

Hello! Here is the updated program for the 300-day container ship between Piraeus and Hamburg, which I have also sent via WhatsApp.

I look forward to working with you in close cooperation and dialogue on this and other projects.

Sincerely,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Office Closure and Appointment Update
email_chain.body:

I apologize for the absence of appointments on our calendar for next week. This week, we will be closing on Monday so that all our colleagues can take the week off. We look forward to being in contact with you soon.

Best regards,

I was hoping to find a good transport deal from Thailand to Malaysia to Hong Kong, but I see you've sold the berths. Can you suggest some carriers?

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Past Due Account Payment Plan
email_chain.body: Ms. Sanders, I am a manager for Brownhead and Williams accounting firm. I am writing you today regarding your past due account. We would be more than happy to help you in setting up a payment plan for your past due account. We are ready to work with you on a payment plan that will suit your needs. We have asked our friendly billing clerk, Ms. Brooks, to call you to set up an appointment to discuss your situation. Our telephone number is (555) 555-5555 and you may reach Ms. Brooks at (555) 555-5556. Please do not hesitate to contact her if you have any questions regarding your account. Sincerely, Stan Wilson

email_chain.subject: Past Due Vehicle Payments
email_chain.body: Ms. Harmon, I am a sales representative for Ford Motors. I am writing you today regarding your past due vehicle payments. We would be more than happy to work with you on a payment plan that will suit your needs. Our finance department is ready to help you set up a payment plan that will meet your needs. We have asked our billing department to call you to set up an appointment to discuss your situation. You may reach Ms. Green at (555) 555-5555. Please do not hesitate to contact her if you have any questions regarding your past due account. Sincerely, Brooke Davis
