email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Rob,

Just wanted to check in regarding our last communication. I understand there have been some issues getting that cargo through Greek Customs.

Could you please explain the situation to me and provide your plans to deliver the product to Broker Inc?

Thank you!

Max

email_chain.subject: Update on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Rob,

Since our last communication, the shipping container was unloaded in Thessaloniki, Greece. It has been at the port for the last three weeks, awaiting clearance through Customs. I have been in touch with my local representative daily to see if the product can be cleared. For now, there is no update. I am worried that our clients are going to be concerned about the delay.

Could you please provide me with an estimated timeline so we can inform my client about when the product can be released?

Thank you!

Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

Unfortunately, I was not aware of the situation with Customs. I will get in touch with the local representative to find out what is going on. I will keep you updated as soon as I have more information.

Best regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

Thanks for the update. I've been in touch with the local representative in Greece. The container has been unloading for two weeks now. There is a lot of back and forth between the shipper, the shipper's agent in Greece, and the local Customs agent. In the meantime, the shipper had to pay several fines to Greek Customs.

Currently, the container is at the port in Thessaloniki, waiting for the shipper to send a new bill of lading. Once the bill of lading is sent, the container will be cleared and sent to Broker Inc.

I've attached a couple of photos to give you an idea of the situation. As soon as the bill of lading is approved, I'll let you know and send you more photos of the process.

Best regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

I've attached a photo of the container clearing through Greek Customs. Once I receive the bill of lading, I will send you the next pictures of the container as it is being loaded onto a transport truck. We hope to have the container at the shipper's warehouse within two weeks.

Best regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

The container is finally at the shipper's warehouse in California. Unfortunately, there are still problems with it getting to the shipping agent in San Francisco. The forwarding agent tried to take it there but was told by the freight broker that it had already been invoiced to them. The forwarding agent was told to contact the broker directly and inform them of the issue.

After further research, it turns out that the broker had previously issued another bill of lading to the shipper. They sent an agent to resolve the matter.

Best regards,
Rob

Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of Concrete Blocks

Thank you for your email.

Kindly be informed that Blue Oar Maritime Ltd. can handle the cargo for you. The minimum quantity we can handle is 1 block.

Please advise when your friend can proceed with the booking and the estimated delivery dates to Zurich.

If you have any questions, kindly do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Blue Oar Maritime Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about DAP Rate and Cargo Insurance
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Cho,

We’d like to know a DAP rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro. The cargo is naphthalene, and we’re open to any vessel type. Additionally, we’d like to know more about your cargo insurance coverage.

Thanks,
Jenna Rowe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about DAP Rate and Cargo Insurance
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Rowe,

Thank you for your email. We have a 13,250 DAP rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro for naphthalene using an E-Type vessel. Our maximum cargo insurance coverage is USD 500 per thousand tons or 10% of the insured value, whichever is greater.

Would you like to proceed with this booking? If so, please kindly provide your cargo loading information as soon as possible.

Thank you and have a nice day.

Regards,
Hyeon-Jong Cho, Manager
[email protected]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about DAP Rate and Cargo Insurance
email_chain.body:
Hello, Hyeon-Jong,

Thank you for your email. To proceed, we would prefer to review your full Terms and Conditions. This will help us determine how to move forward. Our terms of delivery are EXW.

Best regards,
Jenna Rowe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about DAP Rate and Cargo Insurance
email_chain.body:
Hello, Jenna,

Thank you for your email. Our Terms and Conditions were updated on the 2nd. Please be informed that the carrier will be designated for the RAK shipping services from Busan to Rio de Janeiro.

Sincerely yours,
Hyeon-Jong Cho, Manager
[email protected]

email_chain.body:

Thank you for your time and attention.

Please find attached your contract.

Best regards,
Joe

<Contract.pdf>

email_chain.subject: Re: Special Order of Asphalt from Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bowles,

I’m afraid the price increase was a mistake. The original price was just an estimate. Would you kindly update your contract to reflect the $7,000 amount?

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Best regards,
Alisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Special Order of Asphalt from Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:

Our underwriter in Amsterdam got back to us after your phone call. They are reluctant to insure your shipment.

Best regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Special Order of Asphalt from Rotterdam to Newark

Mr. Bowles,

For the record, your proposal is back in my inbox, and I will be ready to accept your quote in 24 hours. Yes, $7,000 is fine.

Please advise when you are ready. I am happy to provide any additional information you need.

Best regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Request for Loading Dates and Dispatch Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Shaikh,

We have received a 5,600MT shipment of adhesives from Antwerp to Narva and a 3,600MT shipment of yeast from Fos-sur-Mer to Antwerp. Could you please confirm your earliest loading date for both shipments? Additionally, do you offer a standard dispatch rate if we finish loading early?

Looking forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Loading Dates and Dispatch Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

Thank you for your enquiry and for considering us for your shipping needs. Both shipments were off-loaded on 3rd February from the vessel BARGE BRIGADE. We operate under port-to-port (rORL) terms. Unfortunately, we do not offer a standard dispatch rate. However, we would need to know your earliest loading date to provide you with a shipping quotation. Please contact us with this information at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your attention.

Yours faithfully,
International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH
Tel. +49 221 84 07-40
http://www.ifc-jade.de/en/index.php?id=63

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Updated Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
Dear Shaikh,

I am sending you an invoice for $4,500 for services rendered in 2011. I will forward you an updated letter of credit for the payment. Due to the company's current financial situation, I have requested a further discount. I hope the courier will arrive with the updated letter of credit in the coming week.

Thank you,
Sincerely,
Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice and Updated Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

I am in receipt of your correspondence dated the 21st and 30th of April, and I kindly refer to our email exchanges from the 15th, 19th, and 21st of February. Regarding your request for a discount, we understand that you asked for a 5% discount on the amount agreed on the 14th of February, with the balance of $7,600.00 to be paid in Swiss francs to our bank account on that date. Please note that we received $3,200.00 in Swiss francs in our account on the 14th of March 2011, and we were unable to apply the 5% discount as the total amount received did not match the agreed sum.

Thank you for your understanding.

Yours faithfully,
International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH

email_chain.subject: Feedback on 'Stairway to Heaven'
email_chain.body: Good afternoon, I wanted to discuss the song 'Stairway to Heaven' that you recommended. I find the lyrics quite confusing—stairways can't sing! Do you even understand this song? It seems out of touch with modern tastes. I'm frustrated and just want to enjoy life without overthinking things. Your email was quite harsh, and I feel I deserve another chance. Don't forget, I'm still single! Maybe it's time for you to look for a new romantic partner.

email_chain.subject: Re: Feedback on 'Stairway to Heaven'
email_chain.body: John, you need to focus on your job and stay positive. Stop shouting and screaming at people—it’s disruptive. People need to stay informed and awake to what’s happening in the world. It’s important to keep them engaged and inspired. I’m sorry you saw a glimpse of my private life, but at least you know more about me now. I think we should spend more time together. Please trust me—I’m not someone who wants to cause trouble or be misunderstood. Thank you for your patience, and I hope you’ll read this email again soon. If you want to know more about me, let’s talk.

email_chain.subject: Re: Feedback on 'Stairway to Heaven'
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. I was just checking my spam folder because I hadn’t received a response. I read it now, but I don’t understand why you’re suggesting I delete my account. I have every right to voice my concerns about a product or service. I want to be heard and to express my frustrations. Please don’t delete my account. If you still want to part ways, at least send me a quick reply explaining why.

email_chain.body:
Hi Joe,

Understood. I’ll coordinate with the Shipmate to arrange the transport of the 5,000MT from Sydney to the vessel. I’ll keep you updated on the progress.

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Yellow Corn
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Matias,

We would like to ship 1,200MT of yellow corn from Halifax to Larnaca. Could you please provide your laycan slots and the applicable charges?

Best regards,
Richard Thakur

email_chain.subject: Confirmation for Shipping Yellow Corn
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Thakur,

Could you please confirm your availability to ship yellow corn from Halifax to Delhi on 9th October? We would like to have your reference for the original sample and one to receive. Additionally, we need the packing list for the yellow corn in 25MT x 40' containers.

Best Regards,
Dennis Tabeo

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote on Alfa Aloe Extract
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

Would you please send a quote for a 20FT container of Alfa Aloe extract from Pakistan to South Korea? We are glad to provide the original sample and purchase order.

Thanks.
Regards,
Broomo Choo

email_chain.subject: Offer for Orange Liquor Product
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Choo,

As per our conversation, I am pleased to offer you 10 MT of our orange liquor product (ORL) at the rate of 22 USD/MT FOB Karachi.

Best regards,
Marc Matias

email_chain.subject: Introduction to RGD Foods
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I would like to introduce you to our company, RGD FOODS, which offers nutritional ingredients and food processing solutions. We specialize in wheat germ, malt extract, soy protein, and more. We are looking to partner with reliable suppliers to provide high-quality ingredients for our products. Our company is looking for a reliable, experienced supplier who can provide high-quality ingredients on a regular basis. We are also looking for a supplier who can provide reliable transportation services, along with a strong commitment to customer service and quality.

Best regards,
Rich

Rich

Matias Industries is one of the largest suppliers of dehydrated foods in Canada. We have been in business for over 30 years and have built a reputation for providing high-quality products and excellent customer service. Our team of experts is dedicated to finding the best suppliers and ensuring that our customers receive the highest quality products.

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction to RGD Foods
email_chain.body:
Hi Rich,

Thanks for reaching out to us. We have just returned to Pakistan and will be in touch soon.

Best regards,
Marc Matias

email_chain.subject: Request for Product Information
email_chain.body:
Hey Rich,

Thanks for your quick response. Could you please provide more information about your products, such as how long they take to ship, any delays, and other information? I am also interested in receiving your quote for the FOB port.

Thank you!
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Product Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Jan,

We can provide you with an FOB quote for any container size and are happy to discuss other requirements. The delivery time for our products is usually 7-10 days, but we can sometimes provide shorter delivery times. We have a team of experts who can help with any additional requirements or concerns you may have.

Please feel free to contact me for more information or to place an order.

Best regards,
Rich

email_chain.subject: Unknown
email_chain.body: Hello

labels.commodity: Yellow Corn, Alfa Aloe Extract, Orange Liquor

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. Ballard,

Can you help us fill a few empty slots on a 180-day journey from Singapore to Cape Town? We’ve got 80,000T of heavy oil and 150,000T of fertilizer that would be a good fit, and we have a COTI discount that we’re willing to offer.

Thanks,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hey Devon,

I’m pleased to say that it sounds like we have a solution to all your problems. We will offer you our full 180-day turnaround and COTI discount. However, we don’t have any empty slots in our calendar right now, but we’ve got 3 available in 60 days.

If you’re interested, can you send us your pricing and shipping instructions?

Thanks,
Ms. Ballard

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hey Devon,

It looks like we can accommodate you in our next 30-day slot. We’ll have some bulk and finished oil going through for that journey, so we’re not going to be able to offer the COTI discount. The price will be $40 per ton, and the loading port will be Houston. Can you send me your forwarding instructions by 7 am?

Thanks,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Devon,

It was just a testing email, but we don't have any free slots for the next 2 weeks. However, we would love to take care of you on our next available 60-day spot. We will be taking bulk oil and finished oil on this journey. Our price per ton will be $40. We can deliver in Houston or Antwerp if you have no objections. Can you let us know by 7 am this morning if you can support our 60-day slot?

Thanks,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hey Mark,

No need to worry about testing emails - I just wanted to clarify the proposal you sent on our next available 60-day trip. It sounds perfect. Thanks for all your help.

Best,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We’re interested in a load of naphtha from Kalamazoo to Philadelphia. Let us know if you can quote a rate and deliver a first shipment on 5/1/2023. We’re also interested in confirming your laycan.

Regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Caroline,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can provide a detailed quote for the shipment from Kalamazoo to Philadelphia. Could you please confirm the exact quantity and any specific requirements you have?

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Thank you for getting back to me. May we talk in more detail about our loads to Philadelphia? I’m sorry, but I’m not familiar with Kalamazoo. May we be in touch again once we have some detailed quotes from you?

Kind regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Caroline,

Yes, that's possible. We'll be able to confirm our laycan by the end of this week.

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for that quote. It's quite good, but I'd like a double hop from Philadelphia to Philadelphia.

Kind regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Caroline,

Yes, that's possible. We'll be able to confirm our laycan by the end of this week.

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

This all sounds great. Please let me know as soon as possible.

Thanks a lot,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Naphtha Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Caroline,

I will.

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Saima,

We’ve got a cargo of bitumen 7,200MT out of Sohar. The export cargo is from our account. The loading schedule is on May 14th with a transit time of 10-14 days. Do you think you can still manage it with the latest rate card?

Thanks,
Sarfaraz.

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarfaraz,

Thanks for your email. As per our agreement, you need to submit your L/Cs by the 14th. I would highly recommend submitting them as early as possible. If we receive them by the 14th, we would most likely issue the Bill of Lading for this cargo. If we do not receive L/Cs by the 14th, we will not be able to issue the Bill of Lading.

Best,
Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo Import Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Saima,

We would like to import one bitumen cargo with you as per our MOU.

Note:
- Please send your rate card.
- Please let me know the earliest possible loading dates.

Date of loading: June 15th
D/P 90 Days. Port of loading: Sohar.

Please reply to this email.

Best regards,
Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo Import Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We would be pleased to load your cargo, but would like to wait until we have the details of your project. Your project name will be passed to our business development department, and they will check it with our clients who have the current details on hand. I would also like to look for availability of space with our local charterer.

In the meantime, do you need any help for chartering a ship?

Best regards,
Saima.

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Saima,

We would like to take a bitumen cargo of 25,000MT from Sohar port.

The details are as follows:
1. Document required: Any one of D/P, D/A, D/U, Tri, or Cash.
2. Port of loading: Sohar
3. Port of discharge: Mumbai
4. Date of loading: ASAP, so as to dispatch it to Mumbai port before the last week of April
5. Ship’s arrival: Within 8-10 days
6. Disbursement: Cash or D/P
7. Incoterms: EXW

Please reply with the details of the quote for your offer.

Kindly let us know the earliest possible date for the cargo to arrive.

Best regards,
Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Passport and Air Ticket Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Saima,

I need help with managing a passport and air ticket. Could you assist me with this?

Best,
Sam.

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on France Case
email_chain.body:
Hi Saima,

I’m writing to see if you are still on this note. I could not find any email address to get to you directly.

It is about the case of France. They recently asked me some questions. The first was to check our profile and their background.

This second stage of the France case is asking me if I can be helpful in this regard. I am happy to be. Here is what they requested from me:

1. Could you help us with a recommendation of an expatriate? Where would he live? If he lives in Muscat with a small or big family?
2. If he has a wife, can we get some information about her? A recommendation? If she can speak English, that would be helpful.

Best regards,
Sam.

email_chain.subject: Request for Bid on Titanium Transport
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Johnson,

We’re arranging 400T of unmanufactured titanium from Suzhou to Ningbo. Could you give us a bid, and do you have on-board transport coverage under DAP terms?

Thanks,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bid on Titanium Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

Thank you for your email. The transportation cost is 27850 USD, you can have your confirmation letter by email.

Please feel free to contact us at any time if you have any other requirement.

Thank you again,
Mr. Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Update on Titanium Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

I have checked with our clients and they prefer to use our bonded warehouse in Ningbo. So I’m going to arrange 200T in Ningbo for the goods, please check it.

Thanks,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Titanium Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

I found the container price with 28% DDP. The price is 1190/ton. 400t x 1190 USD/ton = 476800 USD.

Please check it, and I will send the DDP cost calculation to you.

Best regards,
Mr. Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Copper Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Françoise,

Thank you for shipping us bulk chemicals from Antwerp to Tangier last week. We would like to buy 5,000MT of copper scrap from the port for April. Please let me know what the cargo and port charge is.

Very best,
Louise

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Copper Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Louise,

Thank you for your inquiry. According to our database, the cargo and port charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000MT for copper scrap. We will ship the copper scrap in April.

Please let me know your FOB price if you would like to order more than 5,000MT of copper scrap.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Copper Scrap Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Olsen,

Thank you for your inquiry. We currently have 2,000MT of copper scrap available for sale. The port and cargo charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000MT. If you are interested, please let me know your FOB price.

Kind regards,
Louise

email_chain.subject: Re: Copper Scrap Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Olsen,

Thank you for your inquiry. We currently have 2,000MT of copper scrap available for sale. The port and cargo charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000MT. If you are interested, please let me know your FOB price.

Kind regards,
Louise

email_chain.subject: Re: Copper Scrap Availability
email_chain.body: Thanks very much. I look forward to doing business with you.

email_chain.subject: Request for Tanker Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

We need a tanker for 1,800MT of olefins from Shanghai to Singapore. Could you confirm your earliest berth availability, and do you typically quote under C&F?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Tanker Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

I noticed that you did not respond to my email regarding the 1,800MT delivery listed on your website. Could you please confirm your earliest berth availability for Singapore? Also, do you typically quote under C&F?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Tanker Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Sorry about the delay - my earlier response was mistakenly deleted by the system. I'm replying now with our earliest availability for your 1,800MT delivery. The earliest berth availability we have is June 11 - 12, so your tankers need to be in Singapore by June 7 to meet this schedule. I apologize for the inconvenience.

Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: New Tanker Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Neal,

I just secured a new tanker as I accepted a 2,000MT delivery from China to Singapore. Do you have any early availability in Singapore? I would like to get a quote for June 10.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 15,000MT Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Please confirm your rate for 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg. Will your vessel be available next week for loading? Could you confirm your suggested laycan? What is your average daily demurrage rate, and can this be lowered if loading is expedited?

Thank you,
Saul

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 15,000MT Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Saul,

Glad to hear from you! Let me confirm our price for 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg: $1.22/bbl FOB. As for the vessel, yes, our vessel, Agape, will be available next week for loading. The vessel will reach Hamburg around 25th October. The laycan is from 15th October. As for the demurrage, we normally charge a daily demurrage rate of $2,000. This can be lowered if we're expedited for loading. Could you please let me know if you would like to proceed with this transaction?

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 15,000MT Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Thank you for the confirmation on the price! Regarding the vessel, we will try our best to expedite the loading. We would also like to clarify the following: You mentioned in your last email that your demurrage rate is $2,000 per day. Could you confirm if this rate is negotiable if we manage to expedite the loading process?

Best regards,
Saul

email_chain.subject: Request for Cost Calculation - Cargo from Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bae,

I have a 28,000MT order for cargo from Singapore to China. I’m not sure what the best schedule will be, but let’s pick a port for loading and sail for 10 days to see what it comes up with. Could you calculate the cost of the voyage under FOB terms?

Best regards,
Ken

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cost Calculation - Cargo from Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your message about the cargo shipment. Please note that the vessel can pick up from Singapore to take the order to China at a very competitive rate. We do have a flexible voyage schedule, so the date is not a constraint. If the cargo is in South Singapore, we are happy to prepare the vessel to sail on the same day. Kindly advise us your choices for the ports.

Best regards,
Mr. Bae

email_chain.subject: Request for Cost Calculation - Cargo from Singapore to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Mr. Bae,

Our customer is asking us to quote for transportation of 2,400MT from Singapore to Amsterdam. She would like to leave Singapore in two weeks and arrive in Amsterdam within a month. Kindly give me an idea about the cost to transport the cargo.

Best regards,
Ken

email_chain.subject: Advice from shipmates
email_chain.body:
Dear friends,

I have a fresh request for 7,700MT of coal from New York to Sydney, urgently. My vessel is a 1998-built LNG carrier, and I need a friend to advise me which is a better market in this complex situation - Santos or Gogoro?

Hugs,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email. We can manage Santos. My ship is a 2002-built tanker and we can take just around 7,000MT of cargo from your side. I have just got permission to start loading at Santos. As Santos is a close distance to my ship, I will most likely go for Santos.

Thank you again for your advice.

Best regards,
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Advice from Gogoro
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email. I need your help once again as I had a request for 7,000MT from Santos and I informed my good friend Francisco about it and I got advice from him. The distance of Santos to my ship is pretty much, so I prefer Santos.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Pedro

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Chartering Request for Two 6,000MT Ro/Ro Carriers
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

We have a last-minute project that requires two 6,000MT Ro/Ro carriers in approximately two weeks. Are you able to arrange this?

Kind regards,
Deirdre

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Chartering Request for Two 6,000MT Ro/Ro Carriers
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

I just received your message. Good news—I have two ships available. They are currently loaded with their last cargo, but unloading and preparing them for your cargo should not take long. Both ships are ready in Los Angeles. Could you provide a price to cover expenses and any potential costs of delay?

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Meeting to Discuss Chartering Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

My co-chairman has returned from China, and I now have more details to share regarding this project. Given the importance of this deal, I would like to work with you directly. John is unavailable for the next two days, so it might be a good idea for us to meet. Could you please suggest a time and place?

Regards,
Deirdre

email_chain.subject: Steel Shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We have a load of steel scheduled for shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian. Could you please provide your earliest laycan for loading?

Let us know if you have any questions!

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Apologies for missing your message last week. We are currently on the west coast and do not have a representative here. Would you mind calling me at the number below? I can answer all your questions regarding the ship's crew.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your call yesterday. I have forwarded your information to our east coast contact. We are currently waiting for an offer on your steel from an east coast mill. I will keep you updated as soon as we have a final decision.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I am sorry to hear about your brother's condition. I hope he gets well soon. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrea,

Hello. This is Elvin from Lewis Commodities. We have been trying to arrange a vessel from New Orleans to Kuwait at the end of this month. It has to lift a cargo of copra and beans. Could you please let me know your availability?

Many thanks,
Elvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Elvin,

This is Ashley from Lewis Commodities. I was asking Andrea about the availability of your ship from New Orleans to Kuwait at the end of this month. Her reply is:

"Dear Ashley,

My ship can sail on the 31st of this month. I will arrange for the booking of your cargo after you have confirmed with your principal. Please do reply to my e-mail if you are interested in loading on my ship.

Regards,
Andrea"

Many thanks,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrea,

The cargo booking with you will be confirmed once we get the load of copra and beans from our principal. We have already booked the vessel. We will also send you the list of copra and beans with their quantity.

Thank you,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Supplier for Soybean Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Juan,

Could you please suggest a supplier for 12,500MT of soybean from Jeddah to Tripoli?

Thanks so much!

Best,
Tamara

email_chain.subject: Request for Soybean Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Tamara,

I need a quote for 50,000MT of soybean with C&F Jeddah to Tripoli for shipment on 25/05/22.

Thank you for your offer!

Regards,
Sofiane

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Soybean Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Tamara,

We will be happy to provide you with 12,500MT of soybean under FOB Jeddah on 10 April for $545 per ton.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Reply to Soybean Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofiane,

We regret to inform you that we cannot provide the quote you requested as this cargo will not be available until May.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Reply to Soybean Supplier Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Tamara,

We regret that we cannot provide you with a quote at this time due to the unstable market.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Blanket Purchase Order Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Could you issue me a purchase order for 4,000MT of methanol from Grimsby to Ulsan? Also, are you able to ship 1,800MT of xylene from Piraeus to Halifax this weekend?

Please reply ASAP.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Mgmt.

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of Methanol Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

I am writing to confirm the purchase order of 4,000MT of methanol that you issued to me on December 1st for delivery on or before January 5th, 2018. The order has now been canceled. If you issue me another purchase order within the next two weeks, I would like to cancel this order in favor of the new one.

I am looking forward to doing business with you again in the near future.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Mgmt.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Xylene Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for the purchase order that you issued to me on December 10th for 2,000MT of xylene. The order was successfully received and my staff has already started preparing the delivery contract. Please send me your preferred form of contract via email by December 16th.

I am looking forward to doing business with you again in the near future.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Mgmt.

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement of Xylene Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for sending us the purchase order for 1,200MT of xylene from Piraeus. We will send you the details of the shipment by email as soon as the truck has reached our warehouse in Halifax.

I am looking forward to doing business with you again in the near future.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Mgmt.

email_chain.subject: Greetings
email_chain.body: Hi, I hope this message finds you well. Sincerely, Sender1

email_chain.subject: Re: Greetings
email_chain.body: You are a wonderful person. Please don't change! Yours, Recipient1

email_chain.subject: Hello
email_chain.body: Hi. Your friends here, including many people, are doing well.

email_chain.subject: Re: Hello
email_chain.body: I am writing to thank you for helping me. I know that you worked hard for this, and it greatly helped me. Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Great Job
email_chain.body: You are doing an excellent job in this area. Thanks to you, this work, this place, these people, this program, this campaign, this success, and this situation are all better.

email_chain.subject: Re: Great Job
email_chain.body: The weather is cold. Your friend, Recipient3

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated Soybean Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Zimmermann,

We are planning to send 2,000MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo. Could you provide me with an updated quote?

Many thanks,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Revised Soybean Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

It would be more efficient to send 1,000MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo. This adjustment would make handling easier and save you 10,000 British pounds based on the current offer.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

Could you clarify how you arrived at the revised offer? Did you simply adjust the quantity, or were there other factors involved?

Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Explanation of Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

I adjusted the price based on the reduced quantity. Additionally, I recommend including a statement in your communication: 'We can't send 2,000MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo.'

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Deleting an Email
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

How do I delete an email from my inbox? I want to remove my previous message to you regarding the offer.

Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Deleting an Email
email_chain.body:
Hi Shelly,

There isn't a straightforward way to delete emails. You need to open the message, select the delete option, and confirm the deletion.

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Deleting an Email
email_chain.body:
Dear Erik,

I think I understand now. I will proceed with deleting the message. Thank you for your help.

Thanks,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Offer Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

Thank you for the reminder. I have resent the offer for your review.

Regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Finalizing the Price
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

Do you think we can finalize the price now?

Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing the Price
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

The initial offer is acceptable. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fee Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Morning Mr. Jones,

Could you confirm whether your vessel can carry 6,500MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland? Also, I notice you've been quoted a $2,500 pilotage fee from Tsukaji to Tokyo. This is below the usual charge of $2,750. Could you provide a breakdown of the charges for Tsukaji so I can verify?

Thanks,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fee Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Susan,

Thank you for your message. Unfortunately, my vessel cannot carry 6,500MT. Regarding the pilotage fee, the quote of $2,500 from Tsukaji is based on the vessel's I.P. (Initial Port). I cannot provide further details on the breakdown of this fee.

Additionally, the cargo would need to be switched from Osaka due to port capacity constraints. Osaka is the largest port in Japan, but there are other significant ports in the Kansai area, such as Hiroshima and Kobe. Switching ports would incur additional costs, and the original quote was contingent on Osaka being the discharge port.

Regards,
Mr. Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fee Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jones,

As previously mentioned, the vessel cannot carry 6,500MT. Could you please provide a breakdown of the pilotage fees? I have contacted the port of Osaka regarding the discharge port and congestion issues. They are currently unable to provide a timeline for berth availability due to high cargo volumes. I will follow up with the relevant operator and update you as soon as I have more information.

Kind regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Port Congestion and Pilotage Fees
email_chain.body:
Morning Susan,

Could you please provide an update on the port of discharge and congestion issues in Osaka? I am awaiting feedback from the operators, but it seems they are overwhelmed with cargo this year. Additionally, could you share a breakdown of the pilotage fees? I need this information to proceed.

Thanks,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Shipment from Philadelphia to Vado - Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark,

Could you please confirm your available slots for shipment from Philadelphia to Vado? Additionally, can you confirm the rate if draft restrictions are an issue?

Thank you,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Philadelphia to Vado - Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Tony,

Please refer to the attached document for rate details. If you need any further assistance with this shipment, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you,
On behalf of ALLEGHENY FREIGHT CORPORATION,
Thomas, Jan

email_chain.subject: Rate Options for Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Below is a list of rate options. Please provide me with the option which best meets your needs.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

Thank you,
On behalf of TAHRIR SHIPPING,
K.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Philadelphia to Vado - Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Thank you for the rate details. Could you please confirm the following:
1) Your rate.
2) Draft restrictions.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Request for Container Loading
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Jones,

My name is Phil Gellman, and I am the shipping manager at Nuvista Logistics. We are interested in loading the following containers:

- 5 x 40HC dry (Loaded in GB, Gothenburg)
- 3 x 40HC dry (Loaded in GB, Gothenburg)
- 10 x 20GP dry (Loaded in GB, Gothenburg)

Please let me know if there are any slot issues and how soon we could load.

Many thanks,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Container Loading
email_chain.body:
Hi Phil,

Regarding your request for container cargo, it will not be possible for us to accept your offer at this time, as we have another supplier booked. We will contact you when we have a suitable offer for you.

We appreciate your understanding.

Best regards,
Ralph

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Shipment of 5 x 40HCs
email_chain.body:
Dear Ralph,

This is a reminder regarding the shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg for your company. We are ready to move these containers as soon as you confirm the booking.

Best regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of 5 x 40HCs Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ralph,

The container shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled. Please let me know if we can assist you with another booking.

Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Can you confirm that the shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled?

Many thanks,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

We are still awaiting confirmation that the booking of 5 x 40HCs loaded in Gothenburg has been canceled. Please let us know as soon as possible if this is the case.

Regards,
Micael

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Micael,

I am glad to confirm that the booking of the 5 x 40HCs loaded in Gothenburg has been canceled. We appreciate your support.

Many thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Can you confirm that the booking of 5 x 40HCs loaded in Gothenburg has been canceled? We appreciate your confirmation.

Best regards,
Micael

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Micael,

I am glad to confirm that the booking of the 5 x 40HCs loaded in Gothenburg has been canceled. We appreciate your support.

Many thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking for Steel Mill
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

We’re loading 7,000MT of vegetables from Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa on Monday. Would it be possible to book 500MT of steel mill from Hamburg to Yokohama to release the vessel? Could you also provide an update on the destination demurrage?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking for Steel Mill
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your message. I’ll check on the destination demurrage. The Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade is highly competitive right now, with service owners wanting to keep their vessels busy. Unfortunately, my principal still does not have any available steel mill.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking for Steel Mill
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I just received word from Hamburg. We will still be able to charter a steel mill on the Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade for this Monday. I see one departure from Hamburg and one from Malaga with a possible unloading location in Mombasa. We will reserve one vessel for this delivery.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking for Steel Mill
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

Sorry, my colleague requested this on the way to the meeting. Thanks for your help.

Cheers,
Mika

email_chain.subject: Quote for Port and Craneage
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

I would like to have a quote for port and craneage for 100m3 of petrochemicals in Antwerp.

Best,
Justin

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote for Port and Craneage
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,

Our standard freight rate of EUR 145 is for a standard 10m3 container from Noyers to Antwerp. For this shipment, with a volume of 100 m3, the applicable freight rate would be EUR 17,500.

Please inform me if you require any further information.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for 4,200MT of Shale
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Any chance you can arrange a charter for 4,200MT of shale from Rotterdam to Venice next Thursday?

Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Availability of M/V Lucie
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Did I hear correctly that the M/V Lucie is now available? The Venice shipment is for 4,200MT. Would the M/V Jane be available on either Tuesday or Thursday next week for an estimated load of oil?

Thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of M/V Lucie
email_chain.body:
Good morning Leslie,

The M/V Lucie is a diesel ship with an operational capacity of around 5,000MT. I’m having trouble believing that 4,200MT of diesel could be sourced for your shipment. Given that the M/V Phyllis only loads 4,000MT of diesel and the Phoenix is an even larger vessel, it seems unlikely we can meet the quantity you require.

Many thanks,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of M/V Lucie
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I think our inability to provide the quantity you’re requesting is due to the current supply constraints. However, I’m trying to assist my customer in finding a suitable vessel. I’m not saying it’s impossible to source 4,200MT of diesel, but it’s challenging under the current circumstances.

Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Diesel Supply
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Please don’t misunderstand—I fully understand the supply chain challenges. My goal is to help my customer secure a shipping vessel. I’m not suggesting that sourcing 4,200MT of diesel is impossible, but it may require some flexibility.

Best regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

We’re working on the design of a 50,000MT shipment of corrugated sheets from Qingdao to New York. Do you accept the order as is, or can we adjust the delivery dates?

Yours,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Thanks for your kind offer. We can only pay by EFT. How soon can you transfer the money?

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, but we don't accept EFT payments. However, I would like to remind you that we've already deducted our handling fee.

Yours,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Your email surprises me. We already discussed EFT payments. Please provide our bank details for an EFT transfer and confirm the transaction to proceed.

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, but I'm afraid our bank will charge you a penalty for a premature payment.

Yours,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

This is unusual, and I’m sorry for my impatience. Can you tell me how soon I can expect your response?

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: 50,000MT Corrugated Sheets Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I am sorry for the confusion. We have just been busy with several other clients. I'll send you our bank details for an EFT transfer by Monday. I hope you can help us with this order.

Regards,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Slot - Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Can I have an open slot to ship 8,400 MT of methanol from India to Chile? We can arrive at noon on Sunday, with a laycan by Friday. If this works, could you confirm my details and send a proforma invoice?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Slot - Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thank you for your enquiry. We can accommodate your cargo with a 7-day laycan from India to Chile. We will send a proforma invoice for 1 MT as a sample. If this works for you, please reply with your bank details, and I will send the proforma.

Best regards,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Slot - Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Our bank is IndusInd Bank Mumbai. Please send the proforma with the relevant details.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Slot - Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Unfortunately, IndusInd Bank does not facilitate dollar transfers to India. Your FOB price of $350 is for rupees at INR 72, not dollars. Your 8,400 MT requirement would amount to $3.2 million at current rates. We can ship 300 MT every two weeks over five months. I will convert these prices to rupees and send a proforma invoice shortly.

Best regards,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Please find attached the proforma invoice for 300 MT of methanol at INR 71,249 per MT. The first load will be shipped on 14 November 2018. The subsequent loads are scheduled for 28 November, 12 December, and 26 December 2018. Your total requirement of 8,400 MT is valued at $3.2 million at current rates.

I have also attached a credit application form. Please sign and return it, and I will process a formal letter of credit (LC) for immediate action.

Best regards,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Proforma Invoice and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Thank you for the detailed response. We need to finalize the contract before the weekend, so please ensure all details are confirmed.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Flight Inquiry - Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Wang,

Could you let me know if you have a D3/DD2 flight from Paris to Naples available next week?

Thanks,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Inquiry - Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Wang,

I had confirmed my reservation for our flight on June 8 from Paris to Rome, but I was not able to find any D3/D2 flights from Rome to Naples for that day. Could you check if there are any available flights?

Thanks,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Inquiry - Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

I checked with my colleague, and unfortunately, no D3/D2 flights are available from Rome to Naples on June 8. However, there is an alternate flight available from Florence to Naples. Could you let me know if you are flexible with your original destination?

Thanks,
Patricia

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Inquiry - Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Patricia,

I am not flexible with the destination. Could you check if there are any other D3/D2 flights available from Rome or Florence to Naples?

Thanks,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Inquiry - Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

Sorry for the inconvenience. I checked with my colleague again, but unfortunately, there are no D3/D2 flights available from Rome or Florence to Naples on June 8. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Thanks,
Patricia

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Voyage from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You mentioned you’d consider a voyage from Singapore to Phuket on our services. Could you respond on the following basis? We’ve pulled your recent shipment activity and note you’ve carried a similar quantity in the last month from Vigo to La Rochelle. Would that fit your requirements for the first week in October?

Thanks,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Voyage from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Sorry, we did not get your email. I need more info. Can you tell me:
- How many containers are you considering?
- What's the total weight?
- Does it go from Vigo to La Rochelle, or does it need to start at Vigo and end at La Rochelle?

Please respond ASAP.

Thanks,
Janet

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Voyage from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You stated you need to know if we will be able to handle a 20-foot container for you from Vigo to La Rochelle. Of course, we are able to handle this delivery with total satisfaction to you and your customer in Phuket.

Just give me a call at 555-555-1212 with the weight of your cargo, and we can work out the details.

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Container Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Fred,

You may remember that I asked you about a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle, but that is not what we need. We need a full load 20-foot container from Vigo to Phuket. We need to know if you are interested in this, or not, in the next 24 hours. I want to know if I can depend on you to be available and responsive.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Urgent: 20-foot Container from Vigo to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

Do you remember our phone conversation last week? I called you about the shipment you were helping us set up between Vigo and La Rochelle. Now I need to know about a 20-foot container from Vigo to Phuket.

I do not have much time. Can you tell me if this service is available, or not, in the next 24 hours?

Please call me at 555-555-1212.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Final Decision on Container Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

I’m looking at all my emails to you from the last 2 months. I need to know if you can handle a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle. Please tell me yes or no. I have to choose between you and your competitor. I can send the shipment on Monday or Tuesday.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: HDPE Sheets Target and Market Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Toler,

This month we’ve set a target of 14,500MT of HDPE sheets to your clients. Can you offer us your preferred market rate if we complete 1,000MT early?

We look forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on HDPE Sheets
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Toler,

How are you doing?

I’m just checking if we’re still on track with the HDPE sheets?

I hope you and your family are doing well.

Thanks,
Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on HDPE Sheets
email_chain.body:
Dear Zoe,

Thanks for your concern about the HDPE sheets. We are on track as planned. This month, we’ve already shipped 10,000MT. Don’t worry, we’ll complete our target on time.

Best regards,
Vance Toler

email_chain.subject: Budget for Remaining HDPE Sheets
email_chain.body:
Hey Vance,

We have just reached the target of 10,000MT, and we still have 1,000MT left to send to our clients. Can you set a budget for the remaining 1,000MT before the end of this month?

Thanks,
Marcel

email_chain.subject: Re: Budget for Remaining HDPE Sheets
email_chain.body:
Hi Marcel,

I’ve received your message about the target. The remaining 1,000MT would cost us $8,000. We are very close to completing our target.

I hope this helps.

Best regards,
Vance Toler

email_chain.subject: Re: Budget for Remaining HDPE Sheets
email_chain.body:
Hi Marcel,

Thanks a lot! We have sent the remaining 1,000MT of HDPE sheets. This month we have completed 11,000MT. It’s our biggest shipment yet.

Best regards,
Vance Toler

email_chain.subject: Update on HDPE Sheets Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Toler,

We just shipped 12,000MT. Regarding our budget, could you provide an update?

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: 5,900MT of fertilizer from Aqaba to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ziad,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to confirm the details regarding the shipment of 5,900 metric tons of fertilizer from Aqaba to Jeddah. Please let me know if there are any additional details or documentation required from our side.

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Finalise bill for 750 kgs of Orange Peels
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Amna,

I hope you are doing well. I am following up on the finalization of the bill for 750 kilograms of orange peels. Could you please confirm the details and let me know if there are any outstanding issues?

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Regarding Insurance
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Steve,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss the insurance details for our recent shipment. Could you please provide the necessary documentation or any updates on the insurance coverage?

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Regarding red glow
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Susan,

I hope you are doing well. I am writing to inquire about the issue regarding the red glow that was reported. Could you please provide more details or any updates on this matter?

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on recent shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Edgar,

I hope this message finds you well. I am following up on the recent shipment details. Could you please confirm the status and provide any updates or additional information required?

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Quote - 2,300MT Grain Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Johnson,

We’re booking a 2,300MT grain cargo from Hamburg to Port Sudan. Could you provide a quote for a vessel with the first load date?

Regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking Confirmation - ZIM CHANGJU
email_chain.body:
Hello Stephen,

I have booked the ZIM CHANGJU for your shipment. We are sending you the survey for your approval. The vessel is scheduled to depart Hamburg on 8th March. The rates have been calculated from 1st March.

Regards,
Vishal

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Contract - ZIM CHANGJU
email_chain.body:
Good morning Vishal,

This is Stephen from Grains International. I am calling to confirm our shipping contract for the ZIM CHANGJU. This is the 2nd load of grains for our client based in Germany. We are looking to book a 2,300MT grain cargo from Hamburg to Port Sudan, and hope to load the vessel in 10 days. The below rates will apply to the booking:

FOB Hamburg: €540/MT
Port Sudan: USD 470/MT
Cash Advance: [Details to be provided]

Regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Ready for Loading - 2,300MT Grain Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hey Stephen,

Everything is ready for the 2,300MT grain shipment for our client in Germany. Please give us a call or email us to proceed with loading the vessel.

We also have your next vessel booking, an 8,000MT grain shipment from Santos to Port Sudan, for your kind reference.

Have a great day.

Regards,
Vishal

email_chain.subject: Survey Approval and Vessel Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Vishal,

The survey has been completed and is attached. Please review and sign, as our buyer will not authorize the loading without the survey's approval. Once we have the vessel details, we can move the booking forward and finalize the vessel booking.

Regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Request for Firm Quote for Fertilizer
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I am the Chemical Director at Oil Now Co. In your email of (date), you had requested a firm quote for 1,000MT of fertilizer from Hamriyah to Rabigh. Could you please confirm your best price by next Tuesday?

Your reply will be very much appreciated.

Kind regards,
Farooq

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Fertilizer Quote
email_chain.body: As mentioned in my email of (date), can you please confirm your best price for 1,000MT of fertilizer by Tuesday 5pm?

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Firm Quote for Fertilizer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Farooq,

I am replying to your email of (date). Please note that we currently have one month availability for fertilizer for shipment to Rabigh from Hamriyah (due to the current COVID-19 situation). As mentioned in our email of (date), we currently have a hold on placing an order with our supplier due to the fertilizer shortage. Our supplier is on schedule to start production the week of 25th May. However, please note that this is subject to market price changes. 1,000MT of Urea is currently available at US$371 per MT FOB. Therefore, our offer for this product is US$371/MT FOB.

Thank you for your patience.

Best regards,
[Client Name]

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Fertilizer Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear [Client Name],

As per your email of (date), we confirm our best price as stated below (the product quantities, CIF prices, and payment terms are from your previous emails):

Product: Urea
Price (FOB): US$371.00
Quantity: 1,000 MT
Destination City (CIF): Beirut (Lebanon)
Delivery Date: (date)
Payment Terms: 90 D/A

In addition, our price includes both CIF Port and Insurance, which are generally payable to us by you in order to comply with your requirements.

We look forward to receiving your acceptance of our terms and the necessary documents for the purchase to proceed.

Sincerely yours,
Farooq

Term & Conditions:

Terms of Trade: Cash and Documents Against Acceptance – D/A
Credit: Our references are as follows:
1. High Grade Chemicals
2. Lub

email_chain.subject: Request for DAP Cost to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Peng,

We have 400MT of inks from Shenzhen ready to be loaded. Could you please provide us with the DAP cost for delivery to Vladivostok?

Regards,
Michelle

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for DAP Cost to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Michelle,

Thank you for your email. We are pleased to inform you that we can handle this shipment. Below are the details of the costs:

- Cost of DAP delivery: $5,500/40ft
- Loading fee: $250/40ft
- Total Cost: $5,750/40ft

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with the order.

Regards,
Joel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Alaska State Tax Ruling for Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

We’ve been informed that a change in the state tax ruling in Alaska could affect our decision to ship ethanol there. Could you provide details on how the pending decision will change your rate structure and when it would take effect?

Thank you,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Alaska State Tax Ruling for Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Hello Oliver,

Thank you for your inquiry. Please find attached the information that addresses your concerns regarding the pending tax ruling changes. This document outlines how the rate structure will be affected and the expected timeline for implementation.

We hope this information is helpful. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,
Mollie Harrison
Regional Manager
Alaska State Tax Department

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Alaska Fuel Tax on Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

As a company committed to supporting Alaska's energy independence through cleaner fuels, we are concerned about the potential impact of the new state law on ethanol taxation. Currently, we offer discounted rates for ethanol and additives because the Alaska fuel tax does not differentiate between ethanol and petroleum-based products. However, if the new law passes, ethanol will be taxed at 60% of the full price, necessitating rate adjustments.

To mitigate the impact, we can absorb the tax until June 30, 2013, but if the current rate remains unchanged, fuel costs will increase significantly. We would appreciate your support in maintaining favorable rates for ethanol shipments.

Best regards,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Attached Response from Pacific Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

Please find attached our response from Pacific Ethanol, a supplier of ethanol and biodiesel, regarding the potential changes to the Alaska state tax ruling. This document provides further insights into how the ruling could affect our operations and decision to ship ethanol to Alaska.

Best regards,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Request for Loading Date for Adhesives Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lie,

We need a 3,400MT shipment of adhesives from Rotterdam to Lübeck in early October. Can you advise your earliest loading date?

Best regards,
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Loading Date for Adhesives Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan,

Thank you for your email. Our first 3,400MT loading is on October 4th, but it is a very tight window as that is a Monday and is usually our slowest week of the month.

If you want to expedite it, we can try to send it on October 2nd or 1st, but the latter option is on our limited summer sailing schedule and will have to sail on a larger vessel than usual. The 2nd option is on our regular schedule and will have to use a vessel that is full and may have less throughput for you. However, we can still confirm loading dates by October 7th, so you will know for sure what you are getting into.

Please confirm your choice so we can provide an invoice.

Best regards,
Lie Best

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Fertilizer Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Kyle,

Thanks for your email. Apologies for the delay in responding - I've been quite busy.

Since you are the owner, I will respond from a non-SMED email address.

Do you have 3,000 MT of urea fertilizer ready? What is the MOIC? Do you have a berth confirmed in Aqaba? Have you received a proforma invoice? Is the Bill of Lading marked with FCA AQH and CW? I assume you have the B/L No and HAWB No?

Thanks,
Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coffee Beans to Chennai
email_chain.body:

Thanks,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coffee Beans to Chennai
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

Greetings!

1. The transportation timeline is non-negotiable. The cargo must be delivered between the 21st and 25th of November to Coffee Chennai.
2. The shipment will be from Ecuador, but the specific shipping method will not affect the price of the cargo.

We prefer the shipment to be delivered within the specified timeframe (21st to 25th November).

We have been working with Albrecht and Petersons since August 2015 to ship 7 containers of coffee for our export business, Roast Coffee (Trigon) Pvt Ltd. Below are their contact details:

Martin Peterson: +49 1512 3664097
Isabell Schmied: +49 163 9431815

Best regards,
Shipping Team

email_chain.subject: Invoice Verification
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

Please find the attached form and photos. Kindly confirm receipt.

Additionally, attached is the invoice we received from you. It appears to be a single invoice, but if there are two, please let us know.

Thank you,
Hiya

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice Verification
email_chain.body:
Hi Hiya,

Thank you for the invoice information. We have verified the invoice amount, and it matches our records. We are pleased to confirm that the product name is correct.

Regarding your update, I would like to clarify that this order was not sent to an address in Ecuador but to Chennai, India. Additionally, this order was not created through a single receipt and invoice but through two separate sales orders with the price break as shown.

Thank you again for your support.

Best regards,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Diesel Cargo Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Vessel Loading Inquiry

email_chain.body:
Hello Barry,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

When your ship arrives in New Orleans, we would like to send you 50 tons of industrial chemicals by truck. Could you please provide the following information?

- What are the truck dimensions that your ship can accommodate?
- Are there any fees associated with the shipment? If so, what are they and how are they calculated?
- Do you have any spare capacity available?

Thanks in advance for your information.

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

We have successfully shipped 50 tons of chemicals to your ship. The costs associated with the shipment are as follows:

- Freight paid to your ship: 10,000 U.S. dollars
- Other fees: 12,000 U.S. dollars
- Tankage: 5,000 U.S. dollars
- Spare capacity: 3,000 U.S. dollars

Total: 30,000 U.S. dollars

Thank you for your services, and we look forward to another business opportunity with you in the future.

Best regards,
Mr. Warren

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

Thank you for the detailed breakdown of the costs. Could you please confirm if the total amount of 30,000 U.S. dollars includes all potential fees, or are there additional charges we should be aware of?

Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Yes, the total amount of 30,000 U.S. dollars includes all fees associated with the shipment. There are no additional charges.

Best regards,
Mr. Warren

email_chain.body: My company in Sao Paulo (Brazil) will accept only 90% of our total order. Could you make it 95% by the deadline? Can you come through for us?

email_chain.subject: Re: Order Adjustment Request
email_chain.body: What would be the delivery time from Porto Alegre to New York? Is it possible to deliver cargo by the deadline?

email_chain.subject: Urgent Loading Request
email_chain.body: We will be stuck in a desert. Is your company able to load 100MT in just four days? How many hours of shipment can you complete this?

email_chain.subject: Freight Cost Reduction Inquiry
email_chain.body: Could your company reduce the freight cost by $500? How much can you adjust?

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Estimate
email_chain.body:

We are planning to ship 2,000MT of steel plates from China to India. Could you please provide an estimate for the shipping costs?

Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Kim,

Unfortunately, we no longer provide shipping services to India. However, we can offer a quotation for any other destinations. Your Quotation ID is xxxxxxx.

Please confirm if you would like us to proceed with a quotation for an alternative destination or if you would like us to contact you again in the future.

Noah

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

I received your email, and it's true that your cargo is very small for our vessels, but I'm happy to look into it. Could you please confirm the final quantities, and if you're able to provide a discharge port of Penang within two weeks?

Would you mind also sharing the location, timing, and mode of the loadout? We are looking to transship to a subsea FPSO in Mozambique.

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike,

Thank you for your email. It's good to know you're willing to accept our freight. I think we can agree on the price of $1,500.00 per ton.

Please find below the details:

Location: The Pasir Panjang Terminal, Singapore
Port: Singapore
Cargo mode: Bulk cargo
Unit of measure: in tonnes
Starting date of load out: 1st November 2018
Ending date of load out: 2nd November 2018
Number of containers: 4,724 units
Number of cargo items: 6,756 items
Quantity: 248 tons
Unit price per ton: $1,500.00

We are willing to cover 70% of the freight.

Once again, thank you for accepting our offer. We're excited to make this happen.

Best regards,
Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

You mentioned that you would like to cover 70% of the freight. Could you please share the details of your cargo that would fall into this category? Additionally, do you have a fixed freight payment schedule?

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
We have a 5,200MT fertilizer shipment ready from Tangshan to Sharjah, DXB. Could you advise your best freight rate and let me know if weekend loadings are acceptable?

Thank you,
Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Sonny,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have received your email and would like to discuss this matter further to see if we can work together.

We have agents in Tangshan and terminals in Dubai, UAE, as well as our own vessel. We are well-equipped to handle bulk cargo shipments between China and the UAE and can process them through our port systems.

Please provide us with more details such as the port of loading and unloading, cargo type, etc., so we can assist you better.

We would be honored to earn your business.

Regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Manager,

We have decided to book your service. I apologize for not giving you the opportunity to handle this business earlier, as I initially thought it would be a traditional tender process. This is the first time I have received an email quote from one of your agents after researching online and reaching out to you.

We will keep you updated on any developments.

Regards,
Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sonny,

We appreciate your confidence in our services. We have extensive experience with such shipments and would like to discuss further to ensure all details are aligned. In addition to our terminal in the UAE, we have a new facility in Tangerang, Indonesia. Please let us know how we can make this shipment more convenient for you. We can also provide you with our agents' information.

Our terms and conditions regarding rates and payment are straightforward. Please let us know if you have any further questions and your availability for a discussion.

We look forward to working with you.

Regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: Enquiry: STP for 3,000MT of Paper from Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Hi Stuart,

Would you be able to confirm your earliest date for an STP for 3,000MT of paper from Barcelona to Casablanca? Also, do you charge for your expert judgment to advise us on the terminal rules?

With best regards,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: STP for 3,000MT of Paper from Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Dear Ray,

Thank you for your enquiry. I am sorry, but at this time, our Operations team has no availability until January. Our charter rates can be viewed on the rate page on our website (please see the link below), and these should be subject to Standard Charters' terms & conditions. As you will note, the rates are offered only on a per-direction basis, so whilst we will be charging two-way rates, we will be allowing a few days' turnaround at sea between the outward and return legs of the voyage. Additionally, there is no charge for our expert advice on terminal rules and such like. We will contact you once availability has been confirmed and our rates have been reconfirmed.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias
Stuart Crossthwaite

<EMAIL>

email_chain.subject: Query: Freight Consolidation and Return Slots
email_chain.body:
Dear Vassili,

I trust you are well. I was hoping you could help me out regarding this. Is it possible to combine freight items on an express charter, and if so, what rates apply? I also have a query regarding return slots and consolidation of cargo. We would like to consolidate 3 flights of around 500 kgs each on one flight, as this will reduce the number of flights we need and associated costs and delivery times. What would be a reasonable request time for us to supply this service (3-4 days)?

Kind regards,
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: Query: Freight Consolidation and Return Slots
email_chain.body:
Dear Kurt,

Thank you for your enquiry. Regarding your first query, if you have two destinations and only want to travel once per cargo item and your freight exceeds 3,000 kg, there will be a minimum charge of $5,000 to open up your freight as Standard Charters freight (see the link below for full information). Regarding your second query, the Standard Charters will be 40 days turnaround per trip, and for the return leg from airport to airport, we will allow up to 5 days turnaround. Generally, 3-4 days should be enough time to collect your cargo, unless, of course, you want to wait and collect together.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias

Support Team

email_chain.subject: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Mark, how about 3,300 MT of gelato from Naples to Melbourne? Should we start as a cargo hold, or can we split that 3 MT between the reefer plug and cargo hold? Best, Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Excellent work today, guys. As I understand it, you've pre-bought 3,000 MT of gelato from Naples for the flight to Melbourne. We are going to have it arrive in Australia in time for the festival. We have until October, so we have plenty of time. Now, if you ask me, it would be much better if the gelato arrived as part of a shipment of Neapolitan foodstuffs from Naples, or a plane with a load of gelato from Naples arriving in Australia. But whatever works, Daniel. I would also like to order more gelato from Naples for our festivals in the future, as demand seems to have picked up since we started this thing. And before you ask, yes, there is a limit on gelato purchases from Naples. After all, the flood of gelato was somewhat unexpected. Unfortunately,

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Perhaps one day a three-car train will bring a smaller batch of gelato to Australia, but not today.

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: One final thing to consider: Many people in Australia like ice cream and do not like gelato. How much of the gelato are we going to send to Australia, and how much of the gelato are we going to send to Australia?

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: That’s a great question, Mark. We’ll sell the majority of the gelato, but we’ll donate some gelato to hospitals and nursing homes, especially ones in Western Australia.

Kindly arrange your forwarder. We will be ready to send your samples within the next two weeks, and the full payment should be completed within 15 days after the shipment has arrived in your country.

email_chain.body:

Yours sincerely,
Mr. Tom

email_chain.body:

Thank you for your email. I think your offer is reasonable. However, I would appreciate it if you could send me more information about your company and our transaction. For example, some product pictures and your reference certificate. Then I can confirm if I want to send you my product pictures and specifications.

Nathan
