email_chain.subject: Request for Spot Rate and Documentation Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Wood,

We have 300MT of varnishes to ship from the port of St. Louis to New Orleans. I'm waiting on your spot rate. Could you also confirm if you handle the documentation?

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Spot Rate and Documentation Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Unfortunately, I do not ship varnishes to the New Orleans area and would prefer not to. However, if I find anything in my available inventory that suits your needs, I will contact you immediately.

If you are shipping a different product not on the Hotwire system, I’d be happy to assist with documentation and import arrangements.

Let me know if you have any questions. Have a great day.

Best regards,
Ms. Wood

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wood,

Thank you for your prompt response. I see you have some inventory available, but it doesn’t meet my shipment needs. If I were to contact you about a different product, would that be an issue?

As a logistics consultant, my services are free of charge, and there’s no obligation to purchase through my company. I specialize in helping clients reduce logistics costs and can often secure better rates than others.

I’ve already contacted a gentleman in New York who can assist with shipping varnishes to Louisiana if needed. I’d like to schedule a call next week to review my rates and discuss how I can assist with your shipments. I’m eager to help.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your call and offer to help. It’s always good to learn from the competition and explore ways to improve. However, I’m hesitant to accept a 'free quote' from someone without a commitment, as it often leads to unreliable deals. While I’m sure your rates are competitive, I prefer to work with trusted partners.

Let’s keep in touch, and perhaps in the future, we can collaborate on a project.

Best regards,
Ms. Wood

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Shipping Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wood,

I’m sorry to hear you’re not interested in assisting me. If you’re open to consulting on ways to reduce shipping costs, I’d appreciate any advice. Let’s start with a friendly email exchange. While I appreciate your offer to help, you might want to reconsider offering assistance if it’s not a priority for you.

Thank you, and have a great day.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Simon Shyba
Senior Vice President, Office of Professional Practice
The Supply Chain Forum
PHONE: (919) 967-8187
FAX: (919) 967-5838
E-mail: sshyba@supplychainforum.org
Twitter: @simonshyba
Linkedin: linkedin.com/in/simonshyba/
Website: supplychainforum.org
Reference: SGML-17754-PDX

The Supply Chain Forum is the premier source for supply chain solutions and innovative practices.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Zinc Sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena
email_chain.body:
Hi Colleen,

We need to ship 1,200MT of zinc sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena. Would you be able to get it done by the end of the month?

Here are the client's requirements:
1. You will need to arrange the shipment of the cargo from Ronessie to Cartagena.
2. We will transfer the payment to the local bank in Cartagena for clearing.
3. Your local bank will then send the payment to the carrier to cover the cargo costs.
4. The cargo will be delivered to the client in Cartagena.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could assist with customs clearance in Cartagena.

Please let us know if you can handle this.

Best regards,
Simon Shyba

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Zinc Sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

We can handle the shipment of 1,200MT of zinc sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena by the end of the month. Please send us the order details so we can proceed.

Here’s what we can offer:
1. We are based in Cartagena, Colombia, and provide shipping and logistics services.
2. We can manage the shipment directly from the seaport in Cartagena.
3. We will provide proof of delivery for the cargo.
4. We can also assist with payment arrangements if needed.

Let us know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Colleen

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Zinc Sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena
email_chain.body:
Hi Colleen,

Thank you for your response. We need to confirm the following details:
1. You will arrange the shipment from Ronessie to Cartagena.
2. We will transfer the payment to the local bank in Cartagena for clearing.
3. Your local bank will handle the payment to the carrier.
4. The cargo will be delivered to the client in Cartagena.

Please confirm if you can also assist with customs clearance in Cartagena.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Simon Shyba

email_chain.subject: Freight Quotation Request for Rice Shipment
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quotation Request for Rice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Paddy,

Thanks for your query on the port-to-port freight quotation for 29,000MT of rice from Bangkok to Mombasa. We confirm that there will be no delays with customs clearance. The estimated cost for this shipment is $23,242.

For your convenience, please find our details below:

- Product Quantity: 29,000MT
- Origin/Port of Loading: Bangkok, Thailand
- Destination/Port of Delivery: Mombasa, Kenya
- Loading Date: Nov 15, 2022
- Discharge Date: Nov 25, 2022
- Customs Broker: No
- Packing Material: The freight will be calculated based on Ex Works FOB, meaning the rice will be delivered at the port free of cost.
- Insurance Cost: $26,000 (USD)

Regards,
Mr. Sanasand

email_chain.body:

Phone: +1234567890

Regarding your inquiries:

Ali

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. May,

In response to your enquiry regarding the requirement of moving 10,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao, please find our price details as follows:

- Load cargo from Rotterdam to Qingdao on named days under a Term Contract charter, inclusive of the following:
  - FOB Rotterdam: $50 per MT
  - Full Dry Cargo Insurance to Qingdao until delivery on board.
  - 25.8% Total Freight Charges to be paid on board during vessel loading in Rotterdam.
  - Vessel can transship in Rotterdam; Laycan in Qingdao to be arranged during our trip.
  - Chorley’s General Conditions for Trade Apply.

Additionally, we can offer the below additional benefits at different costs:
  - Insure Load once Vessel entered port in Rotterdam; +20%

Best regards,
Ms. Qin

email_chain.subject: Pipeline Construction and Trade Diversion
email_chain.body:
What's up?

Finally, you won the contract, and I hear you are going to start construction of the pipeline by the end of the month! Congratulations!

My friend in the Ministry of Energy suggested that we create a (technical) trade diversion scheme to bypass our Russian pipeline monopoly.

I'm going to prepare a document to give to you.

Please let me know when you have time to meet?

Thanks and best wishes,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Re: Pipeline Construction and Trade Diversion
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

I just heard about your friend in the Ministry. I find it hard to believe he suggested a plan like that. His intention could be only one thing: to profit on the technical route. I don't want to wait until we sign the contract; you don't want to work with him. Please just sign it, and I will discuss the proposal with him.

Thanks and best,
Mr. Moutran

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Shipment Request
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

You have got me pumped up, man!

So now we have to see if it's doable to make 30,000MT of crude oil from Shah Deniz to Rotterdam by 16/06.

Stay tuned! :)

Yours,
Mr. Moutran

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Technical Route Suggestion
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Moutran,

Let me know your feedback on my suggestion regarding the technical route.

Thanks,
Rashid

This is pretty straightforward. Let me start by describing the benefits to my company:

By way of the technical route, it will be possible to increase profits by up to 200m USD.

The new route will be built for 1.2b USD, this is just an estimate I got from a professional engineer.

By buying some equipment of equivalent quality, we can save up to 200m USD.

A small part of this money can be saved by buying cheaper cement.

In my opinion, the highest potential for savings is in buying high-quality cement with 3% sulfur, as in Azerbaijan.

It is worth pointing out that the technical route is built from scratch, but the existing route was built by the Soviet Union, so it may...

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Nick,

I’m looking to ship 1,300MT of rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao. I can be flexible on the ETA, but the delivery must be completed by January 10th. What are your thoughts on this?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thank you for your email. I understand that you are seeking an intermediate shipping line for your cargo. It seems you want the rice delivered as soon as possible, but I’m not entirely sure if that’s the case.

There are several routes available, but the key factors to consider are:
1. The transit time from departure to arrival, as you need to know when the ship will arrive in Qingdao.
2. Potential delays due to weather or other unforeseen events, which could increase costs.

Let me know if you’d like to discuss further.

Sincerely,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Using Tasknodo for Custom Emails
email_chain.body:

You are welcome to use our service. Please contact us at support@tasknodo.com to get started.

Sincerely,
Tasknodo Customer Care

email_chain.subject: Request for Base Oil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Moynihan,

I was wondering if you had the capacity to move 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore? We have a laycan of April 5th and are looking to make this commitment.

Thank you,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Base Oil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moynihan,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am still in need of the 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan is April 5th. We had to change the place of trade for the tanker, so it is now Europe > Asia.

I have attached my latest tanker details. It has all the instructions and details in it. I will email you a PDF copy of the contract.

The contract expires on March 31st at 3pm Singapore time. If you are interested, I would like to negotiate an extension with you. The expiry date is not a hard deadline and it will take time for all parties to receive everything they need from one another, so extending the deadline will hopefully make things easier on all parties.

Best regards,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Base Oil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Wendi,

What do you mean by 'Europe > Asia'? I already knew that your contract was to change, since I received your email #1. I would need to see this new contract before I can be confident with our understanding of the deal. I am not willing to move the base oil without seeing this new contract, which is fine. However, I do not understand what you mean by 'Europe > Asia'. We are in two different continents, and therefore moving the base oil between Europe and Asia is really impossible to execute. For example, from where in Europe would you like us to load the base oil in? Could we instead export the base oil to either the US or Canada, and then import it to Singapore? Also, the laycan of April 5th is a very tight timeline, and we are unable to make this commitment without seeing your new contract.

Best regards,
Mr. Moynihan

email_chain.subject: Alternative Proposal for Base Oil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Wendi,

How do we move 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore, given that Europe and Asia are different continents? Could we instead export the base oil to either the US or Canada, and then import it to Singapore? This would save you the trouble of negotiating a new contract with a different buyer. Just to clarify, we will be shipping the base oil from the port of Rotterdam to the port of Montreal or Vancouver, depending on which one you choose. Would you still be interested in this alternative?

Best regards,
Mr. Moynihan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LNG Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Felton,

Can your vessel accommodate a 12,500MT cargo of LNG from Rotterdam to Singapore? Could you also provide details on the fuel surcharge per day and your laycan?

Cheers,
Calvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LNG Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Greetings Mr. Felton,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have received your proposal for our LNG requirement. I was wondering if there is anything we can do to refine our request or improve your availability? Please note that we do not require emergency availability for this contract, and our expected cargo start date is the 4th of September.

Please let us know if there is any additional information we can provide.

Thank you,
(Your client’s name)
(Your client’s company)

email_chain.subject: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation

I’m requesting a cargo of LPG to be transported from Jebel Ali to Pusan. Could you take 1,900MT for an early-November laycan?

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

Thanks for your reply. Unfortunately, we are not able to accept a carriage period later than 17th November.

Could you provide a monthly rate so we can check with management?

Regards,
Richard

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Richard,

Thank you for your email. I can offer a rate of $150,000 per month for a laycan of 17th November. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best Regards,
Mr. Chang

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chang,

Thank you for your email and I am pleased to inform you that we will be happy to accept your offer at $150,000 per month for a laycan of 17th November. Would you be able to provide the terms and conditions please?

Best Regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hey Lauren,

Could you please provide an offer to ship 2,000,000L of vegetable oil from Chicago to Los Angeles? I was hoping to have this to submit by the end of the week.

Thanks for your assistance,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Jack,

I am writing to follow up on our phone call the other day. I have sent you an email with an offer to ship 2,000,000L of vegetable oil from Chicago to Los Angeles. I will be working on putting together the same offer for your east coast ports.

My team and I will try our best to ensure that you get the shipment you need. Please let us know if you have any questions.

We look forward to hearing from you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Jack,

I’m not sure if you are still looking for a quote to ship 2 million L of vegetable oil from Chicago to LA. The rate we originally quoted you still stands. Please let us know if you’d like to move forward with this, or if you have any questions.

Thank you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Decision on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Lauren,

The customer has decided to stick with our current partner. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Decision on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Jack,

Please send me another offer when you get the same rate.

I’m not sure if you are still looking for a quote to ship 2 million L of vegetable oil from Chicago to LA. The rate we originally quoted you still stands. Please let us know if you’d like to move forward with this, or if you have any questions.

Thank you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nate,

I’m writing to follow up on your quote from yesterday. We’re looking to load 3,600MT of vegetables from Bangladesh to Malaysia. What do you think about my counter-offer of $60/MT DAP?

Regards,
Anneli

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks Anneli,

I think your counter-offer for the vegetables is reasonable. However, it’s been an average couple of months for coffee beans and dairy products, so we should aim for a 10% rate increase for those. You may also want to consider increasing your seasonal rate for oranges, as the fruit quality is unusually good this year.

I’ll finalize the details and get back to you about the payment by the end of the week.

Sincerely,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks Anneli,

I appreciate your feedback. I’ve submitted the request to our systems for approval. I’m sorry to hear about the challenges your company is facing, and I’m hopeful we can continue to be a reliable partner for your business in the future.

Sincerely,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks Nate,

I really appreciate your feedback and support. It’s been a tough couple of months for us, with operations hit hard by inflation. I’m hopeful we can continue working together and remain a reliable source for your clients.

Sincerely,
Anneli

labels.commodity: vegetables, coffee beans, dairy products, oranges

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Steel Coil Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Porter,

We’re interested in moving some steel coil from Guangzhou to Nantong. Could you give us an idea of what your freight rate will be, and whether you would be able to move it in time to make our deadlines?

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Steel Coil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for contacting me. As you’re aware, we do transport steel coils, but have the service down to only a few weekly trips. I will put in a request to see if I can make the next available route to cover your needs.

If you can hold a few weeks for our service, it will be the most economical. I have included some of our general pricing for similar services so you can understand the value of our services.

I would highly recommend loading the cargo with the opening side up for more protection from the elements. You can do this with one person as shown in the video.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Steel Coil Transport
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your reply. We would be very grateful if you could cover this run. We’re on very tight deadlines and need the product to make the end of February. Our shipping company has been slow.

Can you also confirm the price you are charging, per ton of cargo?

Many thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Steel Coil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

I’m working with our booking agents to secure the necessary booking for your cargo. As I mentioned previously, our route operates once a week, but due to a change in our routing, I have confirmed that we can add this item onto our next available run. The vessel will be on route to China on the 24th of this month and will have this cargo on the ship.

I’m still waiting on a rate quote from our container freight forwarder. I will let you know when I have the information.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Diesel Price Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Kitonga,

We have a sample order for the sale of 5MT of diesel from Dar es Salaam. Is it possible to receive a price?

Regards,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Procedure for Ordering Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kitonga,

I have been given the task of placing an order for diesel for the organization. What is the standard procedure for ordering the fuel? Can I expect a price quotation from your company?

Regards,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Re: Procedure for Ordering Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Buckle,

Thank you for your email regarding the purchase of diesel for the company. I've received some information about the purchase process. You should go to the company's main office to purchase the fuel. The office is located at 14 - 17, Nairobi Street, Kampala.

When you reach the office, you should request to see the office manager and then provide the following information about your order:
* The quantity of the fuel
* The type of the fuel
* The location from where the fuel will be delivered
* The date on which the order is required.

Regards,
Mr. Kitonga

email_chain.subject: Re: Procedure for Ordering Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kitonga,

Thank you for your reply regarding the fuel purchase for the company. I am sorry to hear that your company does not provide the office manager's name. However, you should be able to purchase the fuel by following the process that I've outlined above. I hope this is helpful.

Sincerely,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Request for Handling 8,000MT of Liquid Chemicals
email_chain.body:
Hello Gianluca,

Can you handle 8,000MT of liquid chemicals from Oujda to Algeciras? If so, could you please contact our representatives in Madrid and quickly get the details signed up for the charter party?

Many thanks,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Vessel Confirmation for 250,000MT Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Gianluca,

We need to confirm the following details for the cargo from Oujda to Algeciras:

- Cargo Size: 250,000MT
- Arrival: 14 August 2021
- Departure: 27 August 2021
- Bank Requested: 12.5%

IMPORTANT: Please indicate ASAP which vessel you would be able to take our cargo. This is very important to us as we have 30 days from today (15/6) to sign up a vessel.

If you are unavailable to meet our timelines, please let us know ASAP so we can start looking elsewhere.

Thank you,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Charter Details for 8,000MT Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Sabeel,

Here is the invoice for our tonnage of 8,000MT. We are ready to charter it as soon as possible.

1) Route: Oujda to Algeciras and back with arrival on 14/8 and 27/8
2) Any of the ships listed on the website which you believe is able to load and unload on 15/8 and 26/8
3) Cargo: x 1 250,000MT
4) Arrival time: 15/8/2021 for loading in Oujda
5) Delivery time: 26/8/2021 in Algeciras
6) Packaging: steel canisters, dimensions to be confirmed
7) Bank: requested 12.5% C&B, due before shipping

Our agents in Madrid can complete the contract within 30 days.

Best regards,
Gianluca

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Details for 8,000MT
email_chain.body:
Hello Gianluca,

We are currently looking to confirm the following cargo details:

1) Amount of cargo: 8,000MT
2) Dimensions: 12 m x 20 m x 15 m
3) Steel containers
4) Loading start date: 8 August 2021
5) Delivery date: 28 August 2021

We also need to know if you can carry this cargo. Please let us know if you are not able to offer this service.

We are ready to sign up a vessel as soon as possible. To do this, we need to know the details of the vessel to confirm the details.

Many thanks,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Request for Flour Shipment
email_chain.body:

Could you ship 2,000MT of flour from Charleroi to Jerez for this week? How much would you charge for reefer plug?

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Flour Shipment
email_chain.body:

We have received your order and here is the freight and terms we propose, do you accept? We are holding the cargo until the offer is accepted.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Salas,

The offer that you proposed for our shipment of 2,000MT flour is greatly appreciated, and we will send the confirmation to the above email.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Payment Terms for Flour Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Lars,

Thank you for the confirmation, and here are the payment terms:

FOB Charleroi, BE
Payment upon delivery with term n3.
Bank transfer
Freight and insurance to be paid in full and collect from port of shipment

Regards,
Rolando

email_chain.subject: Request for Confirmation on Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Please confirm your offer for the 2,000MT flour shipment from Charleroi to Jerez, do you have any questions regarding the payment terms? We are holding the order until the offer is confirmed.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Preparation of Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Lars,

Thank you for your confirmation, we will prepare the bill of lading and send it to you in the next hours. Please advise us of the time needed to do the bank transfer.

Regards,
Rolando

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have provided you with the bill of lading, please let us know if you would like us to send the bill of lading by email or via fax.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Invoice Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have received the payment for the 2,000MT flour shipment from Charleroi to Jerez. We have now updated your invoice, and sent it to you by email for your convenience.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 3,200MT of Polypropylene
email_chain.body:

Sincerely,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 3,200MT of Polypropylene
email_chain.body:
Tom,

Thank you for your inquiry. I am interested in stocking 3,200 MT at your port. I hope we can reach an agreement on this offer. I can bear the cost for the next month.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Clarifications Needed for Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

I have some questions to clarify before I can close the deal with you for the above offer:
1. When do you expect the order to be completed?
2. How much will the shipment cost?

Please reply to this email.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Clarification on Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Frank,

Can you please reply ASAP? I would like to know if you will send polypropylene or any other material, or if you will cancel the shipment due to the low volume of offer.

Please clarify what you will be sending.

Thank you for your reply.

Sincerely,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Inquiry - Sodium Hydroxide
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Inquiry - Sodium Hydroxide
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: I’m currently booking a shipment of steel billets from China to Istanbul, and I have the offer from <COMPANY NAME> enclosed. Are you able to pick this up? If so, could you give me your port charge estimate, and let me know your preferred arrival date? Thank you, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. I’ve passed your request on to the port of loading, but I have not received a response yet. Please give me some more time to contact the supplier again.

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. Your request has been passed on to the port of loading. I was just wondering if there is any way you could tell me your preferred arrival date? I’d be very grateful if you could let me know. Thanks again.

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: I’m sorry for the delay. Our port of loading has been unable to confirm any ports until early next week. Could you please give me a call back? Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thank you for your call. I was just wondering when you would be able to get back to me? If possible, could you please give me your preferred arrival date? I would be very grateful.

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Billets Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. We are currently looking into port costs and estimated arrival dates, and I will get back to you when I have more information. Please let me know if there are any other questions you have. Thank you very much for your time. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Natural Gas Cargo Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Morrow,

Thank you for your prompt response. We’re planning a 3,200MT cargo of natural gas from Casablanca to Lisbon. Can you confirm if your vessel can handle a mid-April laycan, and at what cost?

Sincerely,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Natural Gas Cargo Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ishaan,

As requested, our vessel has a mid-April laycan. The cost for our services is as follows:
- $100,000 on account.
- $50,000 at delivery.

The laycan would be for arrival on May 5th in Lisbon. Please note that this cost is our exclusive offer, as you have requested the expedition in the shortest time frame possible. To accept the deal, kindly let us know via email within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Natural Gas Cargo Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

Thank you for your kind offer, however, I’m afraid we’ll have to decline. We’re currently looking at shipping our cargo via a shorter, more cost-efficient route. However, if you can wait, and give us a lower rate, we might reconsider. Kindly confirm your rate and laycan within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Natural Gas Cargo Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Ishaan,

Thank you for your response. Unfortunately, I’ll have to decline your offer. I’d prefer to ship my cargo via a shorter route to keep costs down. If you can wait a bit longer and offer a lower rate, I might reconsider. Kindly confirm your rate and laycan within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Mango Juice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Sringeri,

I am looking to move 5000MT of mango juice from Maasai Mara to Lomé. We are ready to proceed with the booking immediately, but we need your confirmation on whether you can accept the freight for this shipment at $1200 (port to port).

Please let me know if you are available to discuss this further over the phone or if you need any additional details.

Warmly,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Mango Juice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. I accept your offer. Could you please provide the following details?
1. Port of Origin
2. Destination Port
3. GIN Code

You can find this information on our website: http://www.africanshipping.net. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Warmly,
Mukesh

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Mango Juice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mukesh,

I have emailed you the required information. I also have a few additional questions:
1. What is your Port of Load?
2. What is the appropriate GIN Code for this shipment?
3. How long will it take for the shipment to arrive in Lomé?
4. Is this an express shipment?
5. What is the shipment value?
6. When should we expect the shipment to arrive?
7. Does the shipment come with insurance?

Please confirm receipt of these items and respond with a yes or no answer to each question.

Warmly,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Request for 1,900MT of Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Nora,

Did you come across a set of tankers from Maracaibo to Klaipeda with a request for 1,900MT of cyclohexanol for the last week of August? Would you be able to reach out to the carrier to find out how we can proceed?

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 1,900MT of Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
As promised, I have reached out to the sender with the request that you make contact with him. Feel free to get in touch with me should you have any questions about this shipment.

Thank you.
Sara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 1,900MT of Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I do not have any open, ongoing projects with this customer. Please forward my request to the sender of this email to cancel this request. I have forwarded your request to the designated agent.

Thank you for your assistance.
Sara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 1,900MT of Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

This shipment was canceled yesterday, but I just wanted to remind you of our discussion about trying to move other customers’ products at the last minute. I believe you know I can guarantee to move the product for them, and you can do so in exchange for a small percentage. Could you let me know if that’s a possibility? I’ll be on vacation until the end of the month, so it may be a little while before you get back to me.

Please reply to this email if you can. I really need to get this cleared up before my departure.

Sincerely,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Plywood Freight Availability

Location: Mochou Mountain
Phone: +86 13570183633

Yang

email_chain.subject: Arrangements for Your Visit

email_chain.subject: Company Overview
email_chain.body:

We welcome you to our company. Our company has 1,000 employees and a professional factory. You are free to visit the factory and have in-depth discussions with our staff. Our company has a 10,000 square meter warehouse.

Thanks a lot,
Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Thank You for the Introduction
email_chain.body:

Thank you for all your efforts and the introduction to your company. I look forward to seeing you in my future plans.

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Asana Anchari

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Your Visit
email_chain.body:
Dear Asana,

Thank you for your attendance and attention. This was our first meeting, and I very much enjoyed your smile. You are always welcome at our company. We have a long history with excellent performance and look forward to developing a long-term business relationship.

Best Regards,
Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate and Early Delivery Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Bulk Chemicals and Vessel Inquiry

[Name not provided]

email_chain.subject: Freight Forwarding Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Luisa,

We are a UAE-incorporated freight forwarding company with a strong network of partners globally. Our partner firms are well-known in international trade. Please review our client portfolio and let us know your requirements.

Our primary focus is on logistics services, including sea, land, air, and door-to-door logistics. We are looking to expand our business beyond shipping and explore opportunities in other logistics industries.

We are eager to assist you in any way we can. Feel free to contact us at your convenience.

Kind regards,
[Name not provided]

email_chain.subject: Freight Requirements and Offers
email_chain.body:
Dear Luisa,

This reply will reach you in the new year. We wish you success in 2014. Please send us your freight requirements so that we can provide you with freight offers.

Kind regards,
[Name not provided]

email_chain.subject: Ship Repair and Expansion Opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Luisa,

We are a UAE-based company specializing in ship repairing. As a small enterprise, we are looking to expand our activities and explore new opportunities. Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

Best regards,
[Name not provided]

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Reservation
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Aron,

I have 800MT of feed-grade DAP in Kemner that needs to ship out this week. Would you be able to reserve space for me?

Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Reservation
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Thanks for the opportunity to work with you on this customer. I'll reserve space for this shipment.

Please send me the following:
- VGM
- Certificate of Insurance
- Third-party bill of lading

and I'll send you the bill of lading.

~Bev

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Reservation
email_chain.body:
Hi Bev,

I have sent the following documents for your account # XXXX:
- Insurance
- Bill of Lading

Please have a contractor ship this out to:
Panama Canal Zone
Colón
Colon
Royal Caribbean
Puerto Cabezas
Nicaragua

<Receipt of all these materials in 2 days>

Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Reservation
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Thanks for sending the documents. I've had our contractor notify you.

Would you like to add this customer to my company's contact list so I can ship with them as well?

~Bev

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Reservation
email_chain.body:
Hi Bev,

Yes, please add my account to your contacts.

Thanks for the service you provided.

Paul

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

I just sent the bill of lading for your goods in PDF format. Please check your email for the attachment.

Thanks,
Bev

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Hi Bev,

I've received the goods. Thanks for shipping them.

Paul

email_chain.subject: Opportunity to Ship 3,000 MTs of Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi, how are you? I wanted to remind you that you could have won 3,000 MTs of cargo from Algeciras if you had acted faster. Can you help me ship it within the next 2 days? I would greatly appreciate your assistance. Thanks! Best regards, Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Opportunity to Ship 3,000 MTs of Cargo
email_chain.body: Sorry for the delay in getting back to you. I am currently running some tests, but we will work things out soon. Thanks for your patience! Best regards, Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Opportunity to Ship 3,000 MTs of Cargo

We have a shipment of 13,000 MT of iron ore from Sydney to Shanghai. Could you confirm if you are able to load on the 24th? Additionally, could you provide details on your demurrage policy?

Please let me know if it’s okay to forward this email to your team for further coordination.

I am the Senior Buyer at Haitian Steel. We are looking to ship 5,000 MT of 65% iron ore from Brisbane to Shenzhen, Guangzhou, and Ningbo. Could you confirm if you can load on the 2nd of March?

Looking forward to your response.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Office Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

We have 300MT of yellow chalk powder from Suzhou to Tokyo. Is your office open this afternoon?

Sincerely,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Typo in Previous Email
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

Do you have any typos in the email below in using 'We' on the last sentence?

Sincerely,
Kim

---

Dear Mr. Chang,
This is such a nice day. We walked through the park this morning.
See you this afternoon.

Sincerely, Kim

email_chain.subject: Change of Meeting Location
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

This is Kim. The park is out. Please meet me at the coffee shop.

Sincerely,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Change of Meeting Location
email_chain.body:
Dear Kim,

I got your email. We can meet at noon at the coffee shop.

Best regards,
Mr. Chang

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Expression 'Out'
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

What is the meaning of the expression 'out'? How do you use this expression? Can I use this expression when the place of meeting is in the afternoon?

Sincerely,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Opinion on Sentence Usage
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

Please tell me your opinion on the following sentences: 'We had an appointment.' vs. 'We meet at 2:00.'

Sincerely,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Sentence Review Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

Could you check these four sentences and tell me the best choice?

1. Could you tell me your name?
2. Could I ask you your name?
3. May I ask you your name?

Sincerely,
Kim

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Space - 4,500MT Dry Coffee
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

I’m sorry to hear that we don’t have availability on the 11th. Let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you.

Cheers,
Park

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Space - 4,500MT Dry Coffee
email_chain.body:

I have received the messages. Unfortunately, we’re not able to help you.

Take care,
Park

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Space - 4,500MT Dry Coffee
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

I hope to hear from you.

Best regards,
Park

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Space - 4,500MT Dry Coffee
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

I understand your disappointment. I’m sorry I wasn’t able to fulfill your request. However, I will be glad to help you out in the future. If I could help you, please tell me what I can do.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Yoon,

Could you provide a freight estimate for 1,250 MT of crude palm oil from Tanjung Priok to Yangon in early October? Do you foresee any port draft limitations?

Best regards,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Mandy,

We have three vessels on order to begin operating in Yangon this week, so there will likely be port draft restrictions. However, we cannot commit to a specific percentage at this time.

We are able to ship your cargo in 25,000 MT increments, and we would be delighted to finalize a shipment for you in early October.

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thank you for the freight estimate. Could you please provide the estimated minimum draft requirement for each vessel? We'd like to compare your draft to what other carriers are requesting.

Thanks,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thank you for your response. We now understand there will be a reduction in capacity at Yangon in early October, and we can accommodate your vessels. However, we are having trouble finding accurate draft information and need to provide quotes to our customers as soon as possible.

Could you please confirm the draft requirements for your vessels and any other information we need to provide accurate quotes?

Thanks,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Mandy,

The exact minimum draft will depend on when each vessel arrives in Yangon, as we have a range of charterers and cannot provide 24 separate quotes. We will do our best to provide estimates, but the variation depends on what we can procure on the spot.

It has been confirmed that we will not be able to access shallow draft ports, so that option is off the table for your vessels. Once we confirm what we can provide, we will get back to you. Please feel free to contact me directly with any questions.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thanks for the information! We'll be waiting to hear back.

Best regards,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 25,000MT Crude Oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 25,000MT Crude Oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao

email_chain.subject: Offer for 25,000MT Crude Oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao
email_chain.body:

We will be offering USD42.3M for the purchase of 25,000MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao.

Our final approval will be 5 PM Beijing time on the 29th.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Award of Crude Oil Deal
email_chain.body:
Dear Chris,

We would like to congratulate you on being awarded the spot for our latest deal. This document will be signed by our legal department on our behalf, and you can expect your VOSTRO or IOU document soon. Please refer to this as attachment A.

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Award of Crude Oil Deal
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Henry,

We’re having some minor paperwork delays at our end, but we hope to have the deal finalized before the end of the month.

Regards,
George

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear George,

We’ve received our IOU documents from Mr. Wang and have made payment to the seller. Hope the deal will be finalized soon.

Regards,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Chris,

Thank you so much for letting us know. Will you please send us an updated timeline so that we can ensure that all our other work is finished on time?

Regards,
George

email_chain.subject: Clarification on P20 Alloy Steel Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wang,

Thank you for your quote on the 22,500MT shipment of P20 alloy steel from Wuhan to the UK. However, I need clarification on a few details:

1. Will your ship arrive directly at our warehouse in England?
2. Could you please clarify the laycan for this shipment?
3. Does the quoted price include insurance, container handling, and stowage fees?

Please let me know at your earliest convenience. Once clarified, we will proceed with sending the necessary documents and signing the LLO this week.

Yours sincerely,
Joyce

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on P20 Alloy Steel Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Joyce,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the 22,500MT P20 alloy steel shipment from Wuhan to the UK. To address your questions:

1. The vessel will arrive at the UK port, and we can arrange for onward transportation to your warehouse if needed.
2. The laycan for this shipment is 40 days from the date of departure.
3. The quoted price does not include insurance, container handling, or stowage fees. However, we can arrange full insurance coverage for the shipment at an additional cost of approximately US$5,000. I will send you the policy details before the shipment departs.

Please let me know if you require any further information.

Best regards,
Wang

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Mrs. Tohrington,

We are shipping a 40-foot container from Panama to Cherbourg. Could you please provide the total cost of shipping, warehousing, and freight clearance from the 21st to the 30th?

Kind regards,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,

I don’t understand why the client would want to send the container to Cherbourg when it can be delivered to Antwerp. Are there only two locations we can send the container? Could you please check the ports listed in the project description?

Thank you,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Ana,

The only two ports listed in the description are Cherbourg and Antwerp.

Thanks,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,

Yes, that is correct. We can send the container to either Cherbourg or Antwerp as per the project description.

Thank you,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Ana,

Thank you for your confirmation. The client has asked us to use the cheapest option available. Could you please advise the total cost of shipping, warehousing, and freight clearance from the 21st to the 30th for both ports listed in the project description?

Kind regards,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,

I will send you a quote with the cheapest option from the ports listed in the project description. The quote will include the cost of storage and freight clearance.

Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for 40-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Ana,

Please let me know what your quote looks like. We will need to ship from the 21st to the 30th. Are all the costs included?

Thank you,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Johan,

We’re interested in shipping 700MT of fertilizers from Livorno to Kavala. Could you provide your rate ideas? Additionally, is your vessel flexible on partial loading windows?

Sincerely,
Alexis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexis,

Yes, we can handle the entire quantity. Regarding partial loading windows, for Livorno, you could berth between the 8th and 10th of March. If needed, we can adjust the schedule to accommodate more vessels before that date.

For Kavala, you could berth between the 1st and 5th of April, and the rest of the cargo could be loaded between the 5th and 7th of April, or any day within the month. I will check with our Chief Technical Officer to confirm if our vessels can accommodate this schedule.

Best regards,
Johan

email_chain.subject: Re: Kavala - Livorno
email_chain.body:
Hello, dear Alexis.

I was surprised to receive your inquiry. Is this serious? Livorno to Kavala? At FAO, I can only sell up to 50 tonnes per month. It's a common limitation for a small ship like mine. The rest is just theoretical. You are the first inquiry I've received for this route in the last 10 years.

Best regards,
Sendan

email_chain.subject: Shipment Completion and Freight Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

We have successfully shipped over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products to Nigeria via Ms. Prudence and DHL Express under DTEPCO orders. The shipment was completed yesterday, and the customers have already received the goods. Could we proceed with negotiations regarding the freight charges?

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipment Completion and Freight Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

I hope this message finds you well. I am following up on my previous email regarding the shipment of over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products to Nigeria. The shipment was completed successfully, and the goods have been received by the customers. I would appreciate it if we could discuss the freight charges at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Freight Negotiation for Recent Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

I am writing to urgently request a discussion on the freight charges for the recent shipment of over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products to Nigeria. The shipment was completed successfully, and the customers have confirmed receipt of the goods. Please let me know a suitable time for us to negotiate the freight terms.

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Final Reminder: Freight Negotiation for Recent Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

This is a final reminder regarding the freight negotiation for the recent shipment of over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products to Nigeria. The shipment was completed successfully, and the customers have received the goods. I kindly request your prompt attention to this matter so we can finalize the freight terms.

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cargo Release and Payment Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

A bale with a gross weight of 70,000 kg is awaiting delivery at a pier in the port of Genoa. The commodity was imported on board your vessel 'JCM SCANDALING', for which your bill of lading #59751 was issued. However, the freight forwarder now requests to be paid against release of the cargo and requests you to take immediate action to complete the proceedings.

The owner is unable to carry this cargo due to a lack of availability of off-hire time. The ship owner expects that his off-hire time be properly calculated. Our analysis reveals that there was a miscalculation in the calculation of days in port and days at sea which leads to underpayment.

Kindly be advised that upon the failure to process the claim for days in port and days at sea, the ship owner may take further action.

Best regards,
Customer Service

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Bill of Lading and Payment Instructions
email_chain.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

As per our e-mail dated 14 February 2017, we shall send a bill of lading to our office at ENEA GmbH, Sennestringer Str. 17, 29522 Drensteinfurt, Deutschland. We received a total number of 560,000 Metric Tonnes and shall send a bill of lading within 7 days. This mail is an update of our previous mail. Please be informed that we shall send a bill of lading only if you make the payment by internet banking to our account.

Please contact us if you require any further information.

Regards,
Customer Service

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up: Bill of Lading and Payment Instructions
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Schanzenböck,

I have received your email of 17th February and I am sorry to say that I have no information about the procedure for the bill of lading. Could you please provide further details or clarify the process?

Best regards,
[Your Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Pricing on Vessel Fixtures
email_chain.body:
Hi Elaine,

Thanks for the offers, but we would like to narrow it down to one. Could you please include the price of daily fixtures on all 3 vessels?

Warmly,
Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Vessel Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Elaine,

Thanks for your quick response. The June 17th and 18th departures are not within the acceptable range for us.

Also, the Island Escape looks a little cramped. Would like to know how long the morning and evening sailings are. The afternoon departure does not appear to be that much longer so would like to know what time the boat returns to the island. Could you please tell me what the dining arrangements are like? How many meals do you serve and when is breakfast, lunch and dinner served?

Thanks again for your assistance in helping us plan our trip.

Warmly,
Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Decision on Cruise Duration
email_chain.body:
Hi Elaine,

I have thought about your proposals very carefully. We are in the market for a 1/2 day cruise only. I see no need to spend a lot of time on a 3 hour round trip.

Warmly,
Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Cruise Choices and Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hi Elaine,

Here are the cruise choices we have reviewed on our list of suggestions and rated accordingly:

- Aji: $11
- Cape Whale: $39
- Chaya: $39
- Cruise One: $12
- Chatham: $35

As you can see, these are fairly nominal expenses and you needn't worry about us spending money at each restaurant. To make the rates more transparent, we have included the dollar sign in front of the number.

Warmly,
Jeanette Kuhn

email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

Thanks again,
Atul

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Potassium Ferrate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

I just wanted to follow up on my inquiry regarding the 5,000MT of potassium ferrate from Skaw to Plymouth. Since we will be looking to schedule the ship for late July, I wanted to make sure that it is possible to sail the 37,000DWT ship to Plymouth if the conditions are suitable.

We would be looking for top-quality product and any insight on potential suppliers would be most helpful.

Thanks again,
Atul

email_chain.subject: Potassium Ferrate 50% Solutions Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

I hope you are well. As we all know that time is short in July, we are looking for a supplier of potassium ferrate 50% solutions for shipment from Rotterdam to Newcastle. The shipping company we use has strict rules regarding 37,000DWT max draft, so we are looking for solutions that could be shipped.

We would also need to discuss price as it has increased substantially since I last spoke.

Please let me know if you can help.

Martin

email_chain.subject: Request for Preliminary Quote and FOB Terms
email_chain.body:
Hey Eddy,

We’re looking to ship 2,700MT of specialty chemicals from Marseille to Casablanca. Could you provide a preliminary quote and confirm if you handle port dues under FOB terms?

We hope to hear from you soon!

Warmly,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Preliminary Quote and FOB Terms
email_chain.body:
Thanks Melissa,

I’ll have our team look into this for you. Could you please send us the following:

- Order type: 1. 'Forward-to-Shore' 2. 'Lift-On/Lift-Off' 3. 'Shore-to-Shore'
- Cargo Volume/Weight
- Route, Origin, Destination, and Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA)
- Preferred Carrier Names for each shipper and carrier per lane

We look forward to working with you soon!

Kind regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Terminal in Fos, Marseille
email_chain.body:
Dear Eddy,

I’d like to know more about your terminal in Fos, Marseille.

Specifically, I’d like to understand your entry/exit procedures for containers. Do you have a free zone? And, what does a 20-foot container’s dimensions look like?

Thanks!

Regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Terminal in Fos, Marseille
email_chain.body:
Thanks Sam,

We have two terminals in Fos, Marseille:

- Fos-Port Express Terminal:
  This terminal is ideally situated at the maritime Port of Fos, and is only a short walk from the Marseille/Provence Airport, only 45 minutes away, to the North. It is the perfect base to distribute goods to the following countries: Italy, Portugal, Spain, Germany, Ireland, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Greece, Finland, Malta, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Austria, and the United Kingdom. Here, we offer both a sea and an air access point, including access to the MED terminal with two docks for 40’ and 20’ shipping containers. We’re also one of the few terminals in the area that can accept high cube containers on all of our shelves.

- Fos-Port International Terminal:
  This terminal is easily accessible.

Regards,
Eddy

email_chain.subject: Customs Documentation Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Urea Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Thanks for your email, Jon. If you are sure about the 5,500MT urea shipment and it's a godown receipt, that's okay for us. Please advise the loading port of the shipment. I will then handle the shipment with our local representative at Damietta. You can also suggest a transit agent. The loading and offloading is available anytime except Saturday. Could you advise freight rate and laytime accordingly? If the shipment is on CNF basis, I would like to have the discount rate for my cargo vessel. Kindly let me know of the demurrage free period. Thank you for your cooperation. Yours truly, Yusuf

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. El-Maghraby, Thank you for your email of the 10th of September, 2001. Please note that the urea loading at Damietta was not effective. We must be treated as cancel and the consignee is required to pay the freight for the shipment. Please send us full list of the cancellation by email. We would like to keep the order and ship it immediately. Please note that the shipment should be paid for before loading as it was the last option for us to avoid losing the shipment and earn freight from other shippers. Thanks and Kind regards, Yusuf

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. El-Maghraby, Thank you for your email of the 10th of September, 2001. I appreciate your help and I will try my best to keep this consignment alive. I have already informed the owner of the vessel. We would be very thankful for your assistance and cooperation. Best Regards, Ahmed

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Evans,

I'd like to inquire about your availability for a bulk cargo carrying one of your vessels from Yokohama to Rotterdam on the 5th of next month. I'd like to take 50,000MT of urea and 20,000MT of ethylene at a max value of 50 USD/ton. Do you have any availability for this?

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rodriguez,

Thank you very much for your message. My company has availability on the 10th of July from Yokohama to Rotterdam.

Unfortunately, I am afraid that the rates we can offer you would be 55 USD/ton for both urea and ethylene.

However, we would be glad to send you the terms and conditions of carriage and a pro-forma invoice for your inspection.

Please feel free to contact me for further discussion.

All the best,
Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Evans,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate you taking your time to send me the Terms and Conditions. I would like to see the Pro-forma invoice and we will discuss the cargo in the morning.

Best regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Thanks a lot for your message. Please find attached the terms and conditions of carriage for your review. The bill of lading would be issued once the pro-forma invoice is accepted.

Kind regards,
Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Offer for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Evans,

I have reviewed your proposal and would like to offer 55 USD/ton for urea and 25 USD/ton for ethylene. Also, I'd like the cargo to be loaded by forklift.

Can you please confirm my offer for further discussion?

Best regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Bulk Cargo Carrying
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

It is very important for us to clarify the terms and conditions on our side. I would like you to send us the required documents to perform the necessary due diligence before confirming your offer. The signed contract would only be issued once the documents are reviewed.

Kind regards,
Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Naphtha Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Wong,

I'm still waiting for your reply to my email from two weeks ago. Are you going to ship me 5,000MT of naphtha from Singapore to Yokohama? It was a no-risk situation for me. It's a 30-day trip. Would you agree to my proposed terms?

Best regards,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Naphtha Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Yasmine,

Thank you for emailing me. This email is to respond to your email from April 15th. What you are describing is indeed a no-risk deal. I am sorry that I have not responded earlier. I have been extremely busy with an engineering project for a European company that will start in September.

Our meetings can be changed to meet your needs. Let me know what days and times work for you. Please contact me at your earliest convenience.

Thank you again,
Stanley

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Naphtha Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wong,

My apologies for taking so long to reply to you. As you may have realized, we had a scheduled vacation and were delayed due to a family emergency. I will be able to meet you next week at your convenience. Please let me know a time and place that works for you.

Thank you,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Naphtha Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Thanks for your quick response. The timing is perfect. Let me know your preference. Are you planning on meeting at your office?

Thank you,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Stanley,

Our meeting is on the 8th of July. I will meet you at 8:00 PM at Kakinoki station.

Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Stanley,

Thank you so much for the presentation. I would like to continue discussing this deal. Let's talk again after I have evaluated it. This deal can create a long-lasting partnership between our companies.

Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Yasmine,

I'm glad that the presentation went well. I will be contacting you later this week regarding the meeting. Thanks again.

Stanley

email_chain.subject: Request for LNG Shipment Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wong,

What does it take to ship 4,500 MT of LNG from Singapore to Myanmar? Could you provide me with a quotation as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LNG Shipment Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

We appreciate your request. The best price we can offer for a 4,500 MT LNG shipment is $22,000 per MT. The total price would be 4,500 * $22,000 = $99,000,000.

We hope we can work with you and would be happy to handle the shipment. Please contact me if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Super

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipment Weight
email_chain.body:
Hello Super,

According to the contract, we have to pay an extra $1 per MT if the weight of the ship exceeds 1,000 MT. Do you have any suggestions for reducing the weight of the ship?

Thank you very much!
Maria

email_chain.subject: Delay in Cargo Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wong,

We are pleased to inform you that the delivery of the cargo has been delayed due to a mechanical problem with the ship. We need an additional 3 days to resolve the issue and complete the repairs. Please send us the invoice for the cargo as per the contract.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Super

email_chain.subject: Urgent Inquiry: Freight Rate for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:

With best regards,
Amado

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Inquiry: Freight Rate for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Amado,

Thank you for contacting us. Our freight rates would be determined based on the following information:
- Shipping Date
- Shipping Port
- Vessel Name
- Gross Tonnage
- Vessel Type
- Draft
- Cargo Contents
- Bunker Rate
- Port of Discharge

Please confirm this information with us at your earliest convenience.

With regards,
Monica

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Inquiry: Freight Rate for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Monica,

The dyes to be shipped are as follows:
- 200 MT of Yellow Dye
- 1,500 MT of Black Dye
- 2,000 MT of Purple Dye
- 1,000 MT of Green Dye
- 1,000 MT of Pink Dye

The requested vessel is TS 786, a Capesize vessel capable of carrying a total of 65,000 MT of cargo. Its draft is 18 meters, and it is scheduled to depart from Rotterdam. It will arrive in Corpus Christi on June 2nd. I urgently need the shipment to reach Rotterdam as soon as possible. Could you offer me the most competitive price?

Best regards,
Amado

email_chain.subject: Offer for Butane Shipment
email_chain.body:
Morning Ms. Bell,

We are pleased to offer you 1,750MT of butane from Mangalore to Antwerp. We have received the port to port data of the below-cited cargo:

- CPT Odisha Panamax: 45,000 CBM, 1,750 MT
- Atchison Oshima Panamax: 45,000 CBM, 1,750 MT
- Beirut RoRo: 35,000 CBM, 1,750 MT

Could you advise if this is the type of cargo you're looking for, and provide us with your port to port and FOB prices, taking into account that for your customers we offer a 3% discount, and your IRR from vessel?

Best regards,
Harman

email_chain.body:
Dear Harman,

Thank you for your email and the FOB prices you quoted. We agree on a price of $990 USD per ton. We would like to work with you on our next shipment. Please advise the port to port price of the following items:

- Port: Itajaí, CME Type: 3, RTSS: STP
- Port: Achilleas, CME Type: 1 / 2
- Port: Exige, CME Type: 2
- Port: Beirut, CME Type: RoRo
- Port: Irving, CME Type: 1 / 1
- Port: Santorini, CME Type: 2 / 1

- Port: UMM, CME Type: 1 / 1

Best regards,
Ms. Bell

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Butane Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Bell,

Thank you for your email. Please confirm the dates in the following table for the shipment of the goods ordered:

- Dates: 19.08.19 - 31.08.19
- Dates: 19.08.19 - 30.08.19
- Dates: 18.08.19 - 25.08.19
- Dates: 18.08.19 - 24.08.19

We are willing to work on these dates and our IRR will be 4.9%.

Kind regards,
Harman

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Butane Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Harman,

Please send a copy of the contract to your email.

Yours sincerely,
Ms. Bell

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Butane Shipment
email_chain.body:

Thank you for the signed contract and the 30% deposit in advance. We're sending you a confirmation for your document. Please send the remaining payment in 10 working days.

Harman

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Harman,

Please note that for our security measures and for our company's comfort, we'd like to meet you in order to learn more about you as our supplier. We kindly request that you send us an email with your availability as soon as possible, along with a copy of your documents.

We appreciate your patience with us. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Kind regards,
Ms. Bell

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Meeting and Documents
email_chain.body:

We are pleased to offer you 300MT of butane to work with you on our next shipment. Please send us your following documents and relevant information:

- Terms of payments: 30% deposit and the rest by SWIFT transfer in 30 days.

Best regards,

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Engineering Team

We will charge $5 per ton for each day we miss the 6-day laycan, and can accept the shipment ASAP. Please let me know if you have any questions, otherwise I can ship within a week.

James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about MS High Hope Oil Spillage
email_chain.body:
Good morning Dina,

Have you heard about the oil spillage of MS High Hope last week in the Gulf of Mexico? Any details you can share?

Regards,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about MS High Hope Oil Spillage
email_chain.body:
Hi Dina,

I've just heard about the oil spill from my girlfriend. It's alarming how such disasters can occur unexpectedly, especially in the Gulf of Mexico. This reminds me of the Deepwater Horizon incident last year, where the government's response was commendable.

I am from Washington State. How do you cope with such oil spills from ships? Thanks for your assistance.

Best regards,
Christophe

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Mr. Nelson,

I need to send a cargo of 15,000MT of wheat from New York to Manila. Would you be able to arrange demurrage-free laytime at a total cost of 5.5% of freight?

Kindly acknowledge.

Regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Office Closure Notice
email_chain.body:
Our offices will be closed at 2pm on Friday afternoon. All deliveries will be held until Tuesday at our disposal. We hope that you will understand our decision to make this change and are certain that we will continue to do good business together.

Thanks,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Meeting Document Link
email_chain.body:
The link to the document for our meeting is attached. I hope that we will be able to finalize the details tomorrow and we will continue to do good business together.

Best regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Offer Status and Required Changes
email_chain.body:
I've just received the status on your offer. The following changes are required:
- The per ton container rates should be reduced to $500.
- The preferred delivery days for the cargo are every Monday and Thursday.
- We will receive the cargo at a $40 per day demurrage fee.
- I'd like to negotiate to reduce the demurrage fee to $20 per day for containers that are not used within a period of 30 days.
- I hope we can use the $40 per ton that you offered last week, but I would like to receive the FCA receipt for the containers as soon as possible.

I hope we can continue to do good business together.

Kind regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Required Changes
email_chain.body:
We hope that you are well. The following changes are required:
- Our desired delivery days are every Monday and Thursday.

Please confirm if these changes can be accommodated.

Best regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Laycan Estimates and Billing Performance
email_chain.body:
Hello William Wider,

Our latest UPS files have you assigned to date for all of our shipments. This is not typical of your billing performance, so we have started looking for alternate carriers. I think the problem is with your laycan estimates. Can you update them by about 2 weeks?

Please reply as soon as possible, as we are getting some interesting proposals from other carriers.

Kind regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Laycan Estimates and Billing Performance
email_chain.body:
Thanks Charles,

I'm getting back to you as soon as I can. The weather in the Northeast is terrible right now and will be for a while. All the Metro stations in the Northeast are shut down due to the adverse weather. Not only has the weather impacted my ability to access my email, but it has also adversely affected my laycan estimates.

Many of the hubs have changed their flight schedules to allow for extra time, and I will have to update those same laycan estimates as well as many of our other hubs. I will send you a brief report of those adjustments soon. However, in the meantime, I just wanted to let you know that the extra time needed to get these estimates to you by today is due to the weather situation.

Thanks again for your help.

Regards,
William

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Laycan Estimates and Billing Performance
email_chain.body:
Thanks for letting me know.

I'll follow up with you later today or tomorrow to discuss further.

Best regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Business Expansion Discussion
email_chain.body:
Good morning Rob,

Broker Inc is actually our parent company, and we currently represent XX in the North/South Trade. We would like to grow our business by expanding south to Mexico.

I would love to chat about business expansion. Next time you are in town, could you call so we can talk?

Best Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Business Expansion Discussion
email_chain.body:
Good morning Daniel!

I will be in town next week and would love to see you! How about Thursday at 3pm at your office? I know this is short notice, but I am not familiar with your city, and this is the first time I am coming to this area. I would love to learn about your market before investing!

Looking forward to seeing you,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Business Expansion Discussion
email_chain.body:
Good morning Rob,

I would love to catch up on Thursday! Our offices are open until 3:30, and your meeting is at 3pm. I hope this time works for you, and I look forward to meeting you!

Best Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Crude Shipment from Syria to Tanger
email_chain.body: Hi Mateo, Are you still planning a 10,000MT shipment of crude from Syria to Tanger to load on the 24th of December? I’ve got a berth on P3 SCS at Tilbury, but the laycan on the vessel is the 24th of January. I’d be happy to offer an expedited rate to ensure this is ready on time. Cheers, Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Shipment from Syria to Tanger
email_chain.body: Thanks Matt, the information you provided is very helpful. I’m still discussing the delivery time with the vessel owner and will get back to you later. Regards, Mateo

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Shipment from Syria to Tanger
email_chain.body: Hi Mateo, Thanks for your message. Here are the details for TILBURY2: WED 10:00, TC3, 85,000 M/MT, Stow: 57,000 M/MT, LO/LO, Out 120.15 Metre (Beam 22.5m x Length 200.0m), Capacity: 90,000 DWT; 3, 5 x 3000m3 Blm. Manoeuvrability: 55m off Container Carriers; 40m off product carriers with 110-140 meters swinging radius. Speed: 15.5 knots. IMO Type: 1976. EIGAG Rating Certificate Number: UR.

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Shipment from Syria to Tanger
email_chain.body: Hi Matt, thanks for your message. There is no ETA yet for our vessel. She is currently preparing to head south after unloading her entire cargo in Batam. We’re hoping to make a decision on her next port of call in about a week or so. Regards, Mateo

email_chain.subject: RE: Re: Helena
email_chain.body: Hi Mateo, Thank you for your email. I am not sure that we will be able to commit to the Sierra Leone berth that you have suggested. After extensive research, I am not sure it will be possible for Helena to hold a berth. We have not contracted any berths at Sierra Leone as of yet. We are trying to organize a berth at Sierra Leone, but this is only in process. There are strong rumors that there will not be a berth for us there, and I have not found any information that states otherwise. Helena is not even on the carriers that Sierra Leone regularly uses.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Tabitha,

We hope to see you next year. Please provide your price for 10,000 loads from Rio to Algeciras. If you are not interested, could you share the names of your shipping companies so we can contact them directly?

Yours sincerely,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Tabitha,

Is this a good time for you to meet and discuss the details? Please contact me to confirm the next day's schedule.

Yours sincerely,
John

email_chain.subject: Availability Update
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I will not be available until August 7. I will provide my office number then.

Thanks,
Gladys

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

I will meet you tomorrow at 11 am at the local hotel.

Yours sincerely,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Cheque Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hi Tabitha,

I will come to your office tomorrow to deliver the cheque.

Yours sincerely,
John

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Plastic Bales from Ningbo to Jingtang
email_chain.body:
Hey Harold,
