Ed

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation on Container Shipping from Ningbo to USA
email_chain.body:
Hello Harold,

I would like to purchase a 40' container for shipping our finished plastic products from Ningbo to the United States. Additionally, I need a quote for a 20' container to be loaded with resin at our facility in Ningbo and shipped to the USA. I prefer using a new ISO container.

I am attaching the detailed loading plan, and the bill of lading will be sent shortly. Could you provide a preliminary quotation for FOB to CIF or Door to Door rates?

Regards,
Gordon

email_chain.subject: Quotation Request for 18' Container from Ningbo to US West Coast
email_chain.body:
Hi Harold,

I am planning to ship an 18' container from Ningbo to the West Coast of the US. The cargo will consist of plastic pipes and fittings. Could you please provide a preliminary quotation for Door to Door, FOB, and CIF rates?

Thank you,
Gordon

labels.commodity: plastic bales, finished plastic products, resin, plastic pipes and fittings
labels.discharge_port: Jingtang, United States, US West Coast

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 10,000MT Caustic Soda Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. John,

We have an inquiry for 10,000MT of caustic soda from Seoul to Busan. Could you provide a freight quote under CFR terms?

Warm regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 10,000MT Caustic Soda Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Daniel,

I have checked the material and a vessel will be available for your cargo from Seoul to Busan. Please confirm the following details:
- Pick-up port
- Named seaport
- Destination port
- Place of shipment
- Weight and quantity
- Vessel type
- Vessel schedule
- Vessel ETA

Additionally, as the delivery port has been changed from Busan to Pohang, this would be considered a different order. Therefore, we will need to prepare a new quote and documents.

We hope your inquiry will be settled soon.

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Request for Final Quote and Cargo Documents
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I need to send you a quote for the export of 10,000MT of caustic soda from Seoul to Busan. Please send me a quote as soon as possible.

Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cancelled Naphtha Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Helena,

It looks like you had a cargo of naphtha at Sikka loading in March, but your agent informed me that this was cancelled. Can you tell me why?

Best regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Naphtha Cargo and Payment Issues
email_chain.body:
Dear Helena,

Thank you so much for the update! The naphtha cargo is now secure, but I have another query. My charterer for this is a fickle customer and he never seems to pay his invoices. Could you please explain how they pay for cargoes? I want to know what I should do about the invoices he still owes me.

Best regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Update on Naphtha Cargo and Payment Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Hannah,

To the best of my knowledge, the invoices for this shipment have not yet been settled, and neither has any payment for the naphtha at Sikka. I will provide you with a full update as soon as I hear from them.

Best regards,
Helena

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Loading and Payment Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Helena,

The cargo loading at Sikka has now been confirmed, as has the container at Jebel Ali. But I must tell you, the payments for these cargoes are yet to arrive. I will advise you as soon as I have further news.

Best regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Contact Details

I will be at the office tomorrow, Thursday, at 11am. Hope to see you there.

Dirk

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo from Jubail to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

I have a 4,000MT cargo of bitumen loading from Jubail next week. We’re looking for vessels that can offer a 15-22 day transit.

Do you have any rate and vessel names that could match this request?

Regards,
Allan

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo from Jubail to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Allan,

Thanks for your email. Please accept our apologies for the delay in responding, but we have been so busy with work. I hope we haven’t over promised.

The cargo from Jubail needs to arrive in Qingdao by the 3rd August. We are only able to offer 11 days transit time. Our vessels go to Qingdao in 11 days. We also have a vessel arriving in Jubail in 11 days and we would like to arrange 800MT of bitumen loading from Jubail.

I have sent an email with a proposal of carriage to you.

Regards,
Alexandra

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo from Jubail to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alexandra,

Thank you for your email. There is a range of vessels arriving in Qingdao next week and they are able to provide an 11-day transit. We have a range of vessels available next week and the voyages are as follows:

Regards,
Allan

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Sugar Shipment from London to Paris
email_chain.body: Adina, Please provide a quote to move 150MT of sugar from London to Paris via train. We are hoping to schedule this shipment for 3 months from now. Thank you, Hugo

email_chain.body: Adina, Please provide a quote to move 60MT of timber from Copenhagen to St. Petersburg via barge. We are hoping to schedule this shipment for 3 months from now. Thank you, Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Gravel Shipment from Stockholm to Moscow
email_chain.body: Adina, Please provide a quote to move 20MT of gravel from Stockholm to Moscow via train. We are hoping to schedule this shipment for 3 months from now. Thank you, Peter

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Soybeans Shipment from Oslo to Vilnius
email_chain.body: Adina, Please provide a quote to move 90MT of soybeans from Oslo to Vilnius via train. We are hoping to schedule this shipment for 3 months from now. Thank you, Anna

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Flowers Shipment from Riga to Oslo
email_chain.body: Adina, Please provide a quote to move 10MT of flowers from Riga to Oslo via train. We are hoping to schedule this shipment for 3 months from now. Thank you, Anna

email_chain.subject: Request for Terms and Rates for Baku to Rotterdam Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Luisa,

We have a small shipment from Baku to Rotterdam. Could you get me the agreed terms for the requested dates, and could you confirm your rates for similar cargoes?

Regards,
Jennifer

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Terms and Rates for Baku to Rotterdam Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Jennifer,

I can’t believe it’s already Tuesday. It feels like yesterday that you were with us. The first few weeks at Questor have gone by so fast and I am feeling the pangs of guilt for not spending more time with you, but it is amazing how busy we are and so many great things are happening. We’ve got a couple of interviews with editors soon, including the Editor in Chief at Apple Daily. (She’s my favorite.) We are in the midst of rewriting the first 10% of the book and my draft is coming together nicely, even if it is taking me double the time that it used to. We are talking about that again with the editors at dinner tonight. I am hoping that I can turn the manuscript in by the end of March. I have been taking a bit of time to revamp my job description and to adjust my salary expectations, and this afternoon.

Regards,
Luisa

email_chain.subject: Loading Date Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Thanks for the enquiry. I can confirm the loading date is Monday, April 8th. Do you wish to forward the bill of lading and invoice?

Regards,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Sample Bill of Lading and Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Thanks for your enquiry. Please find a sample Bill of Lading below and further details on the link provided. This is the general document we use to load and ship containers to Europe.

Please let us know if you have any further questions, and we will be happy to assist.

Kind regards,
Rachel

Regarding Loading Term, please find below. For the consignee's main port, Fos, please.
Please also note that due to current market conditions, we require clearance of containers as soon as they arrive in the US port. For more details, please see below.

Kind regards,
Jyoti

email_chain.subject: Final Invoice
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Here is the final invoice. Do you wish me to raise the loading charges as well?

Regards,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Loading Charges
email_chain.body:

Attached are the loading charges for the containers. All other costs have been adjusted in the original booking.

Natalie

email_chain.subject: LPG Tank Operation on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Thomas,

It appears that you will need to operate one of your LPG tanks on the 12th of April. Is that correct?

Let us know if you have any questions.

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: LPG Tank Operation on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hi Eric,

How are you doing?

I have a tank size of 800 gal LPG, and the original filler hose is 1.25″. Can you supply a larger one to connect to our tanks?

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Giovanni

email_chain.subject: Re: LPG Tank Operation on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hello Giovanni,

A 1.25″ hose will probably work just fine. However, 800 gal is relatively small, as that is about the size of tanks designed for residential or small home business establishments.

I would be willing to give you a quote for a 1.25″ hose and a second one. I would need to measure it to determine the exact size.

If you would like to proceed with the order, I could have it ready for you by tomorrow morning.

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: LPG Tank Operation on April 12
email_chain.body:
Thanks, Eric.

I will wait for your response.

Regards,
Giovanni

email_chain.subject: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Marsden,

Our customer in Hanoi is interested in having 3,000MT of chemical fertilizer delivered from Qingdao to Hanoi as soon as possible. Would you be able to provide us with an immediate quote?

Thanks,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Andy,

The ocean rate from Qingdao to Vietnam is currently around US$20,000 for 3,000MT. The bill of lading would be ready in a couple of days. Alternatively, we could arrange break-bulk with a smaller vessel at US$25,000. The delivery would take approximately 30 days, and air transportation costs would need to be considered.

Please let us know if this fits your requirements.

Sincerely,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

We are very interested in moving forward with a firm deal. Could you please provide your bank information so that we can deposit a cheque?

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Andy,

Thank you for your email. Below is the information for the wire transfer:

Bank Address: Industrial Bank Co Ltd, No.2 Building, No.3 Section, Industrial Bank Bank of China, Tianjin Branch
BIC Code: BKTCPEBJ

Please let us know once the deposit is made.

Sincerely,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the bank details. We have a customer who is very interested in the chemical fertilizer and would like to proceed with the shipment. Could you confirm the quote and provide the bill of lading as soon as possible?

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Quote - Chemical Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Andy,

The ocean rate from Qingdao to Vietnam remains at US$20,000 for 3,000MT. The bill of lading will be ready in a couple of days. Alternatively, we can arrange break-bulk with a smaller vessel at US$25,000. The delivery will take approximately 30 days, and air transportation costs will need to be considered.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Sincerely,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Request for Coal Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Shah,

Could you please fix 50,000MT of coal from Jeddah to Busan, including B/L with INCOTERMS DAF, DDU, and DDP? Would you mind letting us know your preliminary quote?

Best wishes,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Coal Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Nick,

We have received your enquiry. Thank you for contacting us. I am checking the availability of your items and will get back to you shortly.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Request for MGO Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mathur,

We are in talks with an oil exporter who would like to purchase 50,000MT of MGO from Busan to Jeddah. We are looking for a suitable carrier who could transport 1 x 8000mt + 1 x 9000mt to BAP Jeddah from Busan. We expect to commence load preparation within 48 hours and would like a vessel call ready on 16th October. Please quote us your best offer.

With regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for MGO Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Namrata,

We have considered your enquiry for the supply of 1 x 8000mt + 1 x 9000mt MGO from Busan to Jeddah and have presented a competitive and attractive proposal in terms of price and delivery, which we are attaching herewith.

As we are very confident that our proposal will meet your specific needs, we hope that you will let us know your view on the matter within the next two days, and we can take it from there.

Meanwhile, if you would like to know more, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Ms. Mathur

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for MGO Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mathur,

Thanks a lot for your detailed reply and the competitive quote. We are keen on this deal as our client has expressed the urgency and importance of this matter. Please consider this shipment in our cargo.

Best regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about 2,000MT Capacity for Rock Salt from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

Do you have 2,000MT capacity available for transporting rock salt from Rotterdam to Dalian, China, on the same run as mentioned in your previous letter?

Thanks,
Ted

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about 2,000MT Capacity for Rock Salt from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:

Yes, we do have the capacity, but we are currently in the high season and are fully booked for the next three months.

Thank you,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about 2,000MT Capacity for Rock Salt from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

Thanks for your reply. I just wanted to check if your freight program might be out of date, as I thought you had plenty of capacity available this summer.

Best regards,
Ted

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability and Charter Party Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Okabe,

Please confirm that your vessel is still available to load 6,000MT of rapeseed oil from Gdańsk to Izmir. Could you also confirm the off-hire charge and any demurrage on the charter party?

Regards,
Denys

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability and Charter Party Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Denys,

I received your email. Could you please provide me with the vessel name? I will forward this information to Ms. Elizabeth for her response. We are happy to handle this cargo. As Ms. Elizabeth is currently busy with her routine work, could you kindly provide her contact information? I do not have access to her personal email.

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading Cost Calculation Options
email_chain.body:

Your Demurrage invoice for 8,000MT of sugar from Santos to Libreville was calculated based on the following factors:

- DP Charge: $4,700
- Demurrage: $3,100
- Total Due: $8,014.80

Please find below various scenarios for your potential bill of lading selections:

1. 8,000MT of sugar at $x.12/Metric Ton from Santos to Libreville would result in:

Best regards,
Andie Soliani

email_chain.subject: Case 21-20326: 3DAYLY LLC Bankruptcy Filing
email_chain.body:
In re: Case 21-20326: In the matter of 3DAYLY LLC and its related entities and affiliates

On April 27, 2021, 3DAYLY LLC and its related entities and affiliates ('Debtors') filed voluntary petitions for relief under Chapter 11 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of New York (the 'Bankruptcy Court').

The Debtors are a worldwide customer delivery company operating in five different industries, including transportation (trucking), e-commerce (last mile delivery), financial technology (crypto-currency payments), and hospitality and transportation services (chauffeur services and transportation services). The Debtors have a combined fleet of 800,000 vehicles and are headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, with operations in California, Canada, Massachusetts, and other locations.

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Bill of Lading Details
email_chain.body:
Sincere apologies for the delay in sharing the 2nd & 3rd emails you had requested. I will send an email with those details shortly. If you have further questions, please let me know.

On the detailed email, I requested the following information:

- Date: 5/17/21
- Time: 10:20 am
- Contact: Andie Soliani
- Subject: Re: The details for your Bill of Lading selections

Email 1:
1. To: [email protected] and cc me
2. Subject: Bill of Lading Cost Calculation Options
3. You will then see my format with the 3 options below.

Email 2: In re: Case 21-20326: In the matter of 3DAYLY LLC and its related entities and affiliates.

email_chain.subject: Case 21-20326: 3DAYLY LLC Chapter 15 Filing
email_chain.body: Prior to filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of New York, 3DAYLY LLC and its related entities and affiliates ('Debtors') filed a voluntary petition for relief under Chapter 15 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code in the District Court for the Southern District of Texas ('State Court'). The Debtors' application for recognition in the State Court provided that, after an appropriate motion was made, the Debtors sought a stay of proceedings in the State Court under 11 U.S.C. § 1501(a). In response, on March 29, 2021, the State Court issued an order granting the stay. After the State Court entered the stay, the Debtors immediately requested that the automatic stay and the automatic conversion under 28 U.S.C. § 1471(a) take effect.

email_chain.body:
Hi Eva,

My colleague managed to confirm a 7,100MT kerosene cargo from Rotterdam to Las Palmas in early September, and it's already locked in.

Have a nice day!

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: New load from Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Thanks Mark for letting me know the confirmation for the kerosene cargo. It's not to our liking, but looks like we will have to take it.

I talked to my client and asked her to look into finding a better cargo for our next shipment.

Thanks,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: New load from Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

Your clients asked me to inform you that there are no spot cargoes going to Las Palmas, but if the 7,100MT is enough, it's not too bad. The 7,100MT is what our client needs as it's the minimum load size for their buyer.

The next issue we have is the routing. The kerosene cargo coming from Rotterdam to Las Palmas should have changed its routing to Tangier to cover a higher proportion of distance and fuel saving. The amendment is not allowed, and it's not a good thing.

We have got a ship that can load cargoes for you in two weeks. If we make it, will you be able to get the cargo and load it in the time frame?

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: New load from Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Mark,

I will ask my client to find out if they can agree to get the load from Tangier to Las Palmas. Will let you know as soon as we know the answer.

Thanks,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Please confirm the cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Eva,

Thanks for your mail and sorry to bother you again.

Our client told me that they will have to use the same routing as the kerosene cargo. I suggest if you can take it, and let's try to find a better load for our next shipment.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Our next cargo from Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark,

My client can't find a better cargo than the kerosene cargo, and if the routing to Las Palmas is not going to change, we will have to proceed with it.

Regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Technical Issue: Event Store SDK Warning
email_chain.body: Team, I’ve encountered a warning message while using the Event Store SDK. The message reads: 'Checking out with the payment method `eventstoredb` failed: No order number available due to `limit=50`.' This was triggered when executing the `TriggerModule.SaveOrderAsync` trigger module. The module creates an order number based on the process ID and event identifier, but it cannot proceed if the order limit is reached. You can ignore the message, but ensure your triggers are functioning correctly or adjust the settings. An order number is required for the transactional store. Consider using the `TrackingModule` to set an order number. Refer to the 'Tutorial: Business Event Order Processing' for more details. Regards, Cooper

email_chain.body:
Hi Bruno,

Sorry to hear that you had some problems with the shipment of rubber. It's a bit concerning, but I'll pass this information on to the Sales team.

However, we have a delivery schedule for our last consignment, and that will be complete by this time next month. We're currently working with the latest information we have from the Banjarmasin port, and I've got a meeting this morning with the yard team to discuss potential delays.

Please call me if you have any concerns.

All the best,
Kim

Raymond

email_chain.subject: Java Applet for Video Clipping
email_chain.body: This email contains a Java applet for making a short clip of any size from a video file. At the beginning of the clip, a button labeled 'Start' appears, and once the user clicks on this button, the clip begins to play. During the clip, the button will change to 'Pause' if the user pauses the clip, and then change back to 'Start' to start the clip again. It is also possible to advance the clip by clicking on the little slider on the right. The clip must be no longer than 10 seconds, but the user can resize the video in any way he likes. The applet works in Chrome, Firefox, and Internet Explorer.

email_chain.subject: Re: Java Applet for Video Clipping
email_chain.body:
Click on the image below to open a larger version.

Image A (Click to open the larger version.)
Image B (Click to open the larger version.)
Image C (Click to open the larger version.)

email_chain.subject: Re: Java Applet for Video Clipping
email_chain.body:
Click on the image below to open a larger version.

Image A (Click to open the larger version.)
Image B (Click to open the larger version.)
Image C (Click to open the larger version.)

email_chain.subject: Re: Java Applet for Video Clipping
email_chain.body: You will see four video clips here. Click on the videos in any order and then click on the 'Search' button. A new window will open with a video player. Click on the videos in any order and then click on the 'Search' button again. This time the new window will be for an image. The main window will close and the new window will display the name of the clip you clicked on last. It is possible to close the new window and click on another video to get the image for that video.

email_chain.body:

Thank you for your inquiry! I can confirm that we do have the capacity to ship 500 MT of sheets to Japan. The vessel is expected to depart on Thursday the 8th and arrive around the 15th. email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo
email_chain.body:
Morning Matthieu,

We’re looking to charter a 7,100MT cargo of bitumen from Jubail to Salalah for delivery in 2 months' time. Could you offer your best freight idea and vessel?

Regards,
Hans

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Hans,

Thank you for your inquiry. Below are some freight options and vessel types we can offer:

1. Sri Lanka-Italy at $40,000/MT
2. Sri Lanka-Istanbul at $39,000/MT
3. Sri Lanka-Dubai at $37,000/MT

As for the vessel, we can offer ECO Type, Safety Ship Type, and 20-year-old Clean Built Type.

For more details, please visit our website at http://www.kawashima-trading.com/Best_Prices_2007-05-24.html or http://www.kawashima-trading.com/About.htm.

Looking forward to hearing from you soonest.

Best regards,
Matthieu Kawashima, CEO
Kawashima Trading Corporation Inc.
Tel: +81-3

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

I checked the prices for bitumen on your website and noticed they are higher than the market average. The average price is USD 32,000/MT FOB Gulf, whereas the market average is USD 27,000/MT over the last 3-4 months. Additionally, prices in Europe are above USD 30,000/MT, while the average there is USD 22,000/MT FOB.

Could you please clarify the current pricing scenario? I have been following the Japanese market closely and even wrote my Master's thesis on the future of petroleum products in Japan. I have been quite impressed by your company.

Best regards,
Hans

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Hans,

It’s good to hear from you. Regarding the bitumen price, I believe it is not too high considering the recent price increase in Europe over the last month. Japan remains a strong market for bitumen, and demand is expected to stay high. However, I understand concerns about the recent fuel oil shortage, which has driven up product prices.

Your offer seems close to the market price, which is generally acceptable. For freight rates, please check our website at http://www.kawashima-trading.com/Default.aspx?menuid=32#cargo/spot.

Finding a vessel for the L.A. to JPN route has been challenging. We currently have limited availability.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

We haven’t received any other offers from ship owners. Given the importance of Japanese prices, we are aiming to deliver to Osaka by July 1st and then to Port Said by August 7th. However, due to shipping delays in Europe, the vessel has been unable to dock on time at Incheon and Ningbo.

Could you confirm if you can accommodate this schedule?

Best regards,
Hans

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rates Inquiry for Spain

Hi Jane,

Regarding your question about shipping to the United States, there are specific rules and regulations depending on the type of product. If you have a client in Florida and need the products delivered within a month, we can explore faster shipping options. However, we would need detailed descriptions of the products to provide accurate advice.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Brakaldo Shipping

email_chain.subject: Representative Update and Follow-Up
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Lewis,

This is to confirm that we have informed Mr. Green that he will be on leave starting tomorrow. Currently, we do not have another representative assigned, but I will be handling his responsibilities in the interim. Please call me next week, and I will ensure you are connected with our top representative.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Sales Representative Introduction
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lewis,

I am John Doe, Director of Sales at Palinka Company. We have a long-standing business relationship, and I understand that you have requested a sales representative to represent your interests in our country. I am well-suited for this role, and my credentials are as follows:

1. Holder of a bachelor's degree in sales from the University of North Carolina.
2. Seven years of experience in sales.
3. Fluent in both English and Polish.
4. Consistently exceeded targets set by my previous employer.

I am prepared to relocate to your country immediately and begin work. My initial salary expectation is $2000 per month.

I look forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Your Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Lewis,

This is to confirm that I will take charge of your enquiry. Please provide details on the amount you wish to transact and the timeline you require, as previously discussed.

I will ensure the matter is handled promptly.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Customs Bond Requirement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. James,

I have just communicated with Mr. John. He informed me that his country's customs requires a $1 million bond for each shipment. We have confirmed that this is a common requirement among our clients' countries. Mr. John has been instructed to obtain the necessary documentation to resolve any potential customs issues.

Please advise on how you plan to proceed.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Jack Burns

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Bond Papers
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Doe,

As I mentioned earlier, Mr. Lewis's bank has contacted me, requesting that you ensure the bond papers are obtained from the client's company. Please call me to discuss your decision.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Update on Bond Papers
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Burns,

I have received your emails regarding the bond papers. Mr. John has informed me that he will not proceed without his boss's approval, and the papers must be signed by his superior before they can be sent to you. We will prioritize this matter and ensure the documents are sent on the first available flight. Please confirm the exact delivery address, and we will ensure timely delivery.

Thank you, and I look forward to continuing our successful business relationship.

Sincerely,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Investment Opportunity in Dry Bulk Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Corbin,

Do you plan to invest in the dry bulk shipping sector? Our selection process has begun, and we would appreciate your participation. Please let us know if you are interested.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Re: Investment Opportunity in Dry Bulk Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Vladimir,

Thank you for reaching out. The dry bulk finance market is currently experiencing a significant influx of capital, particularly from banks and investment firms based in Singapore. The key question is whether this increased volume of shipping loans will enhance returns for the sector and improve overall financing conditions. If you would like to discuss the potential risks and opportunities in more detail, please feel free to contact me.

Best regards,
Anatoliy

email_chain.subject: Re: Investment Opportunity in Dry Bulk Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Corbin,

The dry bulk finance market is indeed booming, with many shipping companies leveraging the low interest rate environment and increased demand for commodities. However, the low interest rates can also negatively impact profit margins, as companies earn less on their investments. Additionally, the decreasing demand for commodities is leading to higher costs due to unsold ships. To succeed in this market, it is crucial to focus on cost-cutting measures and improving operational efficiency.

Best regards,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Estimate

We have a request from a customer to ship 10,000MT of diesel from Port Klang to the Port of Vanikoro.

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Shipping Estimate Request

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Clinker Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Franco,

Can your vessel lift 10,000MT of clinker from Sohar to Mombasa? Also, do you apply a bunker escalation clause or keep a fixed rate?

Warm regards,
Paula

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: I'm looking for any information on CO2/C2/15. Your broker is unable to provide an immediate rate. The number of voyages they are currently running is a few per year. There have been quotes in the market for around $25,000/tonne, but we haven't yet had one of those accepted for our company.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: There are no current cargoes available, but we are working on it. Please stay tuned.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body:
I will not take 'no' for an answer! :-o

1. What is the daily rate?
2. What is the minimum booking/minimum cargo?
3. What is the bunker clause?
4. What is the CO2/H2/12 LCL?
5. What is the grain-specific LCL?
6. What is the minimum volume for CO2/C2/15?
7. Are the runs regular?

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: I do not know the bunker clause, and I have never seen a rate for CO2/C2/15, CO2/C2/14, or CO2/C2/13. I do not know if your company could obtain a quote. It is very strange to me that they do not know what their rates are. I assume there may be some competitive issues.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: I still don't have a rate. Our contacts at your company have no idea what their rates are. There were very few quotes in the market for CO2/C2/15. You will have to check with another carrier.

email_chain.body:

This is an automated confirmation that your payment was accepted for your shipment of coal from June 14 to July 15. We have posted a value date of 10/10/10 on our system. The delivery schedule will be within the stated parameters. Please keep a copy of this email for your records.

email_chain.subject: Insurance and Shipping Rates Inquiry for Portugal
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I have just contacted you about pallets of clothing going to Portugal. My first concern is about insurance. What’s your standard coverage, and would I be able to extend it beyond that if I needed to?

Also, is there a rate I need to know in advance so that I can inform the shippers what they will be paying?

Lastly, how long would it take for the shipment to reach the port of Lisbon?

Thank you!
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Insurance and Shipping Rates Inquiry for Portugal
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

For Portugal, standard insurance is $1.50 per kg. We can go as high as $2.50 per kg for $1500 shipping, which covers $3 per pallet.

Also, for Portugal, we do a pickup in Dallas or Houston, which we would need to know as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Mr. Vargas

John

Mr. Vargas

No.   Description           Qty     Unit        Length      Width     Height
----   ----------------     ------  ----------   ---------   -------   -------
1      Coil                1000MT  mtn         14000mm     2100mm    2200mm

Gwangyang Terminal Team

email_chain.subject: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:

How's the next LNG terminal coming along? Please confirm when you'll have your assessment of the option for Chile.

Thanks,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:
Hi Gabriel,

Good to hear from you. We had an internal meeting yesterday about projects. The press wants to know more about the supply and demand aspect of the E&P situation and whether the PEMEX operation in Trinidad and Tobago will be renewed. Do you have anything you can put together for them in an upcoming article?

We also discussed moving forward with the new supply/demand report. We want to look at the 2012 report first. This may involve getting some more data. However, after we review this, we will most likely look into continuing with the Latin America report.

Please let me know if you have any other suggestions or questions.

Looking forward to the next conversation.

Best regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:
Hi Eric,

How's the E&P report coming along? We have some additional data on the E&P facilities.

Best regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:
Eric,

Great. Let me know when you have the report in place, and I will send you a copy for our internal review.

Looking forward to the next conversation.

Best regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.body:

On behalf of a family friend in South Korea, we are looking to ship several pallets of goods from Daesan to Chicago in June. The shipment includes approximately 2,000kg of polyester filament yarn, 1,900kg of polyester filament yarn, and 700kg of acetate fiber. We need the shipment to arrive by June 8th. Please let us know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.body:

We are in need of purchasing a truck to transport materials for constructing a new road, but we don’t have enough funds to pay in cash. Could you assist us in securing a loan? Please find the attached documents for reference.

I am on duty until Friday and look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: API Integration Details
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I hope this email finds you well. As part of our integration process, we need to replicate the API usage scenario to test the shipment details. Please ensure that all necessary information is gathered to build a successful API call.

You can find all relevant API details under Tools > API Management > API Calls in your platform.

Best regards,
Allyn

email_chain.subject: API Call Setup
email_chain.body:
Hi Allyn,

I have gathered the necessary information to build the API call. Here are the steps we will follow:

1. Set up the Connector Client.
2. Create the API connection.
3. Build the API URL.
4. Set the API Key.
5. Configure the POST Request for Email as required.

Let me know if you need further details.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: API URL Construction
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the update. Let’s proceed with building the API URL. Please follow these steps:

1. Set up the URL from the Sample API URL.
2. Use the API Key and the route details to finalize the URL.

Once the URL is built, we can authenticate and send the request using the Connector Client.

Best regards,
Allyn

email_chain.subject: API Call Ready
email_chain.body:
Hi Allyn,

The API URL has been successfully built, and we are ready to authenticate and send the request using the Connector Client. Let me know if you need any further assistance.

Regards,
James

Have a great day!

Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: New Warehouse Location Announcement
email_chain.body:
Hi Dr. Tang,

I am pleased to announce that our new warehouse will be located in Shenzhen, within the customs area. The customs area refers to a designated zone where goods can be stored without being subject to customs duties until they are moved elsewhere.

The warehouse has 3 floors, with a total floor area of 1,600m². We will continue to supply high-quality, cost-effective products and offer competitive logistics services.

I hope you are well. Please visit us soon!

Yours sincerely,
Arthur

email_chain.subject: Update on New Factory Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Tang,

Thank you for your last email. We are currently on schedule with the new factory and plan to conduct tests next week. We hope to produce at least 4 samples, with 1 sample designated for testing. If all tests pass, we will begin full-scale manufacturing.

We will send out the samples next week, and you can test them at your lab. If there are any issues with the samples, we will adjust the manufacturing process accordingly.

Sincerely,
My Company

email_chain.body:

Thank you,
Ben

email_chain.subject: RLC Case Logging
email_chain.body:
Hello again Emilio,

I have heard from Logan at the dealership. He is taking the day off today, so I think he would like to discuss the case and log the RLC yourself if we are in agreement. Can we agree that it would be beneficial to log your own case for the evening?

Could you please let me know whether you wish to do this yourself or have a member of staff do it?

Please respond by Monday morning.

Thank you,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Fuel Pump Upgrade Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Emilio,

We are writing to inform you that we will be upgrading the fuel pump for your car to a more reliable model. This will be performed at 45,000 miles. Unfortunately, this is an inconvenience, as we have already offered to extend the warranty on the car to cover the RLC pump, and now we have to do an unscheduled service.

The service will be performed on Saturday, 1/1, and you can bring your car in anytime during the day. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we hope that we are making the right decision for you.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: LPG Shipment Delay
email_chain.body:
Dear Ju Li,

We are sorry to inform you that your LPG shipment did not arrive at the dealership. However, we are still working on resolving this issue and will notify you of a new delivery date as soon as possible.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Fuel Pump Upgrade and LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Logan,

Thank you for your email. I was just wondering how my car is getting upgraded to a more reliable fuel pump, as per the email you sent on Friday. I have not yet heard from you regarding the LPG shipment. Would you be able to respond to these two issues as soon as possible, please?

My apologies for taking so long to respond to your email.

Ben

email_chain.subject: Overdue Payment Reminder
email_chain.body: This is a reminder that your payment for the shipments of kerosene from Lagos to Casablanca is still overdue. We would appreciate it if you could process the payment at your earliest convenience. Kind regards, Ben

email_chain.subject: Re: Overdue Payment Reminder
email_chain.body: We apologize for the delay in payment. We have been experiencing technical issues with our network, which has hindered our ability to process transactions. We are working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.

email_chain.subject: Order Delay Notification
email_chain.body: Due to the busy season, there has been a slight delay in processing your order. We assure you that your items will be shipped soon. Thank you for your patience. Regards, Mammoud

email_chain.subject: Shipping Schedule and Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Jarrett,

I would like to understand the shipping schedule and rates for moving 50,000MT of almond meal from Algeciras to Marseille over the next 3 months. Would the best route be the Suez Canal?

Thanks.

Best regards,
Siddhartha

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Schedule and Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Here are the details:

The shipment is 50,000MT in dry bulk 25’ containers.
From Algeciras Port on 01/11/2016 to Marseille on 04/11/2016 with delivery to Terminal Lagrange.

Please provide me with a quote.

Thanks,
Siddhartha

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Schedule and Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Siddhartha,

I have reviewed your request and have attached our rates and schedule.

We are booked from October 2016 to January 2017, so the next available space on this route will be January 19. email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates
email_chain.body:

- One for 5,000MT from Busan to Rostock.

Are your rates competitive?

I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. Here are the estimated rates:
- $60/MT for shipping from St. Petersburg to Portovik in a container ship.
- $45/MT for shipping from Shanghai to San Juan in a bulk carrier (50% chance of securing a vessel).
- $4/MT for shipping from Busan to Rostock in a bulk carrier.

The total cost for all shipments is $165,000. This is the lowest rate we can offer.

Kind regards,
Ilya

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Ilya,

Thank you for your prompt response. The rate of $165,000 for all shipments seems reasonable to me. Please confirm the availability and proceed with the booking.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry for Transhipping 7,000MT of Sugar Cane
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ashok,

Thank you for your enquiry regarding the export of 7,000 MT sugar cane from Jiangyin, Jiangsu Province, China to Washington, DC port, USA.

For your reference, please find below our non-binding best available freight quote for the cargo in FCL mode from China, Russia, or Taiwan to the USA.

Please note that the quoted rate does not include: clearance charges, tuck-in/out charge, loading/unloading charges, VGM declaration, terminal and pilotage, lockage, vessel port call surcharge, detention/demurrage.

In addition to the freight rate, you will also have to pay terminal handling charges which are based on the type of service selected and handling facilities required.

Quoted rates for shipper’s and consignee’s transport insurance (depending on loading and unloading of goods in transit).

Best regards,
Shipping Agent

email_chain.subject: Welcome to Our Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Lana,

First, let me welcome you to our company. You have probably had a bad experience with other companies. We want to change that.

Our mission is simple: to make trade easy, by showing you how you can sell your goods at the right price, at the right time. We are here to make your business better, not worse.

I want to show you our solution. You might want to know our pricing policy before you decide on a trade agreement. All our clients must pay a fair amount of money when engaging with us.

Best regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Request for Soymeal Quote
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your attention to our inquiry. We are interested in obtaining a lumpsum quote for 3,200 metric tonnes of soymeal to be shipped from New Orleans to Shepparton. Please provide your best offer at your earliest convenience.

Best wishes,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Soymeal Quote
email_chain.body:
Upon reviewing your request, I noticed that your company has not previously engaged in soymeal transactions with us, despite a history of significant monthly volumes in other commodities. Our standard policy requires a minimum order of 50,000 tonnes for a competitive quote. However, I am open to discussing how we might accommodate your needs. Could you provide more details or suggest a way forward?

Regards,
Kirsty

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Soymeal Supply
email_chain.body:
After careful consideration, we are prepared to offer a reduced rate for a guaranteed delivery of at least 1,000 tonnes of soymeal per month over an extended period. This arrangement aligns with our monthly requirements and would not significantly disrupt our operations. However, this offer is contingent upon securing the necessary volumes, which requires a firm commitment from your side. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this deal, and we will send you our latest supply schedule for review.

Best wishes,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xavier,

We have a small shipment of 160MT of fresh garlic from Cairo to Jeddah that will sail on the Sea Navigator on the 26th. The cargo will be shipped in a sea container and will be ready for loading at the discharge port by 26 August. Are you interested in handling this shipment?

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Henry,

Thanks for the inquiry. We are unable to accept the order as we will be on vacation for a few days. We will be back to work on the 1st of September.

Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Henry,

We have been back at work and wanted to reconfirm the fresh garlic order. Is this still valid? We are interested in arranging this shipment. What is the full weight of the cargo? How much does it weigh? What is the packing volume of the cargo? When are you planning to load the container?

Thanks,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

It is still valid. The full weight of the cargo will be 160MT. The packing volume will be 36CBM. The container will be loaded on 2nd September. How are you going to handle this shipment?

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

I am looking forward to handling this shipment. I am interested in a sea transport, I am looking at the Seaway Transit liner, do you think it will be able to provide us with a suitable transit time for this shipment? Are you still waiting for the packing volume and weights?

Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

Yes, I am still awaiting the packing volume and weight. How long do you think this shipment will take? I thought it will take only a few days to sail the cargo to Saudi Arabia.

Best,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel from Rotterdam to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

I’m looking at shipping 11,500MT of ex-Rotterdam jet fuel to New Orleans via the Suez Canal. Could you send me details of your laycan from outload to EDCT to confirm that you can match the JWC?

Many thanks,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel from Rotterdam to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Sorry for not getting back to you sooner. I’ve just found your email. Let me confirm the following details:

1. You should have an onboard time of 10 hours to the Suez Canal.
2. Your vessel ETA to New Orleans is on 17 June 2022.
3. Ship’s name: L5 Master & QM: Captain Henrique Damasceno & Mercu Regalado.

Can you please check with the charterer on your specific time from the dock to the EDCT?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel from Rotterdam to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The charterer has informed me that they need the EDCT at 11:59pm on 13 June 2022. Do you still have time for the schedule you offered on 12 June?

Many thanks,
Jim

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel from Rotterdam to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

It depends on the exact time. We can start loading oil at 5am and finish by 5:30am. However, we will not be able to load after 6:30am until the next day. For example, we can load the oil until 9am on Monday (13 June 2022), but we cannot start loading after 9:30am and we cannot finish loading before 6pm. Therefore, we will finish at 5:30am on 14 June 2022. We will have to stop loading after 6:30am as the EDCT boss does not want any more loading after that time. I will check the ETA again.

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Slot and Draft Restrictions
email_chain.body: Thanks for confirming your slot on the kerosene job. I just need to confirm your draft restrictions - are you cleared to touch at Las Palmas? I’ll see you on September 12. Best, Eva

email_chain.subject: Request to Adjust Entry Date
email_chain.body: We were wondering if we could push up the entry by a day to Saturday, September 10th. As you may have noticed, the winds are picking up and are expected to get worse as we get closer to Icy and Snowy. We are concerned that this might slow us down if it means having to tack with the winds going onshore or worse, get caught in a rounding with waves much larger than what we have seen. The job is absolutely essential, so I wanted to check with you about this. Thanks so much. Julie

email_chain.subject: Postponement of Job
email_chain.body: Thanks for getting back to me. Unfortunately, I’ll be in Hong Kong from September 7th to 11th, so the job will have to be postponed to the 13th. I’m sorry this is going to cause you an inconvenience. Please change my flights. I’ll be able to fly back on the 13th, but my bags will need to be forwarded from Hong Kong to Paris. They’ll need to be sent to Marseille then to Valencia, so please forward them by September 12th.

email_chain.subject: Updated Itinerary and Accommodation
email_chain.body: Thanks for letting me know when we will meet! We're going to take off on September 15th and land on the 19th. We'll be at the Grand Hôtel du Grand Port Maritime on the 16th. You will know exactly where to find us when you arrive in Valencia!

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Arrangements
email_chain.body: Yes! We're going to get in touch with the crew today! This is the right solution for us. Thank you!

email_chain.subject: Grain Shipment Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

Thanks for the information. We have a couple of questions:

Thank you,
Gerardo

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

I will send you the documents as soon as I have them. I don’t see the form for document upload.

Thanks,
Gerardo

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

We have the list of documents for this booking. Please let us know which ones you are going to use. After that, we will send you the documents and the bills of lading.

Best Regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Methanol Shipment from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

We're looking to send 15,000MT of methanol from Busan to Daesan. How soon can you load and deliver? Also, please confirm if you offer any flexibility on demurrage.

Thanks,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Methanol Shipment from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your quick response. Yes, we can load and deliver methanol in 10 days from Busan, and our FOB costs for 15,000MT would be $US100/ton. We have no flexibility on demurrage charges.

I also just wanted to let you know that I have referred you to Alex because of a potential project he is working on. Is he available?

Thanks for your time,
Angel

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction to Angel
email_chain.body:
Hi Natalie,

Thanks for introducing me to Angel. His e-mail address and phone number are below. He seems very well connected, so I look forward to speaking with him.

Please let me know if you have any more questions,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello, Mr. Smith,

I have 15,000MT of methanol that I would like to send from Busan to Daesan. Could you provide me with a quote and availability?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Request for Spot LNG Cargo Allocation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Shaw,

We require a spot LNG cargo from Qatar to China in one week. If we order 80,000 MMscf now, can you agree to a 20,000 MMscf allocation if it arrives too late?

Thank you,
Ramya

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Spot LNG Cargo Allocation
email_chain.body:
Hi Ramya,

Thank you for your email. Our latest data suggests you should be able to secure a spot cargo to China. The seller indicates it may take up to one week to source, but we can expect it in 6 days. Is that acceptable?

Thank you,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Request for Carrier Services
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Bond,

We need a carrier for a container of tuna from Hobart to Halifax. Do you have any ideas?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Services
email_chain.body:
Yes, I have a vessel that can handle the job. I am familiar with the tides, especially during a full moon. I can provide you with the names and numbers of the pilot service in Halifax. We should discuss this in detail before proceeding to ensure we can meet your needs. Please let me know a convenient time to talk.

Best regards,
James Bond

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Services
email_chain.body:
I'd like to talk with you. How can we set this up? Do you mind if I include my assistant, Mr. Dougherty, in the discussion?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Services
email_chain.body:
Great! We can meet at 10:00 am tomorrow in your lobby. The meeting should last until noon. I'll have my team look into the options we discussed for the trip. There will be costs involved, and we will outline the expenses for you. Can you give me an idea of your budget for this trip?

Best regards,
James Bond

email_chain.subject: Transporting Lobsters to the Middle East
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Bond,

I am Anthony, the CEO of Blue Car, a lobster exporter from Halifax. We have been delivering lobsters worldwide for over 20 years. I am writing to request assistance with transporting our lobsters to the Middle East. Do you have any suggestions on how to proceed?

Best regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Transporting Lobsters to the Middle East
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anthony,

Transporting lobsters to the Middle East is possible but will take time and be costly. The process involves transporting the lobsters to Halifax and then shipping them to Dubai. I am not familiar with the exact costs, but I can discuss this further during our meeting today at 10:00 am. Please feel free to contact me via email or call me at (Tel #) if you have any immediate questions.

Best regards,
James Bond

email_chain.subject: Re: Transporting Lobsters to the Middle East
email_chain.body:
Hi Anthony,

The transport of lobsters to the Middle East will be expensive due to factors like distance, seasonality, container type, and transportation method. The cost will depend on carrier availability and rates. I recommend contacting a shipping company specializing in lobster transport, such as Carriers USA, for more details.

Best regards,
James Bond

email_chain.subject: Request for Capacity: Rapeseed Oil from Gdańsk to Aqaba
email_chain.body:
G’day Mateo,

Do you have any capacity for 4,000MT of rapeseed oil from Gdańsk to Aqaba by the end of May? Thanks!

Best regards,
Lian

email_chain.subject: Negotiation for Ship Carriage of Refined Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain Mateo,

Many thanks for your email. I would like to negotiate on another of your offers for ship carriage of 2,500MT of refined palm oil from Port Kelang to Algeciras by the end of May. Hope to hear from you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Rapeseed Oil Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Lian,

I’d like to clarify your offer. I must mention that the oil cargo is still waiting for a buyer in a warehouse in London, which is already 4,000MT. The price is not competitive as the port will charge you 30 Euros/MT. However, the margin you make will still be around 150,000 Euros, I understand this and would like to proceed. You can provide us with the balance you will need for ship hire and insurance.

Thanks!
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation and Cargo Release
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

We are pleased to inform you that we have received a full payment of $300,000 as indicated in your email. Therefore, we have duly released your cargo from storage. Please note that you will receive 70% of the total invoice by the end of this week and the rest by the end of the next week.

Your booking reference number is: XXXXXXXXXXXX.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Director
FALCO SHIPPING & LOGISTICS PTE LTD.

email_chain.subject: Payment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Lian,

I have just checked with the bank and our account balance is zero. My enquiry is: what is the balance we need to pay to you? Also, is it possible to adjust the payment terms?

Best regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for 5,000 MT of Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Williams,

We need to clear 5,000 MT of refined petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. Our purchase is subject to your best available freight rates and confirmed loading. Do you see any issues with congestion or pricing?

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 5,000 MT of Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Dear Ann,

We cannot accept your offer for the delivery of 5,000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. We are not permitted to tranship petroleum products through Rotterdam due to government regulations. Therefore, we would prefer to be booked directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis.

Thanks and best regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 5,000 MT of Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

Regarding our offer for 5,000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan, I am sorry to inform you that the offer is for a delivery of petroleum products not in accordance with our shipping regulations. We require only petroleum products that have been shipped directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis. Therefore, your offer is not acceptable.

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about 8,500MT Soybeans Charter
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Larsen,

I'm inquiring about the release of 8,500MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston, with destination Tangier. It would be useful to know when your current charter will be clear.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about 8,500MT Soybeans Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Thanks for your inquiry. Are there any more details that you can provide? I'm thinking we could get this done by mid-June for the high season.

Thanks again,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about 8,500MT Soybeans Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Yes, the soybean cargo is available, and we can leave it clear for you. I will contact you shortly with more details.

Regards,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about 8,500MT Soybeans Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

You can charter 8,500 MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston with destination Tangier. We can leave it clear at any time after we get the charter.

Regards,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Request for 5.7kMT Soda Cargo from Magelang to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

We are in need of a 5.7kMT cargo of soda from Magelang for Singapore in the next 10 days. Can you arrange this for us?

Best,
Anil

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 5.7kMT Soda Cargo from Magelang to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Anil,

I handled a 5.7kMT shipment from Magelang last month and can arrange this again. Could you confirm the exact place of delivery in Singapore?

Best,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 5.7kMT Soda Cargo from Magelang to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

The place of delivery is Quayside Terminal, Singapore. Does this work for you?

Best,
Anil

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 5.7kMT Soda Cargo from Magelang to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Anil,

Quayside Terminal works perfectly for me. I’ve had no issues with them in the past. I’ll plan to arrive at the terminal around 9 AM. Will you be there as well?

Best,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 5.7kMT Soda Cargo from Magelang to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

Yes, I’ll be there at 9 AM as well. Looking forward to meeting you then.

Best,
Anil

email_chain.subject: Request for Loading Date Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Winter,

Could you confirm your earliest available loading date for a 5,400MT shipment of cement from Qingdao to Valencia? Additionally, do you have any other useful information regarding this shipment?

Thanks,
Armando

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Loading Date Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Armando,

Thank you for your email. The earliest date we could have your shipment loaded is Tuesday, December 14th, 2010. Please let me know if you require any further details or have additional questions.

Best regards,
Ms. Winter

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation of Shipping Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Winter,

Could you please confirm the details of the above email for my boss? The shipping instructions require my immediate attention, and the information is very urgent.

I'll be in touch soon.

Best regards,
Sal

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Quote - 7k MT Soybeans from Tianjin to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Balamuth,

We are looking to send 7,000 MT of soybeans from Tianjin to Shanghai. Could you please provide us with an FOB quote for this shipment?

Best regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Request for Rates - 100k MT Steel from Tianjin to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Balamuth,

We are planning to export 100,000 MT of steel from Tianjin to Qingdao. Could you please provide us with your rates for this shipment?

email_chain.subject: Request for 500 MT Noodles from Tianjin to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Balamuth,

Please send me a quote for 500 MT of noodles from Tianjin to Qingdao.

Rachel

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Rates - 100k MT Steel from Tianjin to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Balamuth,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our request for rates regarding the export of 100,000 MT of steel from Tianjin to Qingdao. Could you please provide us with an update?

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on 500 MT Noodles from Tianjin to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Balamuth,

I hope you are doing well. I wanted to follow up on our request for 500 MT of noodles from Tianjin to Qingdao. Could you please provide us with an update?

Rachel

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry for LPG Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We require a vessel for transporting 7,300MT of liquefied petroleum gas from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi. Could you please advise on your next available laycan and whether you accept lumpsum deals?

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Vessel 8022 Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Vessel 8022 is scheduled to arrive in Manama on 1/14/2015. We can arrange for a trader who is willing to sign a Letter of Credit (L/C) for the full tonnage of 7,300MT and also against a small proforma invoice. Please find below the email to the vessel manager. If you are interested in this trade, please advise your intended tonnage, and I will provide the vessel manager’s contact information and account number for the proforma invoice.

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Vessel 8022 has received our proforma invoice for 7,300MT and has requested a Letter of Credit to be sent to our account number 421123. Could you please advise on how to proceed with this?

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Letter of Credit Sent
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

I have sent the Letter of Credit for this deal to the supplier and attached a copy below. The balance has been transferred to your account. Could you please confirm receipt of the Letter of Credit and provide details of the two Letters of Credit sent by your trade facilitation department? Kindly acknowledge receipt and advise the time frame in which they will be available.

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Letter of Credit Sent
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

Thank you for your reply. As I informed you, the facility department has sent two separate Letters of Credit, one for the supplier and the other for the shipping line. They have not been sent to your account yet but will be processed shortly. Please rest assured that the Letters of Credit will be sent as soon as the paperwork is completed.

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Balance Transfer Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Our company will be transferring the remaining balance of 14,000 USD to your account within the next two days. Please confirm receipt of the balance transfer or send an email to acknowledge the money transfer.

Thank you.

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Balance Transfer Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

The balance transfer of 14,000 USD has been received and will be deposited into your account within a few hours. Thank you.

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Contract and Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

The transfer of 14,000 USD has been received and deposited into your account. The contract has been signed and will be delivered to your company shortly.

Your Letter of Credit has been processed and is ready. We have updated your balance transfer, and it has been transferred to your account in your name.

Vessel 8022 is currently traveling in the Pacific Ocean and is scheduled to arrive in the Arabian Gulf in a few days.

The total price for the shipment is 7,300 MT x 14,000 USD/MT = 102,290,000 USD. You have made a net payment of 102,290,000 USD, with 14,000 USD remaining to be paid. Your balance transfer of 14,000 USD has been received, and the payment will be deposited into your account within two days.

Vessel 8022 has arrived in the Arabian Gulf and is awaiting further instructions.

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Rescheduling Request for MGK81 Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dearest Cressida,

If you could reschedule the 1,600MT of MGK81 from Guadalajara to Dusseldorf, we’d be very grateful. I appreciate your help with this.

Yours,
Walther

email_chain.subject: Re: Rescheduling Request for MGK81 Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Walther,

I’m sorry to say that due to a shipping error, the cargo we arranged on Monday for shipment to Dusseldorf cannot be loaded until next Friday. Please, accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience and also inform us when you’d like to reschedule for 3 days from now.

Thank you.

Yours,
Cressida

email_chain.subject: Re: Rescheduling Request for MGK81 Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Cressida,

Thanks for your quick response. We can have it delivered to Dusseldorf tomorrow.

Please, confirm and confirm the authenticity of the invoice and prepare the documents so that we can proceed to pay.

Yours,
Walther

email_chain.subject: Re: Rescheduling Request for MGK81 Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Walther,

Thanks for the info. We’ll take the rescheduled MGK81 as soon as we confirm the authenticity of the invoice.

Yours,
Cressida

email_chain.subject: Contract Handover and Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. O'Connor,

Please note that Mr. Fernandes will be on leave, and I will be taking over our contract. I would be happy to meet with you to discuss any matters. Are you available early next week?

Many thanks in advance and best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Handover and Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. O'Connor,

I have received your feedback regarding our contract. I will be reaching out to Mr. Fernandes next week about scheduling an appointment and will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Handover and Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. O'Connor,

Thank you for your email. I have passed on your appointment request to Mr. Fernandes, and he has suggested a meeting for next Monday at 2 PM. Could you please confirm if this time works for you?

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Appointment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Fernandes,

I am sure you remember Daniel James, a fellow data scientist at BBC. He has an upcoming appointment with you next Monday at 2 PM. Is that time suitable? He will be arriving at 1:40 PM to prepare and meet you immediately afterward. Please let me know if this works for you.

Thank you,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Open Laycan to Mina Al Ahmadi - LP Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We have an open laycan to Mina Al Ahmadi with a payload of 6,900MT of LP Gas. Would you be interested in securing the shipment, or could you advise your next open laycan to Mina Al Ahmadi?

Best regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Open Laycan to Mina Al Ahmadi - LP Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

Thank you for your quick response. Your services are prompt and accurate.

I will take the opportunity to look through your website, as I am currently looking to increase my commercial business. We currently trade with a few clients but are looking to expand over the next year. I believe we have a good relationship with these clients, but we are seeking more opportunities as we have additional capacity.

I would also like to get in contact with one of your sales agents to discuss how we can increase our commercial business opportunities.

I appreciate your time and expertise and look forward to discussing this matter further.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Open Laycan to Mina Al Ahmadi - LP Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your enquiry regarding additional space. I can confirm that we have a ship currently transiting between Mina Al Ahmadi and Las Palmas. Please see the details below:

Vessel: [Vessel Name]
Cargo: LP Gas
Laycan: [Laycan Dates]
ETA: [Estimated Time of Arrival]

We also have another vessel transiting from Mina Al Ahmadi to Singapore. Details are as follows:

Vessel: [Vessel Name]
Cargo: LP Gas
Laycan: [Laycan Dates]
ETA: [Estimated Time of Arrival]

Is there anything else I can assist you with? Do you require additional information?

I appreciate your interest in our services and thank you for your cooperation. We will keep in touch and look forward to discussing further opportunities with you.

Best regards,
Bravo Shipping Co.

email_chain.subject: Freight Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Wang,

I’m a freight forwarder at Green Freight. We have availability for the following loads:

- 6000MT of sesame oil from Shanghai to Kobe
- 7000MT of white beans from Dubai to Tianjin
- 5000MT of coriander from Sheung Shui to Rotterdam

Could you send us a response indicating your earliest availability and a ballpark lumpsum idea?

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Zayda

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hey Zayda,

I have availability for sesame oil to Kobe for March 20th as well as white beans from Dubai to Tianjin for March 30th. Let me know if these are the right destinations, and I can send you a proforma.

Best,
Nathan

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Car Shipping from Florida to Charleston
email_chain.body:

We are writing to enquire about the price for shipping a 300MT car from Florida to Charleston. Could you send me a quick quote?

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Car Shipping from San Diego to Kansas City
email_chain.body:

I am interested in your car shipping service from San Diego to Kansas City. The details: 3 Toyota Corolla with an estimated weight of 500kg. If you could provide a quick quote, I would appreciate it.

Paul

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Hummer Shipping from Maine to Texas

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Mercedes Benz C250 Shipping from Baltimore to Denver

Michael

email_chain.subject: Vessel Slot Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:

We need to ship 50,000MT of iron ore pellets from South Korea to the Bahamas. We have a slot available for you in the first week of September, but we need to confirm the availability of the vessel.

Please confirm your interest in this slot.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Slot Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:
Paul,

I confirm that I have 50,000MT of iron ore pellets ready for delivery to the Bahamas. If the vessel is available for the first week of September, I will proceed with booking the slot.

Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Slot Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:
Mark,

This sounds good. I will confirm the vessel's availability with our team in South Korea and get back to you shortly.

Best regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 6,000MT Sugar from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I am interested in 6,000MT of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam. I am looking at a FOB day 90 to negotiate a minimal laycan buffer. Can we discuss this further?

Regards,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 6,000MT Sugar from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Great to see the opportunity emerge. What are your basic terms for corn? I am interested in 1MT consignments.

Regards,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 6,000MT Sugar from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello David,

I hope everything is going well with you and your family.

I trust you will not mind my reiterating on behalf of my clients regarding your inquiry. Regarding the M/T charter of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam at a minimum laycan buffer of 90 days as per your proposal, we require 6,000MT to be delivered within 21 days.

We need to seek quick approval from our internal committee before I can provide you with further details of this requirement. If you require any further details or have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:

How about 24,000MT capacity for corn from Hampton, USA to Frankfurt, Germany? And do you have any outwards freighters around your Saturday base for next month?

Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Corn Shipment

Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Your message #2 received. Can I have a freighter that can move around 50 ton per day from Tampa Florida to Frankfurt Germany on Saturday and Saturday next week. We can provide service documents if required.

Best Regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Your message #3 received.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Corn Shipment

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for French Vocabulary Text
email_chain.body:

I am a teacher of French as a foreign language. I am in need of a French vocabulary text. I would like to know if you have such a text. If yes, how much would it cost and if no, what should I do?
